story:
Hi, there! 


We are a budding team of indie developers, which, having the charge of enthusiasm, ideas, faith and, hopefully, your further support, decided to develop a game. :) I hope that you, dear players, readers, critics and so on, will be interested in the project, as well as you will definitely follow it and wait for it. First, I will tell you about myself and our team. My name is Rodion, and I’m a game designer and the mastermind of our team. Other members of our team are:


Deiland -  Gamedesigner. He is the brain center of our team 

Max – is a game
designer and programmer rolled into one. It is thanks to him the game
has taken on the present look. He is very responsible and used to
work at his maximum. Even when he has a day off, he still develops
something.



Anton – is a character
artist and comics designer. He is very cheerful and positive person
who has provided the game with its own stylistics base, which we
shall use later.



Yurii – is a level
designer, as well as a character & environment artist. He’s
really cool artist. That’s true! Yurii is very good at listening
and implementing the ideas onto graphic canvas. Just a couple of
words is enough for him to recreate what we wish to see. His attitude
to detail is simply amazing. He carefully draws every detail, so
special thanks to him for that.



                                     


So, I got a desire to
create a game. It should be not just another f2p game with a bunch of
‘donate’, but something really new, really nice and memorable. In
principle, all known indie projects offered something new, whether it
was a gameplay, a story, an atmosphere or mechanics (perhaps all
together and at once). And I wanted the same: to give the players a
game that will remain in their hearts for a long time.


At the moment, our resources are being exhausted, but we strongly want to proceed developing this exciting game. The game is at the alpha testing stage, and now, we polish mechanics, develop locations, quests, a lot of interesting puzzles and many other things. We don’t want our project to die, so we are looking for all ways of its development.

Why do we need this amount? - In order to completely develop the game.

All money will go to pay salaries for artists, programmers, game designers and animators, to purchase additional hardware and software, to rent an office, to pay salaries for interpreters in Spanish and English, to pay commissions for indiegogo, to pay postal items, and for sweetie. :) We will account for every penny spent by us.

You can help us not only financially. We would be grateful if you tell about our product to your friends, colleagues and relatives and everybody who surrounds you or whom you know!!!

We can consider your exclusive participation in the development of the game as well.



We are independent developers; we don’t get huge fees, and people almost don’t know us. But we live with an idea; we ​​live with a dream, a dream to create a really worthwhile project that will not ask you to pay for something to become a better person. No! We are creating the game now where everyone will be able to become better oneself, survive the history, the atmosphere, the inspiration that we experience every day, every hour, every minute, every second, and every share of it. We don’t aim to earn millions, and we don’t tend to buy yachts, villas and golden figurines. No! We just want our game to have introduced something new in the gaming industry as a whole, and, of course, we will not stop there.

We want to show you an alternative history of disappearance of greatest civilizations in Latin America. This is a fantastic country that is rich in its cultural values. And we will certainly release this game.


What if we fail to gather the required amount? - It will be very sad. We put emphasis on indiegogo and on you, dear customers, on your support, on your interest in our project. However, if we gather at least a part of the amount claimed, we will be able to push the time forward in order to look for alternative sources of funding (which, of course, is very difficult to do in Russia).


Everybody loves social networks, communication and various social services. We will be incredibly grateful to you if you tell about our product to everybody you know. Who knows, maybe, it is your repost that help us to find an investor.

Thank you very much for your participation and support!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

На Русском

Всем привет. Мы — начинающая команда инди-разработчиков, которая, зарядившись энтузиазмом, идеями, верой и, в дальнейшем, надеюсь, Вашей поддержкой, решила разработать игру. :)

Надеюсь, Вас, дорогие игроки, читатели, критики и др., заинтересует данный проект, и вы непременно будете следить за ним и ждать его.


Для начала расскажу вам о себе и нашей команде.

Моё имя Родион, и я являюсь геймдизайнером и идейным вдохновителем нашей команды.

Остальные члены команды:

Дейланд - Мозг и геймдизайнер нашей команды.

Максим — геймдизайнер и программист в одном лице. Именно благодаря ему игра приобрела тот вид, в котором находится сейчас. Он очень ответственный и подходит к работе по максимуму. Даже когда он делает для себя выходной, он все равно что-то разрабатывает.

Антон — художник по персонажам и дизайнер комиксов. Антон очень весёлый и позитивный человек, который сделал немало для того, чтобы у игры появилась база стилистики, от которой мы будем отталкиваться в дальнейшем.

Юрий — левел-дизайнер, художник по персонажам и окружению. Он очень классно рисует. Нет, правда! Юрий очень хорошо умеет слушать и воплощать идеи на графическом холсте. Ему достаточно пары слов, чтобы воссоздать то, что мы хотим видеть. Его отношение к мелким деталям и детализации просто поражает. Он прорисовывает каждую мелочь, каждую деталь, за что ему отдельная благодарность.


Идея: 

Итак, у меня появилось желание создать игру. Но не просто очередную f2p игру с кучей доната, а что-то действительно новое, действительно красивое и запоминающееся. В принципе, все известные инди-проекты предлагали что-то новое, будь то геймплей, сюжет, атмосфера, механика (возможно всё вместе и сразу). И я хотел так же: дать игрокам игру, которая останется в их сердцах надолго.


Текущая ситуация:

На данный момент, наши ресурсы исчерпываются, но мы безумно хотим продолжать разрабатывать эту потрясающую игру. Игра находится в стадии альфа-тестирования, мы полируем механику, разрабатываем локации, квесты, много интересных головоломок, и еще много чего. Мы не хотим, что бы наш проект умер, поэтому мы ищем все пути его развития. 


Что нужно нам, и что получите Вы?

Для чего нам нужна такая сумма? - для того, чтобы разработать игру до конца. 
Все деньги пойдут на зарплаты художникам, на зарплаты программистам, геймдизайнеру, аниматору, покупку дополнительного оборудования и программного обеспечения, съем офиса, зарплаты переводчикам на испанский и английские языки, оплату комиссии indiegogo, оплату почтовых отправлений, и конфетки :) Мы отчитаемся за каждый цент, потраченный нами.

Вы можете помочь нам не только материально. Мы будем благодарны, если вы будете рассказывать о нашем продукте своим друзьям, коллегам, родственникам, и всем людям, которые вас окружают, или же которых вы знаете!!!

Так же мы можем рассмотреть Ваше эксклюзивное участие в разработке игры.


Зачем все это нужно? 

Мы независимые разработчики, мы не получаем огромные гонорары, нас практически не знают, но мы живем идеей, живем мечтой, мечтой создать действительно стоящий проект, который не будет просить вас заплатить за то, что бы вы могли стать лучше, нет, мы создаем игру, где каждый по своему может стать лучшим, сможет пережить ту историю, ту атмосферу, то вдохновление, которое мы испытываем каждый день, каждый час, каждую минуту, каждую секунду и долю от нее. Мы не стремимся заработать миллионы, мы не стремимся покупать яхты, виллы, золотые статуэтки, нет, мы просто хотим что бы наша игра привнесла что-то новое в игровую индустрию в целом, ну и конечно-же мы не остановимся на достигнутом. 

Мы хотим показать вам альтернативную историю исчезновения величайших цивилизаций Латинской Америки. Это потрясающая страна, которая богата своими культурными ценностями, и мы непременно выпустим эту игру. 


Что если?


Что если мы не сумеем собрать нужную сумму? - Это будет очень печально. Мы ставим акцент на indiegogo и на Вас, дорогие пользователи, на вашу поддержку, на ваш интерес к нашему проекту. Тем не менее, если мы соберем хотя бы часть заявленной суммы, мы сможем отодвинуть время вперед, для того что бы поискать альтернативные источники финансирования ( что конечно очень трудно сделать в России). 


Дополнительная помощь. 

Все мы любим социальные сети, общение и различные социальные сервисы. Мы будем безумно благодарны, если вы будете рассказывать о нашем продукте всем всем. Кто знает, может именно ваш репост или рассказ, поможет найти нам инвестора. 

Спасибо большое за участие и поддержку.
story_txt:
Hi, there! We are a budding team of indie developers, which, having the charge of enthusiasm, ideas, faith and, hopefully, your further support, decided to develop a game. :) I hope that you, dear players, readers, critics and so on, will be interested in the project, as well as you will definitely follow it and wait for it. First, I will tell you about myself and our team. My name is Rodion, and I’m a game designer and the mastermind of our team. Other members of our team are:
Deiland -  Gamedesigner. He is the brain center of our team 

Max – is a gamedesigner and programmer rolled into one. It is thanks to him the gamehas taken on the present look. He is very responsible and used towork at his maximum. Even when he has a day off, he still developssomething.Anton – is a characterartist and comics designer. He is very cheerful and positive personwho has provided the game with its own stylistics base, which weshall use later.Yurii – is a leveldesigner, as well as a character & environment artist. He’sreally cool artist. That’s true! Yurii is very good at listeningand implementing the ideas onto graphic canvas. Just a couple ofwords is enough for him to recreate what we wish to see. His attitudeto detail is simply amazing. He carefully draws every detail, sospecial thanks to him for that.                                     So, I got a desire tocreate a game. It should be not just another f2p game with a bunch of‘donate’, but something really new, really nice and memorable. Inprinciple, all known indie projects offered something new, whether itwas a gameplay, a story, an atmosphere or mechanics (perhaps alltogether and at once). And I wanted the same: to give the players agame that will remain in their hearts for a long time.

At the
moment, our resources are being exhausted, but we strongly want to
proceed developing this exciting game. The game is at the alpha
testing stage, and now, we polish mechanics, develop locations,
quests, a lot of interesting puzzles and many other things. We don’t
want our project to die, so we are looking for all ways of its
development.





Why do
we need this amount? - In order to completely develop the game.
All
money will go to pay salaries for artists, programmers, game
designers and animators, to purchase additional hardware and
software, to rent an office, to pay salaries for interpreters in
Spanish and English, to pay commissions for indiegogo, to pay postal
items, and for sweetie. :) We will account for every penny spent by
us.


You
can help us not only financially. We would be grateful if you tell
about our product to your friends, colleagues and relatives and
everybody who surrounds you or whom you know!!!


We can
consider your exclusive participation in the development of the game
as well.




We are
independent developers; we don’t get huge fees, and people almost
don’t know us. But we live with an idea; we ​​live with a
dream, a dream to create a really worthwhile project that will not
ask you to pay for something to become a better person. No! We are
creating the game now where everyone will be able to become better
oneself, survive the history, the atmosphere, the inspiration that we
experience every day, every hour, every minute, every second, and
every share of it. We don’t aim to earn millions, and we don’t
tend to buy yachts, villas and golden figurines. No! We just want our
game to have introduced something new in the gaming industry as a
whole, and, of course, we will not stop there.


We
want to show you an alternative history of disappearance of greatest
civilizations in Latin America. This is a fantastic country that is
rich in its cultural values. And we will certainly release this game.







What
if we fail to gather the required amount? - It will be very sad. We
put emphasis on indiegogo and on you, dear customers, on your
support, on your interest in our project. However, if we gather at
least a part of the amount claimed, we will be able to push the time
forward in order to look for alternative sources of funding (which,
of course, is very difficult to do in Russia).







Everybody
loves social networks, communication and various social services. We
will be incredibly grateful to you if you tell about our product to
everybody you know. Who knows, maybe, it is your repost that help us
to find an investor.


Thank you very much
for your participation and support!



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Всем привет. Мы — начинающая команда инди-разработчиков, которая, зарядившись энтузиазмом, идеями, верой и, в дальнейшем, надеюсь, Вашей поддержкой, решила разработать игру. :)
Надеюсь, Вас, дорогие игроки, читатели, критики и др., заинтересует данный проект, и вы непременно будете следить за ним и ждать его.


Для начала расскажу вам о себе и нашей команде.
Моё имя Родион, и я являюсь геймдизайнером и идейным вдохновителем нашей команды.
Остальные члены команды:
Дейланд - Мозг и геймдизайнер нашей команды.
Максим — геймдизайнер и программист в одном лице. Именно благодаря ему игра приобрела тот вид, в котором находится сейчас. Он очень ответственный и подходит к работе по максимуму. Даже когда он делает для себя выходной, он все равно что-то разрабатывает.
Антон — художник по персонажам и дизайнер комиксов. Антон очень весёлый и позитивный человек, который сделал немало для того, чтобы у игры появилась база стилистики, от которой мы будем отталкиваться в дальнейшем.
Юрий — левел-дизайнер, художник по персонажам и окружению. Он очень классно рисует. Нет, правда! Юрий очень хорошо умеет слушать и воплощать идеи на графическом холсте. Ему достаточно пары слов, чтобы воссоздать то, что мы хотим видеть. Его отношение к мелким деталям и детализации просто поражает. Он прорисовывает каждую мелочь, каждую деталь, за что ему отдельная благодарность.

Итак, у меня появилось желание создать игру. Но не просто очередную f2p игру с кучей доната, а что-то действительно новое, действительно красивое и запоминающееся. В принципе, все известные инди-проекты предлагали что-то новое, будь то геймплей, сюжет, атмосфера, механика (возможно всё вместе и сразу). И я хотел так же: дать игрокам игру, которая останется в их сердцах надолго.

Текущая ситуация:
На данный момент, наши ресурсы исчерпываются, но мы безумно хотим продолжать разрабатывать эту потрясающую игру. Игра находится в стадии альфа-тестирования, мы полируем механику, разрабатываем локации, квесты, много интересных головоломок, и еще много чего. Мы не хотим, что бы наш проект умер, поэтому мы ищем все пути его развития.

story:
"Thugs" is a strategy game with RPG elements. The purpose of the game is the construction of a criminal organization in Sargos, the medieval city-state.

Game goal:

Creation of a criminal gang in the medieval city-state.

Features of the game:
- Branched storyline, dependent on the players actions.
- Battles with "turn based" mode.
- Sophisticated ambience of the medieval city-state.
- Opportunity to develop your own characters and mechanics; free choice as to the missions passage.
- Alchemy with usage of substances applied in real formulas (poisons, explosives, medical potions).

We are a team of developers from Ukraine. This is our first major project and we need some help with it. Now we have 8 members in our team:

Zelenkov “Zepa” Ruslan (author of the story and leader of the team)

Slipets "Michael Vargo" Oleg (3-D modeler)

Zelenkov Alexandr (level-designer)

Kvitnitskaya "Little Mary" Masha (2-D artist, animator)

Bilan Vladimir (programmer)

Isakiy "Kot" Konstantin (programmer)

Markov "Mark Tornvald" Alexandr (level-designer, 3-D modeler)

Piven "Butcher" Yuriy (UI-designer)

We've decided to create a game about criminal world because this side of life isn't particularly covered by the game industry. It is during the Middle Ages crime has started to transform into profession with an aura of romance beside the villains.

According to our calculations, for the completion of the project we need 12 months and 30 000 $.

Cost: 15% - taxes; 15% - software; 70% - payment for the labor of artists, programmers, interpreters.

We've chosen a flexible option for money gathering. In case of shortage of the required amount the project won't stop, we will work with what is available and will try to rise capital from other sources.

Storyline:

The story begins with the arrival in Sargos of a group of people from a large-scale criminal syndicate, which should help the local subsidiary to solve their frictions with rival gangs and kingpins. After stabilization of the situation, the newcomers displace the current leader of the subsidiary and decide to create their own gang on his base. Throughout the game the plot may vary, depending on the policy, which you have chosen for your organization. You can create a criminal empire, like Moriarty, or form a brotherhood in the best traditions of Robin Hood, or stay somewhere in the middle of these two, like the pirate John Silver. Also there will be quite unexpected possibilities, as an opportunity to become the head of the city. Money and power can resolve many issues in the Middle Ages.

Strategy:

Throughout the game you will be engaged in a variety of murky practices. The main activities are:

  1. The green zone – authorities don't pay any attention to these kinds of affairs. However, the competition with other gangs and corrupt guards takes place. E.g.
    Prostitution, contraband, gambling business.
  2. The orange zone – here your activity directly intersects with interests of the city governors and the church. E.g.
    Drug trade, fraud, theft.
  3. The red zone – actions, most condemned by the society and persecuted by the authorities. E.g.
    Robbery, murder, slave trade.

You can achieve your task goals in different ways. For example, to lay your hands on the tavern and make it a part of your empire, you can intimidate the owner by sending a couple of beefy bouncers to him, or offer him a share in the co-distribution of the illicit goods, or profusely pay for the service, thereby buying his goodwill. At the worst you can simply kill him, putting one of your men on his place.

Bribery, fraud, seduction, intimidation, murder, blackmail - this is not the full list of actions on the residents of the city, where you are deploying your affairs. Your army of followers will consist of people of all classes. From beggars and prostitutes to the heads of departments and nobility.

Actions you take will affect the attitude of authorities, church and society towards yourself, as well as the attitude of your subordinates.

Resistance of your expansions will depend on these relationships. E.g. Raids of the city-guard, inquisition persecution, betrayal and attempts to dislodge you from the top of the pyramid.

Tactics:

Having exhausted all diplomatic solutions to the issue (unsuccessful intimidation, blackmail, and bribery), the only way left is the elimination of problems with the help of the physical force. This might be either a theft (when it comes to the subject), or murder (if your target is a person).

Tactical actions also include resolving disputes with unruly gangs and headhunters, including the city-guard and inquisition, if you provoke them.

From 1 to 3 characters will be available for the battle from your side, with unlimited number of opponents. Everything will depend on the level of your warriors. When completing a mission you can take any member of your gang. Each class, in addition to the basic characteristics (damage, agility, defense, attack etc.), will have their own special skills. Thieves, for example, rely on their dexterity and try to deprive the weapons and potions of their enemies. Prostitutes, in their turn, are hysterical and will cry and wrung their hands in order to divert enemys' attention to another person and then strike back, goons can grip the enemy, restricting his movements and causing damage etc.

Alchemy:

In addition to the variety of cold steel arms, alchemy is present in our game. With the help of this science (which is forbidden by the church) you can create explosives, which can be used in battles or to open locks; poisons to be used throughout missions against certain enemies; potions to enhance treatment and dexterity. In all the formulas real proportions and components are used (e.g. To make gunpowder you need 15 portions of saltpeter, 3 of charcoal, 2 of sulphur. To make a slow acting poison you need bamboo and green tea. To make sulfuric acid you need sulphur, water and saltpeter.). Highly experienced alchemists are capable of creating potions, which are able to change human body (appearance and skills).

Other features and possibilities of the game:

Global events: fairs, riots, epidemics, rounded ups, changes of weather will significantly affect the development of the plot.
Mini games: liquidation of traps, lock hacking, gambling etc.
Some tasks have "Interactive Fiction" design.

story:
Ten years have passed since the sudden and mysterious end of a hidden war that led the world to collapse. The ancient Sanctuaries, once bastions of pride and security, are now nothing but dust and ashes. The old figures have fallen into battle for betrayals, duels or lack of will. The ideals that many fought for, today are just empty slogans.

The Aurora is approaching and with it a new awakening. Deviants sleep among the humans, unaware that in the shadow of the night, those who already woke up are doing the preparations for a new rebirth.

The light reveals four factions believed to be missing, Corporation, The Abyssal, Chimera and Acracia, which gradually unfold on a new battlefield, preparing for the abrupt dawn that is looming.

Order, supremacy, peace or freedom?

The factions are looking for new recruits, humans who have awakened and that are willing to join this crusade for directing the humanity’s future.

A Struggle begins with each player putting their respective Sanctuaries into play and then drawing 6 cards. Then, if a player wants to, he or she may shuffle his or her Hand back to draw a new Hand of 6 cards. If that player wishes to repeat the process, he or she may do so, with the condition of drawing 1 card less each time he or she changes hands.

A player is then chosen at random to start the game. Whenever a player takes a turn, he or she must do so by following these Steps:

1. Communion

Every card controlled by the Active Player is untapped by putting them in vertical position. Then, any Volition Point left from the Active Player’s last turn is eliminated. Finally, every Technology controlled by the Active Player loses a Durability Point.

2. Meditation

First, Enhancements and Technologies controlled by the Active Player generate Volition points according to their printed numbers. Then, every effect that depends on the beginning of the turn triggers. Finally, the Active Player draws a card.

During the first turn of the game, the Passive Player’s Sanctuary also generates Volition and the Active Player does not draw a card.

3. Volition Harvest

During his or her Volition Harvest, the Active Player may play any number of cards and activate any ability that can be activated. Keep into account that you can’t play more that one Enhancement card each turn.

4. Duel

This step is optional and the Active Player may choose to skip it. To start the Duel Step, tap an untapped Character you control and challenge an opposing Character. The controller of the challenged Character gets 2 Volition points. Both the challenger and the challenged Characters are considered to be engaged in personal conflict and deal Duel Damage to each other according to their respective Forces. At the end of the Duel Step, if only one of the two Characters remains in the Struggle, then its controller has won the Duel. The player that lost the Duel draws a card.

Both players can play Manipulation cards during this Step. Characters can’t challenge to a Duel in the same turn they entered the Struggle.

5. Combat

This step is optional and the Active Player may choose to skip it. The Active Player selects any number of untapped Characters he or she controls and declare them attackers. You must tap Characters declared as attackers. The Passive Player then declare his or her blockers. Blocking is optional and can be done by simply declaring any number of untapped Characters as blockers. Each Character may block or be blocked by only one Character.
Then, attackers and their respective blockers deal Combat Damage to each other at the same time. Characters destroyed during Combat are removed from the Struggle and taken to their owner’s Limbo. Finally, each blocked Character that remained in the Struggle deals Sanctuary Damage equal to its Force minus the Force of its blocker. Simultaneously, each unblocked attacker deals Sanctuary Damage equal to its Force.

Both players can play Manipulation cards during this Step. Characters can’t attack in the same turn they entered the Struggle.

6. Contemplation

This Step is defined as the instant in which the Active Player’s turn end. Both players can play Manipulation cards.

ACRACIA

  • "Pain destroys humanity. To avoid this, we must destroy every source that causes it.“

ABYSSAL

  • "Humans are a scum that needs to be eliminated. If you get to interact with them, you will succumb to their same fate.”

CHIMERA

  • "Join the doctrine that will achieve peace and social union. Otherwise, let us liberate your evil through death."

CORPORATION

  • “The asleep are our means to reach the deviant future. Come on, this is for all of us.”

 

ABOUT THE PROJECT
Is there any launch date for Humankind the Awakening?

- The estimate launch date is second semester of 2017.

Will there be a beta-testing phase?

-  Yes, we will have a beta-testing phase after our crowdfunding campaign is finished.

Can I be a beta tester?

- All tiers starting from Faction Soldier will have access to the beta.

ABOUT THE GAME
Will the game be free?

- The game download will be free and every new player will receive a playable deck. Then the player can buy more boosters from us, buy single cards from the marketplace or win new cards in the daily missions and events.

Will it have card trading?

- We will provide a card marketplace where players will buy and sell cards at a desired price. The game will not have direct card trading between players.

How many cards do I get in one booster pack?
- A booster pack contains 1 rare card, 3 uncommon cards and 6 common cards.

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

- So far the minimun system requirements are (they may vary):

PC
Windows 7 or newer
CPU: Intel i3 o equivalent
2Gb of RAM
3Gb of available space in hard drive
4mb/s internet conection

Apple Mac

OS X 10.8 or newer
CPU: Intel i3 o equivalent
2 Gb of RAM
3 Gb of available space in hard drive
4 mbps internet connection

iOS

iPhone 5 or newer
3Gb of available space
3G or higher internet connection

Android


Android 4.4 or higher
2 Gb RAM
3 Gb of available space
3G or higher internet connection

story:
Short Summary

Hi, My name is Aaron and this is my indiegogo campaign for Mind the Gap. 
Currently i'm working on getting something made that i think loads of people will enjoy and Even though i've got no business in asking for money i just would kindly like to ask your support in what i'm doing!

What We Need & What You Get

This money will go entirely to production costs and royalties.

People who donate will get early access to the full version of the game and exclusive access to the beta that will be released as soon as it's ready

Everyone in the end will get access to what i think is going to be a great product.

The Impact

Helping me here will give me the ability to flesh out my ideas and add more content that i might not otherwise be able to add in. 

things like a level creator for fans and more content in the end result

Risks & Challenges

I'm not a proven developer and I'm currently working alone so this is definitely going to be a tough venture for me along the way.

But i do have the skills and the dedication to put in the work necessary to give back to the gaming community with this project.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute feel free to hop onto our indiedb page and give your advice on how things work by using the public test environment. Let me know what things you'd like to see in the game and how other things, if they were added, would improve the final product!

story:
Madwarf Mobile Game for Apple IOS, Android, Windows Phone and Steam.

 Madwarf is coming soon for mobile platforms and PC.

        

 


                                   

 Madwarf 3d is a developed puzzle game which will be compatible for IOS/Android/PC platforms. The game has several entertaining and hard stages. It is a game which is inflictor for players and which is linking the players with its well graphics. In the process, the levels will be increased by updates. There are versions which is higher definition graphics for mobile phones.

                                 

It is possible to play the Madwarf by touch-operated buttons as wafting the fingers on screen via mobile phones. And it is possible to play the game by directional pad on PC. Basicly the target of the game is to break all rocks and to reach the last rock. Players should not miss any rock , While breaking the rocks. If the player misses the rocks, they may be have to restart the stage. There are rocks which have different features.

Our game has three different levels. Those three levels are , 0-20 easy, 20-40 mediate, 40-60 hard. New enemies, new levels will be added by updates.

                                   

 

It is a stone which is being broken after one hit and there are mostly these type of stone.

                                        

                             

It is being broken after two hits.

                         

                          

It is blue stone in the game and when you standing on it, this stone teleports you to planned point.

                                

                     

It is a stone which dwarf is being teleported from stone of teleport.

                               

                                               

It is a stone which is only exist on certain places. When the player stand on this stone, it causes that new stones come into stage. And it will cause to overtime on the game.

                                       

                

It is the stone which will be remained after breaking all stones. It is the stone which the game will end and this stone can not be broken.

                             

   

This stone brings different kind of harmony to the game. When the dwarf stand on this stone, there will appear a bar which are locating on the right and left of the screen and this stone helps the players to pass silently as the players will stop the indicator on these appeared bars. If the indicator would not be stopped wrongly, the troll will be awaken and the stage will be missed.

                           

     

While the dwarf is walking to the each stones, the dragon will turn certain angle arround himself, and if the player fictionalise the game wrongly and continue with this wrong fiction, and if the dwarf and dragon stays face to face as the dragon is active, The dragon burns the dwarf with its fire, and the game will be missed.

                         

Founder of our team is two person and we are totally 5 person. We are strongly improving our team presently. Our team has gathered 1 year and a half year ago and we have worked on various projects. And our team has experiences avaragely  6-8 years. We have gathered to react these experiences on gaming sector.

Madwarf is a game which is our first game. We are developing the Madwarf game since 6 months, and as soon as possible it will be ready for all platforms. There are two more projects of us. We are also asserative on these projects too. You can follow us and our projects via Facebook, Twitter and Our Social Networks.

Suleyman Kahraman : Consultant - Contact

Furkan Ugurlu : Co-Founder, CG Artist and UI Desing

Alex Uyanis Cevikkol :  Co-Founder, Programmer 

Hasan Ozoglu : Level Designer

Alper Yavuz : Music Composer

                   

It is really hard to rise and to be popular in the sector. We choosed the indiegogo to success these facts.  We are developing these projects with the ideal hardwares and softwares and we are targeting to create well works with these ideal elements. We want to create  high quality works and to improve these works as we are developing our programs. Our main project is a detailled survival game. The concepts of this project has been prepared and it is waiting for the time.  Our survival game will be faster 2times more thanks to this Madwarf game. But this fact is dependent to you.

Our Survival project:

We are looking for your help to improve our projects and create a sector as we will create an office for our team.

                      

Steam Green Light, Google Play, Apple Store,Unity Pro accounts will be taken.

Licences for Programs: We are using Modelling and Animation Blender, and using photoshop for texture mapping. Normally we are using Autodesk Max and Zbrush but for this project we have to use blender.

Autodesk will change their system to the subscription at 31 July 2016. And we want to buy Autodesk 3ds Max with the collected donations.

Help us to be able to create high quality games with high quality softwares.

Music & Audio :  We are planning to employ a personel to make better quality of voices.

Art : All graphics of game is being created by us , however , we need well equipments to be able to improve this project and to be able to create better charachters and animations. The tablets and PCs are hardwares which are useful for daily using. For example, We need Wacom Cintiq to be able to create detailled and well seen charachters.

Advertisement: We need high budgeted advertisements to be able to reach the large masses with our game.

e.g Software Program License:

Zbrush : 795$

Autodesk 3Ds Max : 6.640$

Photoshop : 140$(year or months)

Unity : 1.500$

Topogun : 250$

Substance Painter : 590$

Unity Assets : 500$

              + ______________

     Total :      10.415$

                

                        Steam  GreenLight    ✔

 


If we can not reach the amount which we targetted, we will publish our game on certain platforms and continue how much our budget is enough.First of all We will supply the our software need with the enough amount of donation. And the rest of donation , we will use for advertisement and music.

The people who can not help our budget can support us as they are sharing our game and social networks. As you know, To make advertisement is harder as much as create the game. If each supporter mentions to their friends about us, it will be so helpful for us. And also, you can support us as you like our social networks and as you are commenting us or criticising us.

If the hard disk part of our PCs does not broken, there will not be any kind of problem.  If they will be broken, it will take us one step back. We are backing up our project once in 2-3 weeks or when there was an important developments. Maximum, if our PCs will have problems, we can continue from the backed up part and we can complete the files which has been lost when the PCs has broken.

As our game is published as single player, we dont expect any kind of problem


Social Networks

Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/akhalagames/

Twitter : https://twitter.com/Akhala_Games

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjgjH4uEwtF6Wwneu0fX1mA

story:
Night Lights is 2D puzzle platformer, based on lights and shadows interactions. Key feature of the game is shadow objects, which have a physical form, but you can cut them through with a light.

DEMO for Windows/Mac/Linux available on  itch.io and GameJolt

Other features:

  • Different night places to explore: forests, city rooftops and more strange locations
  • Various mechanisms, powered by crystals
  • System of portals, giving you a little bit of freedom in order of completing the levels
  • Approximately 5 hours of gameplay
  • Keyboard and controller support
  • Lightbulb in your head

Night Lights is a puzzle platformer game, so basically you are traveling between different locations and solving puzzles.

Key element of the game is shadow objects, which have a physical form, but disappear in the light. And if shadow object is big enough (a shadow wall, for example), you can cut it through.

And if shadow object is small, it can disappear in the light completely, just like this shadow box.

It's not only walls and boxes. It also could be such thing as shadow ladder.

 

While traveling through levels you will need to collect crystals.

And use them to activate various mechanisms and light sources.

All locations are connected though portals. Some of them are activated with switches, buttons and other mechanisms, some will require certain amount of crystals. And sometimes you will have a choice, what place to visit next.

At some point of your journey you will obtain The Lightbulb, which works as a portable light source.

And the lightbulb in your head will help you in solving puzzles.

 

Demo is available for Windows, Mac and Linux. It works fine with Xbox 360/Xbox One controllers. Some other controllers should work as well, but I didn't test them yet. Tooltips are also available only for Xbox controllers at this moment.

Demo is short and will take ~15 minutes to finish. It shows basic gameplay features and captures overall mood and direction in which the game is moving.

Also the demo is mostly linear, but in full game there will be more complex portal network.

DOWNLOAD DEMO: itch.io or GameJolt

If you don't have time to play the demo, you can watch jacksepticeye playing it:

 

Game is under development for Windows/Mac/Linux and intended to be released on Steam and GOG.com. It will be released for Windows first, then for Mac and Linux. Game will be DRM-Free.

Night Lights has been Greenlit, so future Steam release is confirmed: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=832170947

Other platforms will be considered in the future.

 

Night Lights is one-man project. My name is Artem Cheranev, I am 29-year-old game developer, currently located in Moscow, Russia. I'm working on this game alone, doing programming/art/music.

Back in 2013 I made little browser game with simple lights & shadows mechanics (http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/620220). After that I always wanted to create big polished puzzle game with more complex features, but didn't have an opportunity until 2016. So now I'm finally working on this project.

Other things I worked on:

Between 2011 and 2015 I worked mostly on flash browser games, some of them you can find here: bombocracker.newgrounds.com

In 2015 I also developed mobile puzzle game "Shifter!": shiftergame.com

 

 

With my current funds I was able to finish the demo, but for creating complete game and working on it full-time I need your help. At this moment I have all basic game elements working and now I'm ready to build a full game from them.

Requested amount of money will give me the opportunity for ~20 months of development, with planned release date in September, 2018.

Just to make things clear: game will be finished no matter what, that's why campaign's goal is flexible. But without the necessary amount of money I will have to develop it mostly in my spare time, so release development time will increase.

 

Digital copy of game for PC

You will get the digital copy of Night Lights for Windows/Mac/Linux.

Your name in credits

You will be mentioned in the game credits as Indiegogo Contributor

Original game soundtrack

You will get digital copy of game soundtrack

Access to the beta testing

You will get access to the beta testing in late stage of development

Ingame painting on the wall

I will create ingame painting on the wall in one of the game locations, based on sketch or photo, provided by you (sketch/photo must be in good taste)

Special mention in credits

You will get a special mention in game credits as Major Indiegogo Contributor

Handmade soft toy

You will receive handmade soft toy game protagonist (lightbulb glows in the dark if you press hidden button)

 

Level, based on your sketch

I will build a game level, with background and topography based on sketch or photo, provided by you (sketch/photo must be in good taste and fit in the visual style of the game)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This is my first big project, before it I worked only on smaller games. And making a game is really hard, especially if you work alone. story_txt:
Night Lights is 2D puzzle platformer, based on lights and shadows interactions. Key feature of the game is shadow objects, which have a physical form, but you can cut them through with a light.
DEMO for Windows/Mac/Linux available on  itch.io and GameJolt
Other features:

Different night places to explore: forests, city rooftops and more strange locations
Various mechanisms, powered by crystals

System of portals, giving you a little bit of freedom in order of completing the levels
Approximately 5 hours of gameplay

Keyboard and controller support

Lightbulb in your head






Night Lights is a puzzle platformer game, so basically you are traveling between different locations and solving puzzles.
Key element of the game is shadow objects, which have a physical form, but disappear in the light. And if shadow object is big enough (a shadow wall, for example), you can cut it through.

And if shadow object is small, it can disappear in the light completely, just like this shadow box.

It's not only walls and boxes. It also could be such thing as shadow ladder.
 
While traveling through levels you will need to collect crystals.

And use them to activate various mechanisms and light sources.

All locations are connected though portals. Some of them are activated with switches, buttons and other mechanisms, some will require certain amount of crystals. And sometimes you will have a choice, what place to visit next.


At some point of your journey you will obtain The Lightbulb, which works as a portable light source.

And the lightbulb in your head will help you in solving puzzles.

 

Demo is available for Windows, Mac and Linux. It works fine with Xbox 360/Xbox One controllers. Some other controllers should work as well, but I didn't test them yet. Tooltips are also available only for Xbox controllers at this moment.
Demo is short and will take ~15 minutes to finish. It shows basic gameplay features and captures overall mood and direction in which the game is moving.
Also the demo is mostly linear, but in full game there will be more complex portal network.
DOWNLOAD DEMO: itch.io or GameJolt
If you don't have time to play the demo, you can watch jacksepticeye playing it:

 

Game is under development for Windows/Mac/Linux and intended to be released on Steam and GOG.com. It will be released for Windows first, then for Mac and Linux. Game will be DRM-Free.
Night Lights has been Greenlit, so future Steam release is confirmed: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=832170947
Other platforms will be considered in the future.
 


Night Lights is one-man project. My name is Artem Cheranev, I am 29-year-old game developer, currently located in Moscow, Russia. I'm working on this game alone, doing programming/art/music.
Back in 2013 I made little browser game with simple lights & shadows mechanics (http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/620220). After that I always wanted to create big polished puzzle game with more complex features, but didn't have an opportunity until 2016. So now I'm finally working on this project.
Other things I worked on:
Between 2011 and 2015 I worked mostly on flash browser games, some of them you can find here: bombocracker.newgrounds.com
In 2015 I also developed mobile puzzle game "Shifter!": shiftergame.com
 

 
With my current funds I was able to finish the demo, but for creating complete game and working on it full-time I need your help. At this moment I have all basic game elements working and now I'm ready to build a full game from them.
Requested amount of money will give me the opportunity for ~20 months of development, with planned release date in September, 2018.
Just to make things clear: game will be finished no matter what, that's why campaign's goal is flexible. But without the necessary amount of money I will have to develop it mostly in my spare time, so release development time will increase.
 

Digital copy of game for PC
You will get the digital copy of Night Lights for Windows/Mac/Linux.
Your name in credits
You will be mentioned in the game credits as Indiegogo Contributor
Original game soundtrack
You will get digital copy of game soundtrack
Access to the beta testing
You will get access to the beta testing in late stage of development
Ingame painting on the wall
I will create ingame painting on the wall in one of the game locations, based on sketch or photo, provided by you (sketch/photo must be in good taste)
Special mention in credits
You will get a special mention in game credits as Major Indiegogo Contributor
Handmade soft toy
You will receive handmade soft toy game protagonist (lightbulb glows in the dark if you press hidden button)
 
Level, based on your sketch
I will build a game level, with background and topography based on sketch or photo, provided by you (sketch/photo must be in good taste and fit in the visual style of the game)
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 


This is my first big project, before it I worked only on smaller games. And making a game is really hard, especially if you work alone. But I think that at this point I have the necessary game development experience and skills to finish this game. As I mentioned before, I'm going to finish this project no matter what, even if Indiegogo campaign will be unsuccessfull. story:
Story:  

Jelly the James(JJ) is part of MANGO(Magnificent Architects of Nice Games Organization) world where all citizens have Game Masters(GM) as their jobs. Because everyone is a GM in MANGO world, the most important thing is how *fun* the game he or she runs is. JJ was accused of running the Haunted House he inherited from his dad Boringly(No Jam Crime) and gets imprisoned.  


1st Trailer:

 

2nd Trailer:

 

 

How to play:  

You will become Jelly the James(JJ) and run the Haunted House. You will need to constantly place, replace or destroy your instruments to satisfy your guest! JJ needs to be covert to not be seen by the guest to hide the fact that there is JJ moving everything around. Use cloaking mode effectively to construct and run your very own Haunted House!

 

How and Where will BA;WE Games release the Game:  

BA;WE Games is preparing to launch our 「JJ the GM: Make the Haunted House Great Again」 on Greenlight, Steam. Greenlight is Steam's own system to filter games by Steam users' interest. Anyone who has a Steam account can vote in favor or against the game submitted on Greenlight. If you leave your email address in below's Google Survey(Subscribe), you will receive an email once our game goes on Greenlight. We will only send emails when our game goes on Greenlight and Steam so don't worry about getting spammed!

 >Subscribe<
>Our Facebook Page<    

We need your interest to have our game on Steam!
Subscribing and voting in favor of us later on is as valuable as funding us!

Developers: 

 College students who were interested in developing a game formed a team to actually make one on April, 2016. We experienced a painful loss of one of our team member due to his personal issues, redesigning the game from scratch, and more but we are overcoming those issues as a team.

 

Here's our member: 

- Yilsun Choi (Korea): Game Director, Programming
- Chang-yun Jeong (Korea): 3D Modeling, Sound Director 
- Seung-hwan Choi (Korea): 3D Modeling, Animation Director 
- Junsoo Choi (Korea): Programming, Video Editing 

 

Here's a video that show our production process briefly:

 

Schedule: 

We have managed to meet our first deadline earlier. We will try our best to do the same for the rest!

0) 5th Feb: Greenlight Concept Submission [Complete!]
1) 28th Feb: Greenlight Submission 
2) 31st March: Finish developing JJ the GM: Make Haunted House Great Again
3) April: Expecting to pass Greenlight and be released on Steam.
4) ~~ : Fix bugs and release DLCs

(On the first day we submitted, our game got on "Most Popular" list!)

Why do we need support?:

1) We need space to work
We have tried working separately on Skype. However, that didn't work out that well. There was a huge difference in working speed. That's how we managed to complete our first task earlier than the schedule. Right now, we are working in an office that one of our friend rented us. However, we need to find a new space as he will need to use this office in a month or two. We need some funds to rent a new office.

2) We need production fee
We are 4 college students majoring Computer Science and Engineering. As a result, there are some parts that we can't do by ourselves such as art and music. The thumbnail you can see above has been outsourced.

We tried to draw our own thumbnail, but as you can see there is a huge quality gap between them. We try our best to reduce production cost but there are some necessary elements that we need to pay others to do.

3) For our daily life
Our team is spending 11 hours a day,  6 days a week to develop our game. As students, we have no income but we spend quite a lot of money on public transportation, food and others. 

 

Reward Sample Design:


(This is a sample image. After we successfully raise the fund, most likely we will outsource these designs)

 

To let you know:

- The schedule can change depending on the process.
- Default language is English.
- If there are different designs for the mug or the mouse pad, they will be randomly sent.
- If the name submitted is inappropriate, it will be removed.
- Game code will be sent out once our game is released on steam.
- The mug and the mouse pad be made and shipped once we successfully raise the fund.

story:
Try the Demo !

If you like puzzle games, do not hesitate and try the demo now !

Download Heartbeat - Demo (for Windows)

Check me out or contact me on Twitter / Facebook / Youtube.
Everything's on my Website.
You can also mail me at This Address, to report a bug and any other feedback.

The Press

(this list will grow over time)

- "Heartbeat seems to find its way into the hearts of those who play it." (Translated from french)
 - "Heartbeat does puzzle-platforming right, providing a well structured system of more and more complicated conundrums."

Characteristics

  • Players: Single-player game.
  • Genre: 2D Puzzlegame plateformer.
  • Controls: Full controller support / Keyboard+mouse.
  • Platforms: Windows for now, Mac & Linux soon.
  • Supported Languages: English
  • Release date: Early 2018

The Game

You will have to use your heart to move forward. But be careful! If it goes too far from you, you will slowly start slipping to a certain death.
You must accept that you’ll have to give a part of yourself to interact with more than 30 different mechanisms scattered across your path.
Get the hang of them. Even if they seem to block your way now, they might be helpful later.
Death is an inescapable part of life, but that doesn't mean one should run into its arms.
You are constantly confronted by your mortality, and you'll have to give away a vital part of yourself to be able to live amongst others.

The Gameplay

If you like puzzle games, then you’ll love Heartbeat and you should Download and Play the Demo before reading what the Gameplay is.
In Heartbeat, the discovery of the mechanisms' functions are, in a way, puzzles.
That's why I have decided to spoil the "basics" only, and I hope, by playing the demo, you will realize the potential this game has.

In the Demo, you will learn all the basics and discover some original mechanisms.
In the full game, you will play with 30 original mechanisms, most of which synergize with others. They add dynamism, enrich the gameplay, and create a curve of increasing difficulty.
There are also "powerups" that modify your Heart properties and give it some new abilities.
And there is so much more to discover!

Without further ado, here are the basics of Heartbeat Gameplay.

Of course, you can activate levers with your hand.

 

You can throw your heart and then recall it.

 

Beware ! If your heart stay alone for too long, you will die from a Heart Attack !

 

You might need your heart to activate some mechanisms, like this scale.

 

Or this corpse.

 

If you can't reach the lever with your hand, maybe you could use your heart to activate it during the Recall ?

 

You can perform a shadow dash with Lanterns.
Shadow and Light take an important place in Heartbeat.

 

If you are stuck, you can suicide.


Remember, these are just the basics of Heartbeat.
Try out the Demo to discover some of the original mechanisms.

The Story

There you are, at last.
She looks beautiful, as she always does. Her skin, soft and pale. Her bewitching perfume, that one you could never forget. Her bright blue eyes, as cold as an iron sea, are staring at you.
Even if she hides her thoughts behind those illusionary shields, her body betrays her. You can see her shivering.
Is she scared? It doesn’t matter; she is the one. Your special one, the one you ran for.

She spits: “How does it feel? How does it feel to be such a meaningless, hateful person like you are? It's such a shame. Such a shame you're still alive…”

The story will have a significant impact on your gaming experience.
The demo is just an introduction, and it is intentionally vague. The game relies heavily on visual metaphors.

 

Rewards

As you noticed, if you decide to get a perk, you will get all the previous perk's item as describe in this graphic :

About the shipping dates: You can receive the items earlier than the estimated dates.
As I want you to receive the items before the indicated dates, I have shifted them.

**[For all perks with the "Create a puzzle !" item]**
I want you to finish the game first. That way, you will already have learned all the mechanisms and how they work.
Once you have finished it, you will be able to design a puzzle. I will need the shape of the puzzle and its solution. You and I will stay in contact as we perfect the details.
After that, I will take care of the rest and your puzzle will be enjoyed by everyone thanks to a free update.
Basically, a single update will contain all of the puzzles made by however many backers pledged at a high enough tier.
So, if 30 people will get this reward, I will release an update with a new playable world that contains the 30 new puzzles made by you. This world will become unlocked once the player finished the game.
I'm so hyped by this, you can't even imagine ^^

If you like this project and you can't back me, that's okay !
You can still help me by sharing this Indiegogo page with your friends and family.
You can also set this project as Favorite and Follow me on steam :

Here is my Steam page.

You can let your friends and family know this project exists or tell it to the whole world on Twitter and Facebook.

The birth of HEARTBEAT

I realized one day, I had a message to share. I wanted to tell it to the world but I didn't know how to do it, so I kept it in the back of my head.
Later, I played Braid, Limbo, Super Meat Boy, World of Goo and many other platformers. These games made me realize that a big team was not essential to make a good video game.
If some people were able to do it, maybe I could do it too.
So I've decided to spread my message through this game.

I have never made a video game before. Heartbeat is my first project ever.

It took me 4 years to learn how to create a game with unique gameplay and original mechanisms because I wanted something new. I wanted to come up with my own physics engine, to invent all the puzzles.

And VOILA, the game was done

I am not comfortable with drawing, so the game was not aesthetically pleasing, but the atmosphere was here, and the game was entirely playable.
I shared the alpha version of the game to my friends and family and I received only positive feedback, but hey : Can you trust people who love you? What if they just don't want to hurt you?

I wasn't sure about their feedback until the moment when few of them asked to take part in the project.

All the graphics have been handmade by Allison Lefebure, who spent endless hours on this project. I thank her for all of her hard work and dedication.

Today, I need you to achieve this final stretch.
With this money, I will be able to hire multiple professional 2D graphists, a professional 2D animator, a music composer and a sound designer.

If we reach our goal, we should be able to release Heartbeat in 6 months. BUT If we don't reach the goal, we will delay the release of the game for many months.

The Funding


*The fees range from 5% to 10%
*The Backers rewards might vary from 4% to 9%

Graphic explanation :
Most of the work that remains to be done is at the level of the graphics and the general atmosphere.
I want to add more visual details, like in the backgrounds (it is pretty static for now), I want to improve animations, cinematics and visual effects. I also want to improve the visual quality of the world design etc.
There is a lot of work to do on Sound Effects and Musics.
That's why 60% of the funding will go toward these tasks.
And for that, I would like to hire 3 Graphists, a 2D Animator and a Music Composer / Sound Designer.

As far as coding goes, most of the work left to do is about scripting bosses and special events, which isn’t a big deal.

With your help, I will be able to release Heartbeat in 6 months.

"Hi !"


Thank you so much for reading, I  hope you will enjoy this project and support me.

Special Thanks to:
Caroline Dentrebecq and Jacob Hennigan who helped me for the translation ! <3
Alexandre Farat, he made the song for the Trailer ! <3

story:
A top-down, open world survival game that will take you to a post-apocalyptic world, where you are going to encounter many different zombies and wildlife. Gather, mine, scavenge for resources and build a self-sustaining base with defenses to fend off the incoming zombie hordes. Craft or find weapons, armor, medicine and much more.

Planned platform: PC (Steam)

Early access planned for 2018 Q3

Backers on IndieGoGo will get the game key 1 week before the official release date!

You wake up in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by bloodthirsty zombies that are after you around the clock. They can smell you from the distance, hear every step you take if you are not careful and make you their one and only target once they spot you. While living in hiding or fighting for your life, you also have to attend your basic human needs. It would be a shame if you perished of starvation or cold. Use your survival skills, hunt animals, make and set traps and build a self-sustaining base with a great defense! Enter the world of Zombie Watch – be aware of your surroundings and keep a good watch!

WHAT IS NEW

Merchants Town 

Day and Night Cycle

 

  • Breathtaking graphics

  • Inventory system

  • Build a base

  • Zombie hordes and wildlife

  • Food and water system

  • Open world - Large realistic open-world landscape

  • Craft your own weapons and armor. Cook, brew potions, scavenge, gather herbs, grow your own garden, mine ore, chop down trees and much more to come.

  • Explore the surroundings of the living, breathtaking world and gather food and items. Everything can come in handy.

  • Hunt animals for food and leather, bones, and fat... Build and set traps. 

 

 

We will have a large variety of weapons e.g. pistols, assault rifles, shotguns, sniper rifles, crossbow, bow, swords, axes, shields, knives and much more. All of these items can be found or crafted at your crafting stations. You will be able to craft or find ammo.

 

Chop down trees and carry logs to your base, mine and refine different kinds of ore or metal. Scavenge for provisions or grow your own food. Create a base with a great defense you can be proud of. 

 

Zombies will attack your base in hordes repeatedly in waves. You can bunker down or fight the enemy directly. 

 

We have been developing Zombie Watch for Android and iOS devices from the year 2016! It has had a great response and more than 4 million downloads altogether. A lot of our players have asked if Zombie Watch will be available for PC in the future and we always thought it was a great idea. Creating the world of Zombie Watch has always been fun and we are excited for what´s to come. Help us achieve our goal and add an amazing game to Steam Community!

 

Regular people with a passion for gaming. But there is nothing regular about Nebula X Games. It is a place where we create new exciting worlds, make eye-popping characters come alive and prepare mind-blowing obstacles for them to overcome and interesting enemies to defeat. A place where we feel like home. A place where we can let our imagination run wild.

Thank you,

ZW team

story:
What is Dynasty Owner?

My name is Paul and I have had a dream of owning a sports franchise since 2003…and came weeks away from achieving this dream back in 2008. But alas, the deal fell through.

I know I’m not the only one with this burning desire. Us sports fans love to imagine what it would be like to own and run a franchise. When we’re watching the front office of our favorite team make decisions, we think we can draft better, make better trades, create better stadiums and atmospheres for the fans, etc. etc., but I digress.

Because of our passion, fantasy football has continued to grow in popularity to fill the desire of us sports nuts!

We’ve seen so many variations of fantasy sports in recent years. First, there were weekly games, the staple of fantasy sports. Then came daily games, which took fantasy sports to a whole new level. 

However, I felt like there were several key things missing from fantasy football… And that’s how Dynasty Owner was born, out of a desire to create the ultimate dream for all sports and business fans. 

Dynasty Owner combines dynasty fantasy football leagues (maintaining your team year after year) with actual NFL player salaries! No longer are you just trading players for players. You can now trade players for other players, draft picks, or Dynasty Dollars, our own virtual currency (no, it is not crypto).

It’s ownership and the front office meeting weekly fantasy sports to create the best long-term strategy esports game out there.  Don’t just play fantasy sports...own it.

Here’s how Dynasty Owner is different.

It is the first ownership/general manager dynasty game to use actual salary cap rules and contracts.  In other salary cap leagues, salaries are determined by player performance, but we believe that takes away the strategy involved with having salaries. We believe in the strategy of picking good contracts and value players, not just expensive performers. We do this by combining real-life salaries with fantasy sports.

Everyone complains about how dumb their local sports team owner and general manager are...well, now is your chance to prove how good you are.  This is as real as it gets without owning an actual team.

This game is about finding value and understanding the true player value to your team and to the league.

You can finally showcase your strategy skills and show your friends that it’s not just about picking the best players and getting a lucky draft pick here or there.

It’s about so much more. 

It’s about using the constraints of salary caps and contracts to build a long-term dynasty. It’s about maneuvering the trade and draft processes to create the best team at the best value.

Dynasty Owner is here to fill a void in fantasy sports. Be your own owner, own your own game.

 

How can you help and what will you get for helping?

We are looking to raise $500,000 to get this game thru two years development as well as gaining the user base we need to sustain this game long term.  This will include, but not be limited to, software development for multiple sports, other in-game features, stats and live API feed from the actual professional games, and marketing to get our fan base up.

None of this money will go to the founders’ pockets.  We already have other ways of making a living and 100% of this money will go to making this game bigger and better.  100% of it.

If this sounds like an amazing game and you want to be a part of contributing financially to get Dynasty Owner off the ground, then we want to offer you some great perks and amazing gifts.

Once our game is completed and in its second season, each team will be $99 per year, plus in-game operating costs for your term through Dynasty Dollars (Estimate of $20 - 60 average per team per year).

We have 5 ways that you can contribute to the development of Dynasty Owner, all of them will involve you receiving a free team.

 

Dynasty Owner Fan $99

Receive 1 Dynasty Owner Team at a discounted rate.

Normally $99 per season, you will receive 1 Team for 5 seasons at a low price of $99.($500 Value)

That's 4 seasons for FREE...and as a bonus you will also receive 25 MM dynasty Dollars ($25 Value) to use inside the game!

 

Make the Fantasy Football Fan Happy $250

1 Free Team for LIFE and some great swag - Dynasty Owner Hat & Shirt

$25 million in Dynasty Dollars

*Even though it says FREE Team for 5yrs on the PERK - we will give you a FREE team for LIFE if you get this package for $250

 

Make the Fantasy Football Fan Even Happier - $500

1 FREE Team for LIFE and more great swag  - Dynasty Owner Hat, Shirt, and a Real Dynasty Owner YETI

$50 million in Dynasty Dollars

*Yeti will be laser engraved and may vary from the one pictured

 

Make the Sports Nut Happy - $1000

1 Free Dynasty Owner Team for a Lifetime and even better swag - Dynasty Owner Hat, Shirt, a Real Dynasty Owner YETI, and 2 Monday Night Football tickets to any game of your choice on the 2019 or 2020 NFL schedule (*up to $200 value)

$100 million in Dynasty Dollars

*Yeti will be laser engraved and may vary from the one pictured

 

Make your Wife Happy - $5000

1 Free Dynasty Owner Team for a Lifetime and even better swag  - Dynasty Owner Hat, Shirt, a Real Dynasty Owner YETI, and 2 Monday Night Football tickets to any game of your choice on the 2019 or 2020 NFL schedule (*up to $200 value)

$500 million in Dynasty Dollars

Plus! An amazing week vacation for 8 people at Casa De Sofia (https://www.luxuryzlo.com/homes)! ($8,000 Value – exclusions apply – does not include travel, transportation around town, food, alcohol, excursions, etc. Only includes the rental of the property for the week plus certain staff)

 https://www.luxuryzlo.com/homes

  • Sleeps up to 8 guests
  • 4 king suites with balconies
  • 4 full & 1 half bathroom
  • Infinity pool with suntanning corner
  • In-house chef and cleaner dedicated to you and your guests from 8 AM until after dinner
  • Private gated community overlooking the water

*Yeti will be laser engraved and may vary from the one pictured

 

Even if we don’t raise the entire $500,000, all gifts will still be given to those who did contribute, and the money will still be used to fund the game in the same fashion as above.   

 

 

Your contribution will make a difference!

Your contribution will make a huge difference by helping Dynasty Owner stay independent from investors. Our goal is to build a platform for people who love to play the game. When investors get to be too big of a portion of the company, selling and making profit is the #1 driver…we want to make a great game while making a profit, even if that means less profit. And we don’t want to be forced to sacrifice on quality to simply get a good sale price.

We want to be able to continue to innovate and grow into baseball, basketball, and other sports. Your contribution means that Dynasty Owner can stay 100% focused on delivering the best user experience for the true fans.

The Challenges we face...

Online games are a high-risk proposition.  There are a lot of failures in the world of technology and many people create games in order to see what sticks.  The fortunate part is our cost structure allows us to have a break-even point much lower than most as we employ local developers who are much more cost-effective than typical Silicon Valley tech firms. 

Even with that, however, this is an unproven method of fantasy sports and we are paving the way to a new game.  It is exciting but the market size is very small.  All fantasy sports players total 60 million people in the U.S. according to the Fantasy Sports & Gaming Association, and we believe that our market is 2-3% of that (1.2MM to 1.8MM).  Since our customer can’t be found easily in the masses, we can't advertise to the masses. Our advertising costs are, therefore, much higher than other fantasy sports games.  In addition, our game does not have cash payouts, which is typical in fantasy sports; this will hinder our ability to get users.

Lastly, gaming laws are changing monthly.  We are not a gambling site, but the government and laws and lobbyists have tried to include fantasy sports, whether there is gambling or not, to be included in those laws. This increases our legal research and compliance costs.

We have had a hard time accepting credit card transactions due to our small size and being in fantasy sports even though we are not using any money to pay out as prize money.  We are working on this continually and even though we are working and close to getting credit card transactions, we don't know how laws will change or how banks will perceive our game and blindly block us from accepting credit cards.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a financial position to help. However, if this game sounds fun, you can help us by getting the word out by calling and texting your friends and family. Share this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter and Instagram pages.  You can also go to our website www.dynastyowner.com and sign up for our BETA and you will get a discounted entry fee for the first year and can help provide a great experience for everyone.
