story:
14 Octobre 1066,

Une Uchronie dans les cieux 

Guillaume le Conquérant se prépare à affronter les Anglo-saxons à la bataille d'Hastings. S'il remporte cette victoire, il prendra le contrôle d'une partie de l'Angleterre.

De l'autre côté de la manche en plein cœur de son duché de Normandie, une comète file dans la nuit, s'apprêtant à s'abattre sur le village de l'Aigle.

La chute de cet objet céleste sur l'église Saint Martin va engendrer une série d’événements qui vont bouleverser le cours de l'histoire tel que nous la connaissons et déclencher une terrible lutte de pouvoir pour contrôler "La Porte des Fauconniers".

Vous êtes un Fauconnier à la tête de sa compagnie, un élu de la comète, prit dans le déchainement d'une guerre qui va ravager la région.

Rejoindrez-vous le camp de l'Histoire ou celui de son changement ? 

 

Voyagez en Normandie médiévale !

La carte de campagne sur laquelle vous déplacerez votre compagnie se déroulera dans une Normandie médiévale fictive du XIème siècle.

Vous pourrez y rencontrer des personnalités importantes de cette période et vous confronter ou vous allier aux seigneurs qui ont marqué l'histoire de la région. 

La composition et la fidélité historique du jeu seront réalisées en collaboration étroite avec notre partenaire youtubeur grand passionné du sujet : D-mystif 

Pour le Roi ou pour le Duché ? 

Les événements qui perturbent la région sont en train de rebattre les cartes géopolitiques. 
En tant que chef d'une compagnie de soldats, vous pourrez prendre part à des affrontements entre duché et roi en choisissant votre camp pour le contrôle ou la destruction de la Porte des Fauconniers :

  • Le duché de Normandie de Guillaume le Conquérant 
  • L'armée des comtés d'Anjou, du Maine, de Touraine et de Blois regroupée par le Roi Philippe Ier
  • Le clergé et ses mercenaires soutenus par le Pape Alexandre II
  • Un ordre naissant et fanatisé qui voue un culte à la Comète commandé par le premier des Fauconniers

L'Histoire affronte le Fantastique  

Au-delà des enjeux politiques, la comète pourrait bien avoir altéré la région de façon importante sans que cela ne se fasse sentir immédiatement... Une lutte encore plus profonde et dangereuse que le simple contrôle de la Porte des Fauconniers et de la région Normande s'apprête à se jouer !

Le Fantastique interviendra avec progressivité et ne sera pas omniprésent dans LPDF, à la manière de l'univers de Game Of Thrones. Il sera notamment pour nous un outil d'intégration et de rationalisation de certaines mécaniques de confort du joueur comme la vue stratégie ou la vue TPS elle-même. 

Un artisanat intelligent

La production de ressources dans LPDF se concentrera sur 4 matières : bois, métaux, rations, argent. Ils couvriront l'ensemble des besoins de votre armée. 

Pour exploiter ces ressources, votre troupe sera constamment talonnée sur la carte de campagne par un aéropage d'artisans, d'ouvriers, de fermiers et autres non-combattants qui s'occuperont des tâches courantes. 

Selon leur niveau et leur spécialisation, ils récolteront automatiquement de la nourriture dans les lieux environnant votre campement, produiront votre équipement et celui de vos hommes, et récolteront les ressources pendant vos haltes sur les points de récolte correspondants (forêts, champs, mines...). Ils viendront aussi compléter vos revenus en vendant vos surplus sur les places des villages et villes quand vous les traverserez. 

Une Narration à la hauteur de l'Histoire

La majorité des interactions hors combat s'effectueront via des menus textuels, directement sur la carte de campagne. Vous n'aurez pas à supporter d'interminables allers-retours entre différents interlocuteurs d'une même ville. Le cas échéant, vous pourrez résoudre une partie de vos échanges en donnant des instructions à vos conseillers qui se chargeront des basses besognes. 

Nous apporterons un soin particulier à la qualité de l'écriture et de la narration. C'est notamment Planet Wargame qui nous prêtera sa voix et sa plume pour les quêtes les plus importantes de l'aventure. 

 

Les batailles, inspirées de Mount&Blade, se dérouleront en temps réel sur un terrain qui correspondra à votre emplacement sur la carte de campagne. De la forêt D'Ecouves jusque dans les plaines du Pays d'Auge, vous lutterez contre vos ennemis dans des environnements réalistes !

LPDF vous plongera dans des affrontements impliquant plusieurs centaines de guerriers pour les combats les plus importants de l'aventure.

60 soldats à personnaliser !

De son recrutement à sa formation, chaque groupe d'unité évoluera au fil du temps et de vos rencontres. Les unités seront de types différents selon que vous les recrutiez dans une ville ou un village (milice rurale et communale), ou que vous louiez directement des mercenaires.

Vous pourrez recruter jusqu'à 3 groupes de 20 combattants afin de former votre compagnie de 60 hommes selon le style de gameplay qui vous correspond le mieux. Libre à vous de composer cette compagnie de façon homogène en vous spécialisant dans un type d'arme, ou de créer une formation polyvalente utilisant plusieurs armes différentes. 

Des possibilités infinies 

Chacun de vos 3 groupes de combattants possédera son propre système d'expérience et de compétences. L'arbre des compétences offre des branches linéaires qui accorderont d'énormes bonus mais exigeront de suivre un chemin précis, ou vous laissera prendre différents nœuds de votre choix avec des effets moins intéressants mais plus nombreux. 

Vous bénéficiez par conséquent d'un nombre significatif de possibilités qui pourront transformer vos paysans désorganisés en soldats robustes et rompus à utiliser des formations dévastatrices. 

 Personnalisez les héros à vos côtés  

Vous ne serez pas seul pour commander vos hommes sur le champ de bataille ! Trois hommes d'armes (des Sergents) vous épauleront sur les missions qui ne requièrent pas toute une armée.

Certains Sergents seront des personnages historiques possédant une quête secondaire qui conditionnera leur déblocage, comme les descendants de la lignée de Robert Guiscard qui rentreront de Sicile pour protéger leur région d'origine. 

En complément, chaque groupe de 20 soldats possède un porte bannière et un joueur de corne qui vous aideront à distinguer vos hommes dans la mêlée et à transférer vos ordres. Dans le mode de difficulté le plus élevé, l'UI sera limitée et ils seront vos seuls points de référence pour commander ! 

Des Mécaniques de combat réalistes 

 Escrime directionnelle  

Pour notre système de combat, nous restons soucieux de l'historicité de la gestuelle des affrontements et du respect de la martialité de l'époque. 

C'est pourquoi nous collaborerons avec la chaîne Entrer en lice pour produire nos animations. Ces pratiquants d'AMHE sont des plus compétents à nos yeux pour certifier du réalisme de nos animations de combat ! 

LPDF utilise une système de combat directionnel pour les frappes, avec arme et bouclier, et les parades. Un système de hitbox non conditionné par la parade permettra de frapper et de se protéger en même temps, et vous ne pourrez pas passer au travers de l'arme ou du bouclier de votre adversaire tant qu'il les tient en main. Dans la même idée, les lances dressées dévieront les flèches et retiendront les ennemis.



 Protection  

Les pièces d'armures dans LPDF ne se contenteront pas de réduire les dégâts que vous subirez. Si elles sont suffisamment épaisses elles les bloqueront.

Conformément aux usages de l'époque, vous devrez revêtir un dessous et un dessus d'armure pour bénéficier d'une protection complète. 

Le jeu possède un système de dégâts qui distingue les frappes tranchantes, contondantes et perforantes avec des propriétés différentes en fonction des trois catégories de matériaux : Tissu, Matelassé, Maille / Lamellaire. 



 Système de Santé/Conscience/Endurance 

LPDF possède un système de santé qui cherche à restituer la complexité du port d'une armure sur un champ de bataille durant des périodes de combats prolongées sans pour autant que le réalisme n'interfère trop avec les mécaniques de jeu. Nous avons conçu un système croisé de santé, conscience et endurance qui prendra en compte votre état de fatigue général et le répercutera sur votre capacité à vous battre efficacement. 

Chaque partie du corps possède sa propre hitbox et ses propres points de vies. Perdre un bras vous coûtera l'usage de l'équipement correspondant. Cependant, tant que votre thorax et votre tête sont intactes, vous pourrez toujours vous enfuir ou continuer à vous battre avec ce que vous porterez dans l'autre main. Enfin, si vos jambes ont survécu ! 

Une approche tactique des combats 

Chaque groupe de combattants utilisent des formations qui lui sont propres. 
Les épéistes seront des spécialistes de la formation en triangle  visant à briser facilement les murs de boucliers adverses en utilisant la concentration de leur masse en un point donné. 
Les lanciers quant à eux préféreront s'ancrer sur plusieurs rangs compacts en présentant un mur de lances  pour arrêter les charges de vos ennemis en utilisant l'empalement. 

Les Formations jouent un rôle clé dans LPDF. Elles possèdent des bonus/malus relatifs à l'unité qui les emploient et à la situation. Une unité dans la bonne formation repoussera des adversaires plus forts ou en surnombre s'ils sont désorganisés ou n'en suivent pas une eux-mêmes. 

De la Charge à la levée de boucliers 

Les capacités des unités se distingueront entre des aptitudes passives (santé bonus, endurance améliorée...) et des capacités actives qui seront déclenchées pendant la bataille. 

Les charges  sont une des capacités les plus classiques et communes de LPDF. Elles permettent de lancer l'unité (à pleine vitesse ou au pas chassé) vers l'ennemi.

"Ouvrez les rangs" sert, par exemple, à repousser les adversaires autour de vous afin de regagner de l'espace et de briser l'intensité de leur attaque tout en obtenant un bonus défensif.

Du Fantassin au Chevalier

L'infanterie et la Cavalerie formeront les deux corps d'unités de mêlée de LPDF :

- La cavalerie se concentrera particulièrement sur sa capacité à lancer des charges irrésistibles en évitant soigneusement un mur de lances ancrées dans le sol. 
- L'infanterie occupera le terrain par la masse, l'utilisation de ses formations et une progression méthodique.

Les archers auront un fonctionnement différent des unités classiques. Une fois débloqués et recrutés, ils vous accompagneront en bataille comme une unité de support dont vous devrez déclencher les tirs "hors carte" ou ordonner l'installation prolongée sur une position fixe où ils planteront leurs flèches dans le sol afin de tirer plus rapidement.

 

Un gestionnaire tactique innovant 

Les compétences de votre personnage seront principalement utilitaires. Les Fauconniers ne sont pas des super-héros, vous ne pourrez pas rivaliser avec une armée à vous seul même si vous serez bien plus fort que le combattant moyen.

La vue du Fauconnier  sera votre principale compétence utilitaire. Elle vous permettra d'obtenir une vue tactique instantanée afin d'optimiser le placement de vos troupes en quelques clics :

Vous posséderez un large choix de compétences allant du simple bonus/malus de zone en passant par des enchaînements de frappes spéciales.

A l'image de celui de vos unités, votre arbre des compétences (dont les Sergents posséderont une variante) vous poussera à faire des choix : se spécialiser dans une compétence ou en débloquer plusieurs, améliorer une large gamme de caractéristiques bonus ou se spécialiser dans une seule catégorie de bonus... 

 

TROP AMBITIEUX POUR UN PETIT STUDIO ? 
SANS VOTRE AIDE : OUI ! 

LPDF est pensé dans sa structure pour nous simplifier le travail autant que possible sur les aspects subsidiaires de son développement. C'est l'une des raisons du choix d'Unity (2019.4.1f1 LTS) pour sa modularité. Le moteur est déjà prêt et nous n'avons qu'à assembler les éléments de notre jeu. 

Le choix de la Normandie au XIème siècle est aussi lié à cette volonté de penser LPDF comme un premier projet accessible pour une petite équipe ; la topographie et l'homogénéité culturelle de la zone faciliteront grandement notre travail de modélisation des terrains et des équipements. 

L'asset store déborde de modèles conformes à l'historicité que nous recherchons pour compléter nos propres modélisations.

 

Palier 1 : 55.000 € 

Si nous atteignons cette somme vous pourrez commencer à tester LPDF dès sa première année. 

Nous veillerons à mettre l'alpha en ligne sur steam dans des bonnes conditions de jouabilité et dans des délais raisonnables : Juillet/Août 2021 pour la pré-alpha fermée et Octobre/Novembre 2021 pour l'alpha fermée, toutes deux réservées aux backers.

Dans un souci de proximité et d'exclusivité avec notre public Francophone, l'ouverture au marché international ne débutera qu'à la sortie de la Bêta. 

Regrouper des talents et des passionnés pour assembler un jeu de qualité :

Nos partenaires ont été sélectionnés pour la passion qu'ils mettent dans leur domaine de prédilection : Entrer en lice, D-mystif, Planet Wargame et Rêves D'Acier collaboreront avec nous sur le long terme, chacun dans leur spécialité :

  • Entrer en Lice est une chaîne spécialisée dans la martialité historique; "l'AMHE". Ils nous fourniront les animations précises de nos personnages que nous reproduiront dans le jeu. 
  • D-Mystif est un passionné d'histoire qui sera notre consultant dans le domaine de la fidélité historique. Il nous aidera aussi à créer une uchronie aussi plausible et immersive que possible.
  • Planet Wargame peut sembler un peu éloigné de l'univers que dépeint LPDF, mais sa diction et son écriture en feront un narrateur exceptionnel pour notre jeu. Sa voix et ses textes vous accompagneront tout au long de l'aventure.
  • Rêves D'Acier se chargera de réaliser les "goodies" de notre crownfunding. Afin de rester aussi fidèle que possible à l'Histoire et à notre patrimoine, nous nous sommes naturellement tournés vers de véritables artisans médiévaux. Nous nous inspirerons aussi de leur travail pour nos modèles 3D. 

Si nous dépassons ce palier, nous débloquerons des goodies bonus pour améliorer vos packs... Nous avons des vraies épées LPDF en réserve :) 

 

Palier 2 : 110.000 €

Nous gagnons significativement en autonomie sur le long terme et nous pourrons renforcer l'équipe, ce qui nous permettra d'ajouter encore plus de contenu : 
- Amélioration des quêtes en temps réel que vous effectuerez en compagnie de vos Sergents et qui différeront des mécaniques du mode bataille 
- Mise en place du mode arène en 1 contre 1 pour confronter vos troupes à celles de vos amis
- Mise en place d'un système de bannière entièrement personnalisable en complément des bannières du jeu déjà prévues à l'image des villes de la région
- Mise en place de la caméra cinématique qui facilitera le travail de montage des amoureux des "machinimas" afin de capturer vos batailles les plus intenses et de briller sur Youtube ou de streamer vos meilleurs moments. 
- Ajout d'une quête autour d'une célèbre corne de l'Histoire de France qui pourra être équipée sur l'un de vos porteurs de corne 

Chacun des ajouts suivants seront soumis au vote des backers pour en choisir le contenu :
- Choix du groupe de musique médiévale qui réalisera la BO du jeu parmi une sélection 
- Choix d'un lieu historique supplémentaire à implémenter avec sa propre série de quêtes
- Choix d'une faction mineure supplémentaire : Duché de Bretagne, Comté de Flandre, Anglo-saxons ou Danois/Vikings 
- Choix de thématique d'une quête autour d'un personnage célèbre de l'époque parmi une sélection
- Choix de thématique d'un set d'équipement complet rattaché à une quête parmi une sélection

 

Palier 3 : 151.000 € et plus

Le développement est garanti pour au moins deux ans ! A ce stade, c'est surtout du temps que nous gagnerons en renforçant encore l'équipe.

Nous ajouterons du contenu supplémentaire en plus des bonus du Palier 2, dont chacun des ajouts seront soumis au vote des backers pour en choisir le contenu : 
- Choix thématique d'une troupe étrangère mercenaire cohérente avec la période, 
- Choix thématique d'un set d'équipement rattaché à une quête, 
- Choix de localisation de quêtes se déroulant sur les côtes de la région,
- Choix de 3 personnages célèbres que vous pourrez recrutez en tant que Sergent supplémentaires parmi une sélection, 
- Choix d'une place célèbre supplémentaire à ajouter, rattachée à une série de quêtes que vous pourrez effectuer avec vos Sergents, 
- Choix de deux villes de la région pour lesquelles nous créeront des unités spéciales qui seront ajoutées au jeu avec chacune leur propre histoire et leur propre quête.

 

Merci à tous pour votre temps de lecture et merci d'avance à nos futurs backers !  
N'hésitez pas à consulter notre FAQ (lien ci-dessous)) si vous avez des questions. 
Une vidéo interview de notre producteur sera très bientôt mise en ligne et vous pourrez retrouver une présentation du projet LPDF chez nos partenaires youtube !
story_txt:
14 Octobre 1066, Une Uchronie dans les cieux Guillaume le Conquérant se prépare à affronter les Anglo-saxons à la bataille d'Hastings. S'il remporte cette victoire, il prendra le contrôle d'une partie de l'Angleterre.De l'autre côté de la manche en plein cœur de son duché de Normandie, une comète file dans la nuit, s'apprêtant à s'abattre sur le village de l'Aigle.La chute de cet objet céleste sur l'église Saint Martin va engendrer une série d’événements qui vont bouleverser le cours de l'histoire tel que nous la connaissons et déclencher une terrible lutte de pouvoir pour contrôler "La Porte des Fauconniers".Vous êtes un Fauconnier à la tête de sa compagnie, un élu de la comète, prit dans le déchainement d'une guerre qui va ravager la région. Rejoindrez-vous le camp de l'Histoire ou celui de son changement ?  Voyagez en Normandie médiévale !La carte de campagne sur laquelle vous déplacerez votre compagnie se déroulera dans une Normandie médiévale fictive du XIème siècle.Vous pourrez y rencontrer des personnalités importantes de cette période et vous confronter ou vous allier aux seigneurs qui ont marqué l'histoire de la région. La composition et la fidélité historique du jeu seront réalisées en collaboration étroite avec notre partenaire youtubeur grand passionné du sujet : D-mystif 
Pour le Roi ou pour le Duché ? Les événements qui perturbent la région sont en train de rebattre les cartes géopolitiques. En tant que chef d'une compagnie de soldats, vous pourrez prendre part à des affrontements entre duché et roi en choisissant votre camp pour le contrôle ou la destruction de la Porte des Fauconniers :
Le duché de Normandie de Guillaume le Conquérant 
L'armée des comtés d'Anjou, du Maine, de Touraine et de Blois regroupée par le Roi Philippe Ier
Le clergé et ses mercenaires soutenus par le Pape Alexandre II
Un ordre naissant et fanatisé qui voue un culte à la Comète commandé par le premier des Fauconniers
L'Histoire affronte le Fantastique  Au-delà des enjeux politiques, la comète pourrait bien avoir altéré la région de façon importante sans que cela ne se fasse sentir immédiatement... Une lutte encore plus profonde et dangereuse que le simple contrôle de la Porte des Fauconniers et de la région Normande s'apprête à se jouer !Le Fantastique interviendra avec progressivité et ne sera pas omniprésent dans LPDF, à la manière de l'univers de Game Of Thrones. Il sera notamment pour nous un outil d'intégration et de rationalisation de certaines mécaniques de confort du joueur comme la vue stratégie ou la vue TPS elle-même. Un artisanat intelligentLa production de ressources dans LPDF se concentrera sur 4 matières : bois, métaux, rations, argent. Ils couvriront l'ensemble des besoins de votre armée. Pour exploiter ces ressources, votre troupe sera constamment talonnée sur la carte de campagne par un aéropage d'artisans, d'ouvriers, de fermiers et autres non-combattants qui s'occuperont des tâches courantes. Selon leur niveau et leur spécialisation, ils récolteront automatiquement de la nourriture dans les lieux environnant votre campement, produiront votre équipement et celui de vos hommes, et récolteront les ressources pendant vos haltes sur les points de récolte correspondants (forêts, champs, mines...). Ils viendront aussi compléter vos revenus en vendant vos surplus sur les places des villages et villes quand vous les traverserez. Une Narration à la hauteur de l'HistoireLa majorité des interactions hors combat s'effectueront via des menus textuels, directement sur la carte de campagne. Vous n'aurez pas à supporter d'interminables allers-retours entre différents interlocuteurs d'une même ville. Le cas échéant, vous pourrez résoudre une partie de vos échanges en donnant des instructions à vos conseillers qui se chargeront des basses besognes. Nous apporterons un soin particulier à la qualité de l'écriture et de la narration. C'est notamment Planet Wargame qui nous prêtera sa voix et sa plume pour les quêtes les plus importantes de l'aventure.  Les batailles, inspirées de Mount&Blade, se dérouleront en temps réel sur un terrain qui correspondra à votre emplacement sur la carte de campagne. De la forêt D'Ecouves jusque dans les plaines du Pays d'Auge, vous lutterez contre vos ennemis dans des environnements réalistes !LPDF vous plongera dans des affrontements impliquant plusieurs centaines de guerriers pour les combats les plus importants de l'aventure.60 soldats à personnaliser !De son recrutement à sa formation, chaque groupe d'unité évoluera au fil du temps et de vos rencontres. Les unités seront de types différents selon que vous les recrutiez dans une ville ou un village (milice rurale et communale), ou que vous louiez directement des mercenaires.Vous pourrez recruter jusqu'à 3 groupes de 20 combattants afin de former votre compagnie de 60 hommes selon le style de gameplay qui vous correspond le mieux. Libre à vous de composer cette compagnie de façon homogène en vous spécialisant dans un type d'arme, ou de créer une formation polyvalente utilisant plusieurs armes différentes. Des possibilités infinies Chacun de vos 3 groupes de combattants possédera son propre système d'expérience et de compétences. L'arbre des compétences offre des branches linéaires qui accorderont d'énormes bonus mais exigeront de suivre un chemin précis, ou vous laissera prendre différents nœuds de votre choix avec des effets moins intéressants mais plus nombreux. Vous bénéficiez par conséquent d'un nombre significatif de possibilités qui pourront transformer vos paysans désorganisés en soldats robustes et rompus à utiliser des formations dévastatrices.  Personnalisez les héros à vos côtés  Vous ne serez pas seul pour commander vos hommes sur le champ de bataille ! Si nous dépassons ce palier, nous débloquerons des goodies bonus pour améliorer vos packs... Nous avons des vraies épées LPDF en réserve :)  Palier 2 : 110.000 €Nous gagnons significativement en autonomie sur le long terme et nous pourrons renforcer l'équipe, ce qui nous permettra d'ajouter encore plus de contenu : - Amélioration des quêtes en temps réel que vous effectuerez en compagnie de vos Sergents et qui différeront des mécaniques du mode bataille - Mise en place du mode arène en 1 contre 1 pour confronter vos troupes à celles de vos amis- Mise en place d'un système de bannière entièrement personnalisable en complément des bannières du jeu déjà prévues à l'image des villes de la région- Mise en place de la caméra cinématique qui facilitera le travail de montage des amoureux des "machinimas" afin de capturer vos batailles les plus intenses et de briller sur Youtube ou de streamer vos meilleurs moments. - Ajout d'une quête autour d'une célèbre corne de l'Histoire de France qui pourra être équipée sur l'un de vos porteurs de corne Chacun des ajouts suivants seront soumis au vote des backers pour en choisir le contenu :- Choix du groupe de musique médiévale qui réalisera la BO du jeu parmi une sélection - Choix d'un lieu historique supplémentaire à implémenter avec sa propre série de quêtes- Choix d'une faction mineure supplémentaire : Duché de Bretagne, Comté de Flandre, Anglo-saxons ou Danois/Vikings - Choix de thématique d'une quête autour d'un personnage célèbre de l'époque parmi une sélection- Choix de thématique d'un set d'équipement complet rattaché à une quête parmi une sélection Palier 3 : 151.000 € et plusLe développement est garanti pour au moins deux ans ! A ce stade, c'est surtout du temps que nous gagnerons en renforçant encore l'équipe.Nous ajouterons du contenu supplémentaire en plus des bonus du Palier 2, dont chacun des ajouts seront soumis au vote des backers pour en choisir le contenu : - Choix thématique d'une troupe étrangère mercenaire cohérente avec la période, - Choix thématique d'un set d'équipement rattaché à une quête, - Choix de localisation de quêtes se déroulant sur les côtes de la région,- Choix de 3 personnages célèbres que vous pourrez recrutez en tant que Sergent supplémentaires parmi une sélection, - Choix d'une place célèbre supplémentaire à ajouter, rattachée à une série de quêtes que vous pourrez effectuer avec vos Sergents, - Choix de deux villes de la région pour lesquelles nous créeront des unités spéciales qui seront ajoutées au jeu avec chacune leur propre histoire et leur propre quête. Merci à tous pour votre temps de lecture et merci d'avance à nos futurs backers !  N'hésitez pas à consulter notre FAQ (lien ci-dessous)) si vous avez des questions. Une vidéo interview de notre producteur sera très bientôt mise en ligne et vous pourrez retrouver une présentation du projet LPDF chez nos partenaires youtube !

story:
proudly presents:

- The Treasure King is designed for 2 up to 8 People

- Play in a cycle on a table with one Deck

- Over 100 different and unique cards

- Handpainted

- "The Walruses" will be the first part from a big Universe

- A game full of lovely Characters, Artifacts, Spells and Landscapes



Bring the Walruses to life - help us to make the dream real!

Thats only possible with your help!


                                       

The Boardgame, inspired by masterpieces like Magic the Gathering or Hearthstone, brings in a new Gameplay Mode, where all of your Friends can play together with one Carddeck against each other!


Based on the succes of the Campaign:

     *We can continue to finish the game!

     *Develop and improve the game with the community!


Status of the Game:

  • Game Design is written and finished
  • Promo Video finished A Personal Video is in the making
  • A lot testing games are to come
  • Around 80 cards are developed with strength and abilitys
  • Concepts to over 50 cards are done and some are complete finished
  • Developer is yet to find
  • Story behind the chieftains and the walruses is in work



Now lets come to the game:


Cardhand preview:


Each game represents a battle between chieftains, who employ unique characters, spells and artifacts to gain control of gold and treasures to be the king of all clans!


Beginning and ending the game:

Each player uses the same deck to play the game, a deck can be mixed with every "Treasure King" cards available; there is no maximum deck size.

There are two piles on the Battlefield; the basic card pile and the gold card pile. Each player draws from the same pile, each turn from both - so you draw 2 cards each turn.

In the middle of the table Players randomly choose a Landscape, who gives everyone the direction of the game and some battlefield additions. 

Like on the sketch:


Than Players decide who will start. Each Players draw 5 cards (maximum cards in hand: 9) from the basic card pile. 

Than everyone plays with follow Parts of a turn: (similar to MtG)

  • Beginner phase
  • First main phase
  • Combat phase: *Beginning of combat *Declare attackers *Declare blockers *Combat damage *End of combat
  • Ending phase
IMPORTANT changes to MtG, Hearthstone and other Cardgames: 
  • Players can only attack players in the direction of the Landscape, which can only be changed by the Landscape.
  • Players dont have a lifecounter and can´t die
  • Characters who attack Players can steal Treasure from the enemy Player for his own use, to activate his special abilities. (One attack means always 1 Gold from the Treasure chamber)
  • Gold for the Treasure chamber and Treasure Abilities are the main innovation compared to standard card games
  • So the Goal is to steal the enemy Treasue, make your Characters stronger (who have major Treasure abilities) and collect as many Gold possible for your own Trasure chamber
  • and we have badass walruses... and magic chickens.... 


A player wins the game and become the King by:

  •  collecting more than 10 gold in his Treasure - this Player calls himself out "Treasure King"
  • after that he must defend himself against every opponent in a final round, where everyone can attack the Treasue King
  • when the selfcalled "Treasure King" has at his next Beginner phase more than 10 gold he remain the Treasure King and wins the game.


Now spoiler some cards:

Artifacts: (and take a closer look to the awesome chicken)

Artifacts represent Objects who remain on the Battlefield. But unlike to Artifacts in other Cardgames - this Artifacts have health.

The Chickenbell scepter is the first superfun card we want to Spoiler. Summon a Character into a chicken, how cool is that?

                     

Now look a bit closer to the card:

  • Under the Name you will read the Card Type, that will be used to specify the card. 
  • The Card Gold Cost declare how much Treasure the Player must tap to bring it on the Battlefield.
  • New to other card games is the Artifact Health, which means that the card can be targeted by Sorcery Spells.
  • The Main Card Ability is the Main Skill from the Card who can always be used, compared to the Treasure Special Ability.
  • The Ability with the money bag always require Treasures to sacrifice; or some Treasures under the Character, to activate.

Characters:

Characters represent humanised creatures, who can attack enemy chieftains - steal Treasures to get access to the Special Treasure Ability.

Look at this big fat chieftain we got for you:

                      


The different to Artifacts is that he has a Strength Symbol on the right top corner.

This means his Attack and his Health. Fights a character another character with the same strenght, both die - otherwise the stronger survive and gets damage for this turn. 

Do you ever beeing attacked by a pack of crazy walrus boys? We dont think so!


Spells - Instant Sorcery:

There is only one kind of Spell - Instant Sorcerys.

They never enter the battlefield. Instead, they take effect and then are immediately put into their owner´s graveyard.

They also have 2 effects. The normal card effect and a special Treasure effect.


Or maybe summon a strong and smelly Walrus Beer for your characters?

                       


These are only 4 of over 100 cards in the walrus edition!





Goals and Stretched Goals:

5000€:  We complete the Drawings from all 100 Cards + Treasure Cards in the Walrus Edition and polish the Game Design. 

7000€: Special and exclusive Cards and Landscapes for everyone who supports our game. 

9000€: We add another 10 exclusive Goana Cards to you guys! Also more Landscapes and Walrus Cards.

12000€: Lets start the second Edition... with 100 or more Cards... 

20000€+: Let´s create a Universe with Goanas, Lizards, Dragons, Unicorns, Cows and... :) let´s dream about it!


Anyway, thank you guys for help! Together we can do this!


The Team:

The Team:

story:
Thank you for checking us out. We are Healwind Studios, a small team of experienced game developers who aim to create games that make you smile!

Welcome to the crowd funding campaign of Pushy Robo, a top-down 2D action maze puzzle game designed for iOS devices.  In this game you navigate a robot through a maze. Using the environment to your advantage, you push boxes down a corridor and crush all enemies that got caught in its path.  

At Healwind Studios, we are all huge fans of classic arcade games, and Pengo is definitely one of our favorite. We love it so much that we want to play it all the time, and there’s nothing more portable than our mobile devices. Unfortunately, there were no games on the iOS that gave us the same satisfaction we experienced in Pengo.

With this in mind we started creating Pushy Robo about half a year ago, so that gamers like us can enjoy some box sliding crushing time right in our hands, any time we want. We make sure Pushy Robo stays true to the core gameplay of Pengo while adding many new features into the game that we are sure you will love.


Making a game costs a lot of money, time and effort. While we are fully committed to make this game a reality, each of our team members is surviving on savings right now, and sadly they are running dangerously low.  The good news is that the game is about 85% completed at the moment, and with your help we can definitely live to see it release very soon.

We are at the most critical phase right now and desperately need your help in keeping us alive to polish the game to perfection!


   

             (Development build)

Pushy Robo is a top-down 2D maze puzzle action game designed for iOS devices.  In this game you navigate a robot through a maze. Using the environment to your advantage, you push boxes down a corridor and crush any enemies that got caught in its path. The core gameplay is inspired by the 80s classic arcade game “Pengo”, with many new and exciting features added. We want to honor the original Pengo and at the same time improving it with some ideas of our own. Our goal is to make the game more fun without forgetting what you love in Pengo. 

The goal in Pushy Robo is to eliminate all spawned enemies within a level. You can do this by:

  • Push a crate and smash your enemy to pieces.
  • Pull some Minority Report stunt and destroy the crate containing an enemy before it spawns.
  • Zap to stun an enemy and roll it over. 


  • Use the environment to your advantage. 


These power ups are available to help you out!

Speed: Improve your top speed while this power up is in effect 

Zapper: Recharge your zapper

Scoring Tips

  • Similar to Pengo, connect these in a horizontal or vertical line to score massive points!

  • Score more points by destroying multiple enemies with a single push

  • Destroying enemies by using walls and conveyor belts will yield more points

  • Collect and complete the set of letters “B O N U S” for massive bonus points

  • Perform better than the “Par time” to earn time bonus points


Robo, our hero

Personality: Fun loving, adventurous, and definitely cRaZy!

Crazy level: ★ ★ ★ ★ ★




Patroller

Personality: Love routines, it will ignore you long as you don’t get too close.

Dangerous level:  ★★★☆☆




Chaser

Personality: Curious and loves exploring. Easily fall in love with anything that moves, and it doesn't just give up.

Dangerous level: ★★★★☆




Digger

Personality: Often mistaken as shy, these guys love to hide underground and ambush unsuspected prey.

Dangerous level: ★★★★★


At launch, Pushy Robo will feature:

35 awesome levels

3 unique enemies

2 instant power ups

4 different directions Conveyor Belt

Support both left-handed and right-handed control

No IAP (In App Purchase) ever. Period. 

No annoying ads ever. Period.

We are grateful for any support that you commit to our cause. We hope that you are helping us because you love Pushy Robo as much as we do. Please note that all higher tiers will fetch all perks below it. For example, if you claim the $10 tier you will also receive rewards for the $5 and $1 tiers as well. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to leave a comment and I will get back to you as soon as I can.

Supporter $1

  • My personal thank you for your generosity via email
  • Digital copy of our Special Indiegogo Edition Pushy Robo Wallpaper
  • Your name under “I Made This” in game credits (Optional)
  • Your name in “Special Thanks to Our Indiegogo Contributors” section in our official website (Optional)

Est. Delivery: April 2015


Gamer $5

  • iOS version of the game when it is released
  • Plus all rewards from previous tier

Est. Delivery: April 2015


Pro Gamer $10

  • Digital Album featuring all Pushy Robo concept arts
  • Your name under “I’M PUSHY BOSS” in game credits  (Optional)
  • Plus all rewards from previous tiers

Est. Delivery: April 2015


Pushy Fans $20

  • A physical thank you card from us, autographed by the team.
  • A copy of the android version of the game, after stretch goal has been met. It will be delivered when it is finished.
  • Plus all rewards from previous tiers

Est. Delivery: April 2015


Executive Producer  $129 (SOLD OUT)

  • You get to name one of the enemy characters in the game (First come, first pick. Some restrictions apply*)
  • Your name under “Executive Producer” in game credits  (Optional)
  • Plus all rewards from previous tiers
Est. Delivery: April 2015


Official Sponsor  $5,000 (only 1 available)

  • You become the official sponsor of Pushy Robo. Your company or personal splash screen will be shown in our game. (Some restrictions apply*)
  • You get to give a nickname to Robo. Some restrictions apply as follow:
  • Design and create your own WORLD by using our in-house tool editor. (Some restrictions apply**)
  • A “HUGE” thank you to you in game credits
  • Plus all rewards from previous tiers

Est. Delivery: April 2015

*There are a few restrictions when it comes to naming these characters, they are as follow:

  • No nudity or profanity is allowed in all or any part of the image and/or text of this icon.
  • No discriminative/hate speech or graphic.
  • Healwind Studios Limited reserves the rights to deem if they are appropriate.


**There are a few restrictions when it comes to creating your own world:

  • Each level minimum size is limited to roughly 12x9 and maximum size limited to 25x25
  • Create up to 20 levels
  • You are required to sign an NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement)
  • Your world will be publish when all of your levels are completed and fine-tuned together with the development team

We strive to provide you with the best gaming experiences that we can offer. With extra funding, we can achieve these:

$7,500 50 levels We will pack in a total of 50 levels at launch.

$10,000 New power up! We will add a new power up. We will release an update containing this power up once we thoroughly test it.

$25,000 New Shooter Enemy! We will add a new enemy – Shooter.  We will release an update containing this new enemy in some of the existing levels once we thoroughly tested it.

$40,000 Android version! We will immediately begin to develop the Android version of Pushy Robo after iOS version released.

$50,000 Brave new world! We will create a new world featuring 30 new levels with new graphics. This update will become available once we thoroughly tested it.

Before we go on about our history, let me begin by quoting the company Interplay…

“BY GAMERS. FOR GAMERS”

That’s right! We are gamers well before we became developers. As gamers ourselves, we understand the frustration when the game developers ignore the voices of gamers. Many developers often feel that since they made the game, it belongs to them and as such they can do whatever they want with it. I am not a fan of that philosophy. I believe that the game belongs to all of us, both the developers and the community. As developers, it is our responsibility to listen to the community and improve the game.

We are Healwind Studios, a small indie game studio in Hong Kong founded in 2012 by four experienced PC/Mobile game developers with over 10 years in the game development industry. My name is Hillwins Lee, the founder of Healwind Studios and the game designer for Pushy Robo. I come from a PC game development and production background, if you are interest in finding out more, please check out this link at MobyGames.

Our team:

Hillwins Lee, Game Design. 13 years of game development experience in PC, mobile, web, social and mmo games.  

Kin Ma, Art. 14 years of PC, mobile, web, social and mmo game development experience.

Jackie Yau, Programming. 5 years of MMO/Mobile game development experience.

Rickie Kwong, Game Design. 4 years of game production and development experience.


Here are some of the games that we took part in development over the years:



We understand that there are a lot of crowd funding game projects never deliver what they promised to or take a very long time before it gets released. Unlike many of these projects, Pushy Robo is almost ready right now, what we need is your generous support to help us polish it to perfection. We are committed to release the game as soon as we can, unfortunately we may take a much longer time to complete it without your help. 

Your donations will:

  • Help us improve Pushy Robo sound effects
  • Help us improve Pushy Robo graphics
  • Help us pay our annual business expenses such as business registration fees, mail server, domain etc.
  • Help our staff to pay their rent
  • Keep electricity running in our home offices so that we can continue to work on Pushy Robo


Aside from donating, you can also help us out tremendously by spreading the word. Got some friends who like classic action games? Let them know we really can use some help right now. If you have any questions or suggestions, please kindly let us know in the comments section, we will view all of them and respond as soon as we can!

Once again, thank you very much for your time and interest in our campaign!


Find us on:
Facebook
twitter
website

A physical thank you card from us, autographed by the team.


A copy of the android version of the game, after stretch goal has been met. It will be delivered when it is finished.


Plus all rewards from previous tiers


Est. Delivery: April 2015

Executive Producer  $129 (SOLD OUT)



You get to name one of the enemy characters in the game (First come, first pick. Some restrictions apply*)


Your name under “Executive Producer” in game credits  (Optional)


Plus all rewards from previous tiers


Est. Delivery: April 2015

Official Sponsor  $5,000 (only 1 available)


You become the official sponsor of Pushy Robo. Your company or personal splash screen will be shown in our game. (Some restrictions apply*)


You get to give a nickname to Robo. Some restrictions apply as follow:

Design and create your own WORLD by using our in-house tool editor. (Some restrictions apply**)

A “HUGE” thank you to you in game credits


Plus all rewards from previous tiers



Est. Delivery: April 2015


*There are a few restrictions when it
comes to naming these characters, they are as follow:


No nudity or profanity is allowed in all or any part of the image and/or text of this icon.


No discriminative/hate speech or graphic.


Healwind Studios Limited reserves the rights to deem if they are appropriate.






**There are a few restrictions when it
comes to creating your own world:




Each level minimum size is limited to roughly 12x9 and maximum size limited
to 25x25


Create up to 20 levels


You are required to sign an NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement)

Your world will be publish when all of your levels are completed and fine-tuned together with the development team





We strive to provide you with the best gaming experiences that we can
offer. With extra funding, we can achieve these:
$7,500 50 levels We will pack in a total of 50 levels at launch.
$10,000 New power up! We will add a new power up. We will release an update containing this
power up once we thoroughly test it.
$25,000 New Shooter Enemy! We will add a new enemy – Shooter.  We will release an update containing this new
enemy in some of the existing levels once we thoroughly tested it.
$40,000 Android version! We will immediately begin to develop the Android version of Pushy Robo after iOS version released.
$50,000 Brave new world! We will create a new world featuring 30 new levels with new graphics. This
update will become available once we thoroughly tested it.

Before we go on about our history, let me begin by quoting
the company Interplay… 
“BY GAMERS. FOR GAMERS”
That’s right! We are gamers well before we became
developers. As gamers ourselves, we understand the frustration when the game developers
ignore the voices of gamers. Many developers often feel that since they made
the game, it belongs to them and as such they can do whatever they want with
it. I am not a fan of that philosophy. I believe that the game belongs to all
of us, both the developers and the community. As developers, it is our
responsibility to listen to the community and improve the game. 
We are Healwind Studios, a small indie game studio in Hong
Kong founded in 2012 by four experienced PC/Mobile game developers with over 10
years in the game development industry. My name is Hillwins Lee, the founder of
Healwind Studios and the game designer for Pushy
Robo. I come from a PC game development and production background, if you
are interest in finding out more, please check out this
link at MobyGames.
Our team:
Hillwins Lee, Game Design. 13 years of game
development experience in PC, mobile, web, social and mmo games.  
Kin Ma, Art. 14 years of PC, mobile, web, social
and mmo game development experience. 
Jackie Yau, Programming. 5 years of MMO/Mobile
game development experience.
Rickie Kwong, Game Design. 4 years of game production
and development experience.

Here are some of the games that we took part in development
over the years:




We understand that there are a lot of crowd funding game projects
never deliver what they promised to or take a very long time before it gets
released. Unlike many of these projects, Pushy
Robo is almost ready right now, what we need is your generous support to
help us polish it to perfection. We are committed to release the game as soon
as we can, unfortunately we may take a much longer time to complete it without
your help. 
Your donations will:



Help us improve Pushy Robo sound effects


Help us improve Pushy Robo graphics


Help us pay our annual business expenses such as
business registration fees, mail server, domain etc.


Help our staff to pay their rent


Keep electricity running in our home offices so that
we can continue to work on Pushy Robo










Aside from donating, you can also help us out tremendously
by spreading the word. Got some friends who like classic action games? Let them
know we really can use some help right now. If you have any questions or
suggestions, please kindly let us know in the comments section, we will view
all of them and respond as soon as we can!
Once again, thank you very much for your time and interest
in our campaign!


Find us on:

Facebook


twitter


website

story:
Crystallika will be available for pc, mac and linux. It will be released through the Steam platform and you can vote the game in Steam Greenlight 

(link available soon).

Graphic and layout of the game may will be better in the final version of the game, but the gameplay will be the same as you see in the video!

Crystallika is a pixel game which takes its name from the main quest of our hero: gather all the fragments of Crystallika!

The game contains a huge amount of different maps, quests and bosses.

There is a very huge class system which begins with the four start classes:

Each class has many skills, to unlock and try, buying them with the coins collected during the gameplay. 

Thanks to the drop the hero can find armors and potions which increase his power.

A wicked sorceress wants to take possession of the powerful Crystallika to conquer the whole world thanks to its enormous power. One day she steals the crystal and suddently, in the escape, the crystal crashes into pieces. The sorceress can take away with her only a piece of Crystallika, while the other fragments are now scattered in the universe. Our hero has the task to gather all the Crystallika's fragments, kill the sorceress and assemble the crystal again.

RainbowGames is composed by two people, a young couple from Germany. 

Toni is a young boy who has already developed different games for smartphones and flash games. Unfortunately he hasn't had so much fortune with his first projects, but this time he's doing his best to make his dream becoming true: develop games for his whole life as his main work. 

Vivi is a young woman who has the passion for graphics and she would pass the whole day in front her favourite graphic programs. She wishes to have a career in something she really likes to do.

story:
Was passiert, wenn das Geld erreicht ist?

Die Kampagne geht auf jeden Fall so weiter und die Coins gibt es natürlich weiterhin.

Neuer Nightcache "Jumanji"

Wenn euch unsere bisherigen Nachtcaches gefallen haben würden wir uns über eure Unterstützung sehr freuen. Wir werden auch für diesen Cache keine Mühen scheuen euch ein unvergessliches Nachtcache Erlebnis zu bereiten. Auch wenn wir bestimmt ab und an wieder kurz vorm verzweifeln seien werden weil wieder was nicht so klappt wie es soll. Mit viel Geduld werden wir aber auch solche Hürden meistern.

Was passiert mit meiner Spende?

Das gesamte Geld wird  zu 100% für den Cache eingesetzt. Wir wollen keinen Gewinn aus der Sache machen, sondern nur einen Teil die Kosten decken.

Bisherige Caches

Bisher gibt es 2 Nachtcaches von uns:

Unser Erstlingswerk

http://coord.info/GC549VV

Unser 2. Nachtcache

http://coord.info/GC5BB3K

Was habt ihr davon?

Ihr bekommt dafür in naher Zukunft einen liebevollen atemberaubenden Nachtcache an den ihr euch hoffentlich lange erinnert.

Als Dankeschön erhält jeder ab einer Unterstützung von 30€ für das Projekt, am Ende der Kampagne, einen Jumanji Geocoin geschenkt.

Der natürlich offiziell über Geocaching.com trackbar ist!

story:
**UPDATE**

On Friday the 8th of May the Conservatives were elected as a majority party in the UK. The UK press is broadly right-wing and sympathetic to David Cameron. Now, more than ever, we need a strong alternative media in Scotland that gives a platform to voices on the left and challenges the spin we'll be hit with every day.

That Latest Update on the Campaign is Below


The First Step

Back in 2011 I started a video production company with a few of my friends, which I've been running with them for the last four years. I've learnt in that time how to create interesting content, but I was always a behind-the-camera kind of person. Then the Scottish Independence Referendum came around, and everything changed.

Our Carnival of Democracy

Scotland is still in the middle of a democratic upheaval, where long standing traditions and expectations are disappearing. I started creating video 10 months ago as the referendum approached, covering news and stories that I felt weren't being explored in the mainstream press. Those videos were watched over 135,000 times.

And that’s only the beginning.

Scotland wanted a vibrant alternative media. Six months on from the referendum, and it’s still growing.


So now I'm leaving my company to start something new.

What Is Left:Scotland?

Left:Scotland will be an online channel covering left-wing and radical politics in Scotland. It will include at least one regular weekly show that is a continuation of my previous work, plus it’ll also become a resource for activists, creating content in collaboration with other groups across the country.

I'll be creating educational videos exploring political ideas, as well as providing useful information.

Ever wanted to know how to organise a demo in George Square? Or how to get a community campaign off the ground? Me too, and I intend to answer those questions in short series of videos for everyone. But I need your help to make that happen.

Where Does the Money Go?

Every penny raised helps me to build an online channel, for the public, funded by the public. That means:

  • Regularly scheduled programming
  • Interviews
  • A resources for activists
  • A spotlight on campaigns and community victories

Funding will allow me to create content full time for a solid six months. It also goes into necessary equipment and advertising to help spread the word.

Social media has become one of the most disruptive tools we’ve got to spread news and views that no-one else is covering. We are all connected, and we are changing the way we create and consume information. And I want you to be a part of it.

Perks?

Why yes, there are! Ranging from badges up to being a named sponsor, there are plenty of perks. Every penny helps, but no matter how much you donate you'll be invited to a launch night once funding has closed, where I'll be collecting for a local food bank.


What If You Raise More Than What You Are Asking For?

That would be amazing. And if that happened, it would mean more content, with more people involved.

story:
As two people who love to play games, our wish was to create a graphically amazing world in-which we could incorporate all the things we love to do.  The inception of Capsa was based on our desire to create virtual toys that are fun to play with, as well as activities that provide hours of entertainment, either alone or with all of our friends. At launch, the very basics of Capsa will include exploring a vast landscape, watching videos, listening to music, or chatting with friends. But the experience won’t end there. Our intention is to continually build upon this base with ever expanding maps, activities, and super cool toys!

Capsa is an open world, social game providing users with the opportunity to hang out in an absolutely breathtaking, and ever expanding environment. You can:

  • Decorate one, or more, of the numerous, beautiful homes using the wide assortment of furniture and decor available.
  • Enjoy streaming videos and music with all your friends, in personalized home theaters, at one of the many dance clubs, or various hangouts.
  • Host your own dedicated server or join official servers. Listen server support will be also available as a convenience for small player numbers.
  • Own* pets that you can interact and play with, customize their appearance, or even, if you would like, play as your pet!
  • Drive various fun vehicles including boats, helicopters, and go karts.
  • Explore an exotic and breathtakingly beautiful, south Pacific archipelago, to which the addition of equally amazing, yet diverse landscapes is planned for later development.

Capsa has absolutely no subscriptions or premium currency, as this does not coincide with our development model. This means that once you buy the game you can enjoy Capsa forever without the need to pay anything further if you don’t wish to. If you would prefer, you can even host your own private dedicated server and not rely on our free hosting.

We do, however, plan to offer optional season passes on an annual basis which will cover ongoing development costs and allow Capsa to provide users with vast amounts of diverse content over time. Some content, such as map expansions, will always be free. Some content, such as map expansions, will always be free. Likewise, certain basic season pass content like boats and go-karts, will be available to every user, regardless of whether they purchase the expansion pack or not (e.g.: a single boat and single go-kart will be available for everyone while those who purchase the expansion pack will receive numerous styles and models of each). We also intend to release smaller free and paid DLC packs more regularly that offer various new items, giving us the opportunity to provide content the community has requested.

*Cat planned to be available in season one pass, other pets will be added as development continues into future seasons.

Armed with passion, vision, and skills, we embrace challenges and are devoted to providing you with only the highest quality we can produce. We are working diligently to develop an experience that will deliver hours of enjoyment for you and your friends and which we can be truly proud of. 

However as motivated and enthusiastic as we are, we are only two individuals and do require outside assistance to ensure extended operating systems compatibility as well as support for all languages. Costs associated with this project are directly linked with providing the user with an experience that can be enjoyed on their chosen systems, using their hardware of choice, and in their native language. In order to provide everyone with the opportunity to do this, we really need your help. 

Your assistance will help ensure friends can play together, regardless of the operating system they own, be it Windows, Mac OS X, Linux or Steam OS!  Reaching our funding goals will allow us to meet our most important goal: making sure Capsa is straightforward, easy and fun to play for everyone!

Developing a game on the scale of Capsa and with the level of support we are determined to incorporate is a huge undertaking.  The inherent risks and associated challenges are hurdles that must be overcome to provide you and our other end users with something of true value, as nothing of any significance is ever easily obtained.

The largest concern we are faced with is enabling the client to run on different operating systems. While Unreal Engine 4, the game engine we use, does support these operating systems at least in some capacity, some of our gameplay features will not be so easily ported. This funding will enable us to access the knowledge and support we need to ensure smooth porting of Capsa’s features.

Our goal is to provide backers with a test build to try-out Capsa on extended operating systems before launch. Feedback from participants will allow us to iron out any issues, but this is no easy task and we do expect this to be an ongoing work in progress for 6 months subsequent to launch. Ongoing development will allow us to be certain that we can deliver optimal functionality across all platforms

Supporting every single language on steam may seem to be an excessive undertaking to some, but to us, it is simply incorporating our belief of inclusiveness into Capsa. We want as many people as possible to be able to enjoy Capsa with their friends, regardless of their native language. We expect to have all languages supported within 6 months after launch. The actual time required will be based upon how long it takes translators to complete the translations.

Given all the risks and challenges we currently face, the greatest risk is not receiving the funding we need as this will seriously affect our ability to achieve the level of support we really want to provide and our end users deserve.

Currently, we are focusing on developing the base game and need your help to meet the following funding targets, be sure to check out the perks for backing us on the right of this page!

£5,000: primary funding goal

Making CAPSA happen!

This ensures support for:

  • Windows
  • Basic Device Support (Steam Controller + Xbox 360 Controller)
  • Various Steamworks features

This basic funding will cover any initial development costs and provide us with the necessary financial support to continue full-time development of Capsa.

We've already been Greenlit (See our Greenlight page here) on Steam and intend to include the following features:

  • Workshop: share characters and clothing configured with the in-game tools with the community.
  • Steamcloud: all your save-game files in the cloud so you never have to worry about losing them again.
  • Steam Server Browser: to make the life the utmost easiest to everyone will allow people to invite their friends via their steam friends list and browse for servers using the steam server browser.
  • Steam Achievements & Stats: any in-game accomplishments or challenges completed will be able to be shown off and compared with other players. Can you collect them all?
  • Steam Controller: will work entirely out of the box with full gamepad UI support.
  • Trading Cards: and of course, trading cards will be included!

£7,500: Extended Localization Support

We want you to be able to play in your native language!

Funds will cover costs of translators, access to resources, and time required to incorporate all supported languages on Steam. Costs also include on-going support costs so expansions and addons we intend to add at a later date can also feature these languages. We expect a window of six months to complete all translations, which will be carried out post launch.

£12,500: Extended Device Support

Making sure YOUR devices work with CAPSA!

  • HTC Vive
  • Oculus Rift
  • OSVR
  • Razer Chroma, Alienware FX, Logitech G
  • Improved UI support for the PS4 Gamepad

Ensuring your devices work perfectly with CAPSA is important to us. This will enable Capsa to feature complete Steam VR support for all currently supported headset types. We will also work with various input device manufacturers to support their unique technologies such as Razer Chroma, Alienware FX and Logitech G, plus ensure compatibility for Playstation 4 devices (Including PS4 specific UI button elements).  The majority of proceeds will allow us to acquire the necessary hardware (see above breakdown). The remaining funds will cover time costs required to work with various device manufacturers obtaining any required SDKs and support from them.

£20,000: Extended Operating System Support

Don’t have Windows? No problem!

  • Mac OS X
  • Steam OS
  • Linux

We want to make sure all major operating systems run CAPSA perfectly! In order to accomplish this we will need to purchase adequate hardware, which will be the primary expense. Residual funding will cover time required to reach out and work with individual OS support to create an optimal experience on each platform and ensure great functionality.

We intend to work with SteamPlay, which means that when you purchase the game you can play it on all supported systems at no additional cost.

£40,000: Expanded World and Content

You decide how we make CAPSA an even “huger” world to explore and have fun in!

  • Two new theme areas, Volcanic and Japanese Garden
  • Community FEATURE pick
  • 12 months free content packs

We want CAPSA to include the things YOU love!! To that end, we will be providing the community with a selection of features to vote on. If we reach this funding goal, the most popular of which will be developed and included in CAPSA. The new themed areas and added content will be available to everyone, of course, at no additional cost. Currently, we expect work on this would begin approximately six months after launch. Funding will be directed towards covering development time and any peripheral acquisition costs related to the expansion and content.

Even if you are unable to assist us financially, you can always help by sharing this page with people you know. This helps us reach a greater audience which may in turn make all the difference in ensuring we meet our intended goals.

  • Like us on Facebook
  • Follow us on Twitter
  • Favorite us on Steam Greenlight
  • Watch us on IndieDB
  • Subscribe to us on Youtube

What will the game cost at launch?

Price will be approximately 19.99 GBP (24.99 USD) but may vary per region depending on applicable taxes and possibly subject to change depending on currency rate changes.
 

Are there any subscription fees or is this a one off purchase?

There are no subscription fees required for playing Capsa, no ‘Premium’ model and no in-game currency model. Just like buying a regular game from Steam.
 

When do you plan on releasing?

Sometime in the fall, we are liking mid September but specific details will be made available nearer the time.

When will you deliver perks?

Perks will be delivered later, before launch, but no date set at this moment.

What content does Season One pass include and how much will it cost?

Season one pass costs approximately 19.99 GBP (24.99 USD) and will include four major expansions. Price may vary per region depending on applicable taxes and possibly subject to change depending on currency rate changes.

  • Boats
  • Cats
  • Helicopters
  • Go-Karts

All users, whether they purchase or not will gain access to go-karts, however season pass holders will have access to more types/models of kart.

Which engine do you use?

Unreal Engine 4.
 

Is this multiplayer exclusive?

You can play locally without requiring to be online and nothing is restricted to multiplayer. Though most the fun will be in playing the game with friends or being in a world with other people.
 

How big is your team?

Just the two of us working on this project.

This funding will enable us to access the knowledge and support we need to ensure smooth porting of Capsa’s features.
Our goal is to provide backers with a test build to try-out Capsa on extended operating systems before launch. Feedback from participants will allow us to iron out any issues, but this is no easy task and we do expect this to be an ongoing work in progress for 6 months subsequent to launch. Ongoing development will allow us to be certain that we can deliver optimal functionality across all platforms
Supporting every single language on steam may seem to be an excessive undertaking to some, but to us, it is simply incorporating our belief of inclusiveness into Capsa. We want as many people as possible to be able to enjoy Capsa with their friends, regardless of their native language. We expect to have all languages supported within 6 months after launch. The actual time required will be based upon how long it takes translators to complete the translations.
Given all the risks and challenges we currently face, the greatest risk is not receiving the funding we need as this will seriously affect our ability to achieve the level of support we really want to provide and our end users deserve.


Currently, we are focusing on developing the base game and need your help to meet the following funding targets, be sure to check out the perks for backing us on the right of this page!
£5,000: primary funding goal

Making CAPSA happen!
This ensures support for:

Windows
Basic Device Support (Steam Controller + Xbox 360 Controller)
Various Steamworks features

This basic funding will cover any initial development costs and provide us with the necessary financial support to continue full-time development of Capsa.

We've already been Greenlit (See our Greenlight page here) on Steam and intend to include the following features:


Workshop: share characters and clothing configured with the in-game tools with the community.

Steamcloud: all your save-game files in the cloud so you never have to worry about losing them again.

Steam Server Browser: to make the life the utmost easiest to everyone will allow people to invite their friends via their steam friends list and browse for servers using the steam server browser.

Steam Achievements & Stats: any in-game accomplishments or challenges completed will be able to be shown off and compared with other players. Can you collect them all?

Steam Controller: will work entirely out of the box with full gamepad UI support.

Trading Cards: and of course, trading cards will be included!


£7,500: Extended Localization Support
We want you to be able to play in your native language!
Funds will cover costs of translators, access to resources, and time required to incorporate all supported languages on Steam. Costs also include on-going support costs so expansions and addons we intend to add at a later date can also feature these languages. We expect a window of six months to complete all translations, which will be carried out post launch.

£12,500: Extended Device Support

Making sure YOUR devices work with CAPSA!

HTC Vive
Oculus Rift
OSVR
Razer Chroma, Alienware FX, Logitech G
Improved UI support for the PS4 Gamepad


Ensuring your devices work perfectly with CAPSA is important to us. This will enable Capsa to feature complete Steam VR support for all currently supported headset types. We will also work with various input device manufacturers to support their unique technologies such as Razer Chroma, Alienware FX and Logitech G, plus ensure compatibility for Playstation 4 devices (Including PS4 specific UI button elements).  The majority of proceeds will allow us to acquire the necessary hardware (see above breakdown). The remaining funds will cover time costs required to work with various device manufacturers obtaining any required SDKs and support from them.

£20,000: Extended Operating System Support

Don’t have Windows? No problem!

Mac OS X
Steam OS
Linux

We want to make sure all major operating systems run CAPSA perfectly! In order to accomplish this we will need to purchase adequate hardware, which will be the primary expense. Residual funding will cover time required to reach out and work with individual OS support to create an optimal experience on each platform and ensure great functionality.
We intend to work with SteamPlay, which means that when you purchase the game you can play it on all supported systems at no additional cost.

£40,000: Expanded World and Content

You decide how we make CAPSA an even “huger” world to explore and have fun in!

Two new theme areas, Volcanic and Japanese Garden
Community FEATURE pick
12 months free content packs

We want CAPSA to include the things YOU love!! To that end, we will be providing the community with a selection of features to vote on. If we reach this funding goal, the most popular of which will be developed and included in CAPSA. The new themed areas and added content will be available to everyone, of course, at no additional cost. Currently, we expect work on this would begin approximately six months after launch. Funding will be directed towards covering development time and any peripheral acquisition costs related to the expansion and content.


Even if you are unable to assist us financially, you can always help by sharing this page with people you know. This helps us reach a greater audience which may in turn make all the difference in ensuring we meet our intended goals.


Like us on Facebook


Follow us on Twitter


Favorite us on Steam Greenlight


Watch us on IndieDB


Subscribe to us on Youtube



What will the game cost at launch?Price will be approximately 19.99 GBP (24.99 USD) but may vary per region depending on applicable taxes and possibly subject to change depending on currency rate changes. Are there any subscription fees or is this a one off purchase?There are no subscription fees required for playing Capsa, no ‘Premium’ model and no in-game currency model. Just like buying a regular game from Steam. When do you plan on releasing?
Sometime in the fall, we are liking mid September but specific details will be made available nearer the time.
When will you deliver perks?
Perks will be delivered later, before launch, but no date set at this moment.
What content does Season One pass include and how much will it cost?
Season one pass costs approximately 19.99 GBP (24.99 USD) and will include four major expansions. Price may vary per region depending on applicable taxes and possibly subject to change depending on currency rate changes.

Boats
Cats
Helicopters
Go-Karts

All users, whether they purchase or not will gain access to go-karts, however season pass holders will have access to more types/models of kart.
Which engine do you use?Unreal Engine 4. Is this multiplayer exclusive?You can play locally without requiring to be online and nothing is restricted to multiplayer. Though most the fun will be in playing the game with friends or being in a world with other people. How big is your team?
Just the two of us working on this project.

story:
(English below)

Velkommen - Vi har brug for din hjælp

Vi er Folkebevægelsen mod EU. Måske har du hørt om os? Vi er de eneste danske modstandere af den Europæiske Union der er repræsenteret i Europaparlamentet. 
Snart skal vi til folkeafstemning om det danske retsforbehold.  Det er ellers vores retsforbehold som sikrer, at vi i Danmark selv kan bestemme over vores egen retspolitik. En afskaffelse af retsforbeholdet vil nemlig betyde, at EU kan vedtage nye love på det retspolitiske område udenom Folketinget eller et dansk politisk flertal. 
Derfor anbefaler vi et klart NEJ, til afstemningen om afskaffelsen af retsforbeholdet. Simpelthen fordi vi ikke vil gå på kompromis med demokratiet. 
Men retsforbeholdet og tilvalgsordningen er komplekse størrelser, og det er derfor vigtigt, at danskerne har let adgang til information om, hvad vi egentlig skal stemme om. Desværre står vi overfor en klar økonomisk favorisering af ja-siden i statsministeriets såkaldte oplysningskampagner. 
Derfor har vi brug for al den støtte vi kan få. Vi vil nemlig sikre, at danskerne har fri adgang til information, som er både retvisende og balanceret. 
Med jeres hjælp kan vores kampagne nå ud til endnu flere danskere.
OBS: Da Indiegogo ikke giver mulighed for at samle ind i kroner, og euroen vil vi gerne holde os langt fra, samler vi ind i dollars. 1 dollar er omkring 6,5 dansk krone. 

Hvordan du hjælper:

Når du donerer en lille smule, lægges det hele i en pulje så vi kan fortælle sandheden om hvad der sker i EU. Vi spiller med 100% åbne kort og vil gerne sige hvad donationerne, går til:

10.000,- ($1.500) 
Med 10.000 indsamlede kroner, kan vi berige vores lokale komitéer med yderligere materiale til uddeling. Dette vil i første omgang være klistermærker, som der altid er stor efterspørgsel på. Det er nemlig et godt og let supplement til de foldere og informationsmateriale, som vores medlemmer normalt distribuerer.  

25.000,- ($3.750)
Med 25.000 kroner har vi udover klistermærker også mulighed for at sende en ekstra kampagnebil rundt i landet inden afstemningen. Den vil blive udsmykket med vores logo og fyldt op med engagerede frivillige, som ikke kan købes, men findes i massevis i Folkebevægelsen mod EU.

50.000,- ($7.500) 
Kampagnevideo skal der til! Derfor laver vi en professionel kampagnevideo, der skal sikre, at danskerne får en større forståelse for, hvad en afskaffelse af retsforbeholdet vil betyde. Kampagnevideoen vil i første omgang florere på internettet, hvor vi kan sprede vores budskab gennem de sociale medier.  

75.000,- ($11.250) 
Kampagnevideoen vil nu blive vist i en række udvalgte biografer landet over, og vores budskab kan derved nå ud til endnu flere danskere. 

100.000,- ($15.000)
Skulle vi nå vores absolutte mål på 100.000 danske kroner. Så holder vi et brag af en fest. Den vil blive kaldt: 'Stem festligt Nej!' og vil blive fyldt med underholdning og live musik. Festen vil give os muligheden for at sige et stort TAK til vores seje støtter, for at have beriget vores kampagne med yderligere uddelingsmateriale, en ekstra kampagnebil, en kampagnevideo og en hel del mere opmærksomhed omkring vigtigheden af vores retsforbehold. Vi lover, at der bliver liv og glade dage. 

+100.000,- 
Vi stopper ikke hér. Samles der flere penge ind, går de til sikring af et NEJ og en bevarelse af det danske retsforbehold. Vi skal nok holde jer opdateret med projektet og dens gang!

Du kan læse mere om, hvad retsforbeholdet og tilvalgsordningen er på vores hjemmeside. 


Welcome - We need your help

We are the (danish) peoples movement against the EU, maybe you have heard about us? We are the only danish opposition to the European Union that is represented  in the EU parliament. 
Soon the danes will have a referendum on the danish opt-out on the EU policies in relation to justice and home affairs.  Removing this reservation means that the EU can legislate on this area, without the consent of the Danish government or a Danish political majority - thus  sacrificing the right of the danish people to hold their own politicians responsible for the policies in Denmark. 

Therefore we strongly recommend a NO to the referendum on ending the justice opt-out. Simply because we will not compromise on democracy. 

All contributions will go towards our campaign for the justice opt-out, and with your help, we will be able to reach an even bigger part of the danish population. 

We hope you will support our cause! Thank you - Tak!
