story:
Last Chance Man Productions

Hey everyone! We are Last Chance Man Productions! This team consists of myself and my husband! I am a game design college graduate and am trying to work on getting our first card game out. We have been working on this project for over a year, we hired an artist to help us with the cards and are really excited to let more than just close friends get a chance to play! We're trying to raise the money to pay the artist and print out the card game to the masses.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

We need a total of $7500 USD. The reason for this amount is to print out large quantities of the game, package them and ship them out to stores and make them available online.

We want to give the artist the promised $1000.

$3830 goes to printing out 500 decks of the cards and 500 Ultra Pro boxes to carry them in.

$1000  in expected shipping costs to ship them to stores in California, Florida, Washington, Oregon and individuals who donated the specified amount.

$1000 to pay for advertising and overhead/housing of the card games at the stores.

$100 in stickers to put on the ultra pro boxes.

The extra amount of $580 remaining is a cushion for anything that may exceed the previously documented amounts due to time changing the prices and fees.

If the goal amount isn't made, the first thing we're planning on doing is paying our wonderful artist and then ordering the cards that we can to go from there.

We are going to have various perks, $1 donations we will send out thank you emails, $5 we send a physical thank you letter with a Crit Card included from our original play test decks. $10 we send a thank you letter and a signed Crit Card from myself and my husband. $20 dollars and we send you a copy of the game, and a signed Crit Card. $50 dollar donations get you everything from the $20 dollar bonus and a special thank you added into the instruction cards that will come with every deck.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

We have had quite a few play testers throughout the United States and some of the feedback we've received has been:

"This game is so easy to play, you only need two players, but it's amazing with 4 plus!"

"This is one of the best drinking games ever!"

"We used D6s and D20s to keep track of points but we should have just used our shot glasses"

"It's a creative way to attack your friends without going to jail ;)"

More than anything, we're trying to follow our dream and share it with people. Card games are something many of us have enjoyed for years; we'd like to keep the card games going, the tradition, and the togetherness.

    Risks & Challenges

    People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

    It has taken us over a year to get to this point because honestly, I've been very down on myself; I've had a lot of doubt about my capabilities to do anything when I haven't been able to find a job after college. Through friends and my husband who was a major designer in this process I realize I shouldn't let my own insecurities be a downer on everyone. The first step is enjoying what you do, and we've already done that; the second step is to actually get our there and do it. So here we are. We've had plenty of issues trying to get boxes made, scheduling pre-orders so that we didn't have to go through crowdfunding and small nuances; I had decided it was more important for me to have any job than to work on games. My husband, family and friends reminded me that following my dream is never stupid, nor should it be put on the sidelines that way. Now, I'm not going to let anything hold us back! It took a while for me to stop worrying about everything and just go for it. When I realized I was holding more than just myself back, I stopped. I also had to convince myself that it's okay to ask for help; so here we are, asking for help.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Sharing this post, telling your friends and family members, if you know anyone willing to house our card game, hit us up; Help spread the word. Help our dream, become a part of everyone!

story:
Meet your GM.

Greetings everyone and thank you for taking a look at my campaign for my subscription box idea called Gaming Stash.

My name is Luis and I have been a gamer since as far back as I can remember. I grew up with games and I have always loved how they can bring people together. I still remember playing word games with my mother, video games with my dad and strategy games with my cousins and school friends.

As I grew older, I became more and more interested in what is considered the "gaming" community and expanded my gaming tastes to include Pen & Paper RPGs (I was a ruthless GM), Strategy Games ("Do I need to invade Russia?...Yes. Yes I do.") and Card Games. ("Counter it" became a phrase people hated me for.)

This project grew out of that love of gaming and the lack of access to a good gaming source back in my hometown in Puerto Rico. When I moved to Florida a few years back and visited a local Comic Shop, I was amazed at all the different board games and miniatures games that existed. I learned to play them, and as I did I enjoyed getting to know people that shared my interests.

Through Gaming Stash I hope to bring new games to any gamer that wants to try something new or that may have heard of some games but never had a means to acquire them. It is also my hope to encourage gamers to meet up and play together at their homes or local comic shops. 

Gathering resources and lucky die rolls.

While going into a new game without prior knowledge of it is exciting, going into a venture without information is never a viable option. Here are some of the more common questions that could come up in relations to the project. If you have any concerns not listed here you can contact me at any moment and I will answer everything as best I can. 

What kind of games will be included in each stash?

Each month's Gaming Stash will center around a gaming theme. These will range from "Pixels" to "Horror" and will include games and accessories that will revolve around these themes. The games will be chosen randomly though. Everyone will receive the same game but you will not know which game it will be until it arrives.

The games included in each box can range from Cooperative games to Deck Building games and even to Pen and Paper Role Playing Games. As well as accessories such as Expansions for the games, gaming tokens, protective sleeves, etc.

Ultimately the goal of this project is to give gamers new and exciting games to try out with their friends or to try out with their local gaming community. Thanks to the variety of games carried by our supplier, I will make sure to bring the best that the gaming world has to offer to my subscribers each and every single month.

How will the Subscription Service work?

Once the project is successfully launched the cost of each box will be $40. This price includes the standard shipping costs and we will initially ship only within the United States. It is my hope that as the subscribers grow I will be able to expand the service to ship worldwide.

Each month the theme of the box will change and the game, or games, inside will reflect this theme. The value of the games and accessories in each box will always be $50 or more. 

It is our goal to bring gamers new products to enjoy while making sure we can deliver the best possible bang for their buck. 

What will you use the donated funds for?

Like in any good strategy game, the key to success and victory is good resource management. The funds that are raised by this project will be used to acquire the best tabletop games and accessories possible from dedicated suppliers in our area.

I have already created a partnership with one of the major gaming distributors in my area but there is still much more that will need to be done in order to ensure that we can deliver a large variety of products to our fellow gamers.

With these funds we will invest in the games and accessories that will be delivered to you monthly, as well as use the fund to purchase the custom boxes needed to fit the games we will be shipping out as many of them vary in size and dimensions.

As we start out we will be shipping just games and accessories, but as we expand we will be able to include other items that match the theme and style of the Table Top Gaming community such as graphic t-shirts, collectible items, Gaming Stash Exclusives and more.

We will also use the funds to create a custom web page where we will be able to provide you with a better interface, direct contact links and links to different resources that every gamer should have at their disposal.

Perils on the journey ahead.

Starting a project like this isn't without challenges. Some game companies and publishers require that distributors sell only to physical stores and others require a direct supply chain from them to the distributor in order to get their supplies going.

While this will initially be a challenge, I hope that the success of this project will allow me the opportunity to reach out to these publishers and create the partnerships needed to make sure I can always provide you with the best and most noteworthy games that will keep you and your fellow gamers entertained month after month.

While I work on creating these partnerships, I will also look into other methods of acquiring these games so that I can still provide you with these great options without affecting the price or charging any premiums. (Only Goblins and Gnolls do that. And I am not a Goblin or a Gnoll. I swear...)

Recruit fellow gamers!

Everyone can contribute to this campaign even if they can't donate towards the goal. Spread the word through your guilds and gaming communities. Help this campaign reach as many gamers as possible so that we can successfully launch our service and make sure everyone's Gaming Stash is filled with the best games around!

them, and as I did I enjoyed getting to know people that shared my interests.Through Gaming Stash I hope to bring new games to any gamer that wants to try something new or that may have heard of some games but never had a means to acquire them. It is also my hope to encourage gamers to meet up and play together at their homes or local comic shops.    Gathering resources and lucky die rolls. While going into a new game without prior knowledge of it is exciting, going into a venture without information is never a viable option. Here are some of the more common questions that could come up in relations to the project. If you have any concerns not listed here you can contact me at any moment and I will answer everything as best I can. 
What kind of games will be
included in each stash?

Each month's Gaming Stash will center around a gaming theme. These will range
from "Pixels" to "Horror" and will include games and
accessories that will revolve around these themes. The games will be chosen randomly though. Everyone will receive the same game but you will not know which game it will be until it arrives.

The games included in each box can range from Cooperative games to Deck
Building games and even to Pen and Paper Role Playing Games. As well as accessories such as Expansions for the games, gaming tokens, protective sleeves, etc.

Ultimately the goal of this project is to give gamers new and exciting games to
try out with their friends or to try out with their local gaming community.
Thanks to the variety of games carried by our supplier, I will make sure to
bring the best that the gaming world has to offer to my subscribers each and
every single month.
How will the Subscription Service work?

Once the project is successfully launched the cost of each box will be $40.
This price includes the standard shipping costs and we will initially ship only
within the United States. It is my hope that as the subscribers grow I will be able to
expand the service to ship worldwide.

Each month the theme of the box will change and the game, or games, inside will
reflect this theme. The value of the games and accessories in each box will
always be $50 or more. 
It is our goal to bring gamers
new products to enjoy while making sure we can deliver the best possible bang
for their buck. 
What will you use the donated funds for?
Like in any good strategy game, the key to success and victory is good resource
management. The funds that are raised by this project will be used to acquire
the best tabletop games and accessories possible from dedicated suppliers in
our area.I have already created a partnership with one of the major gaming
distributors in my area but there is still much more that will need to be done
in order to ensure that we can deliver a large variety of products to our
fellow gamers.

With these funds we will invest in the games and accessories that will be
delivered to you monthly, as well as use the fund to purchase the custom boxes
needed to fit the games we will be shipping out as many of them vary in size
and dimensions.

As we start out we will be shipping just games and accessories, but as we
expand we will be able to include other items that match the theme and style of
the Table Top Gaming community such as graphic t-shirts, collectible items,
Gaming Stash Exclusives and more.

We will also use the funds to create a custom web page where we will be able to
provide you with a better interface, direct contact links and links to
different resources that every gamer should have at their disposal.



    Perils on the journey ahead.  
Starting a project like this isn't without challenges. Some game companies and publishers require that distributors sell only
to physical stores and others require a direct supply chain from them to the
distributor in order to get their supplies going.
While this will initially be a challenge, I hope that the
success of this project will allow me the opportunity to reach out to these
publishers and create the partnerships needed to make sure I can always
provide you with the best and most noteworthy games that will keep you and your
fellow gamers entertained month after month.
While I work on creating these partnerships, I will also look into
other methods of acquiring these games so that I can still provide you with
these great options without affecting the price or charging any premiums. (Only
Goblins and Gnolls do that. And I am not a Goblin or a Gnoll. I swear...)
    Recruit fellow gamers! Everyone can contribute to this campaign even if they can't donate towards the goal. Spread the word through your guilds and gaming communities. Help this campaign reach as many gamers as possible so that we can successfully launch our service and make sure everyone's Gaming Stash is filled with the best games around!

Company Goal
With growing prize pools from number of different games titles professional gaming has quickly become a viable career option. Nutrition: a critical part of tradition sport training and performance is often neglected in the eSports scene. Gamer's Edge has bridged this gap with supplement designed specifically to enhance gaming performance through elevated cognitive function and improved fine motor skills.   

Product Goal

Our product objective is to safely increase the mental and physical performance of Gamer’s Edge users. Given the competitive gaming scene, Gamer’s Edge is the next step in optimal gaming performance.

Cause for Funding

Our main causes for funding are to give you a chance to try Gamer's Edge! 

The rest will go towards website development and payment processing set up for taking orders. 

Thank you for taking the time to check us out. 

There is more detailed information at www.gamersedgesupplements.com

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone! My name is Cam Mertens, founder and CEO of yourfantasynow.com. I, along with my good friends Andrew and Jason, are launching a website that aims to help anyone interested in fantasy sports, winning money or America. Right now you have to remember multiple websites, user names and passwords  to play all of the fantasy games offered, and there aren't many varieties of games. We are aiming to provide a 1 stop shop for any fantasy game: sports or non sports related; daily games, season long games, year long games, custom games not offered anywhere else. We will also provide expert fantasy analysis and news and information on your fantasy teams as well. It will truly be the first and only website you need to visit to play any game. We came up with the idea when playing fantasy games over the past 15+ years and realizing that there is a huge market for this convenience. We are very excited to bring this site to everyone!

What We Need & What You Get

Our ultimate goal for this campaign is to get as many people aware, interested and excited about our website as possible. The number of people donating is much more important to us than the final monetary number as users are our most valuable commodity. Our goal is $5,000 but more importantly we would love for you to check out our site and social media! For donating we have a fun list of perks to thank you for your generous contribution!

The Impact

We are fully aware that our impact in the grand scheme of the world won't change much, but it will make it much more convenient for all people who are interested in fantasy games or just fun times on the internet and that is very important to us as avid, long time fantasy players.

Risks & Challenges

We know this won't be all gumdrops and cupcakes: Launching any kind of business is extremely difficult. We have a ton of competition from established fantasy gaming providers along with just any other entertainment option on the internet. What we offer is a dedication to provide the best possible website with games no other site offers, the convenience factor not offered by any other site and the promise that we are building a fantasy gaming website by fantasy gamers for fantasy gamers. We have a customer care email set up that we would love to hear from anyone with ideas, suggestions and comments to make the site the best it can be.  The email is: customerservice@yourfantasynow.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you do not want to donate we would love for you to check us out on social media and share us with anyone you know that is interested in fantasy games. Sharing is caring and means a lot to us! And that's all there is to it, thank you so much for taking the time to check out our campaign!

instagram: @yourfantasynow

story:
Who am I : :  

I'm an Indie Game Developer - in specific a coder / artist (2D/3D) - for those who don't know me you can check my portfolio website at JoseLuis.AssetCrafters.com - I've been self employed for a little while now mostly at education.  I've been working as game development professor / instructor and doing some game code or assets once in a while (mostly Saturdays).  For this reason I don't have enough funding as of now in order to cover the funding I need to recover for this accidental hardware loss, thus I'm asking for your support in here and of course not just asking but willing to offer my game development related services / knowledge in exchange for your help! :) 

I have attached a few samples of my current artworks following so you can have a quick look at my creations.  Although this campaign's goal is not strictly any game development in particular (reason why you won't see a particular video or demo related to an specific game development of mine)  you will still see some pics pertaining to the ones I'm currently working at, in particular: 

A) All Or Nothing (AON) :: Drag Racing 
B) First Light :: Aegis Adventures 


The Story : :  


There's not much of a story on this one, I have two computers, one is a PC I made from parts a few years back (I think 4 or 5 if not mistaken) and the other one,  a fairly old notebook by now (more than 7 years old). 

The one I assembled myself from parts died on me about a week ago.  The other one is so old that I'm having a really hard time trying to develop my video games on it.  Is way too slow and sometimes even not functional for some job types in 3D.

Following is a sample of the kind of work I do perform normally with the computer that died on me (this one was done by me - 3D Art for our games in development ) :

 

 

The Problem : :  

I need a better computer so I can continue to code / art  / develop my video games and make nice games that can make lots of gamers happy so I can earn a living out of it.  

I'm trying to get a nicer income and have a couple of offers going on right now, but sadly for me both offerings state that I need to wait until January (after Christmas season) in order to get fully considered, since the positions are still not opened / created yet however.  They are *to be created by then. 

Meanwhile I'm working as a game developer instructor, but only a few hours during Saturdays and thus not making enough money for replacing the needed hardware for the time being.

This is the desktop that died on me : 

 

What I have done so far trying to remedy the situation : : 

I know a tad about how to fix computers so I ended ordering a new power supply (a 30 bucks something with shipping and all from Amazon) - asking money from a close friend.  Sadly, I installed it only to see it do nothing to fix the issues and my computer still dead.  Even worse, it blew up too, meaning my board / system is considerably damaged or there's a heavy short circuit going on.  Whatever... 

 

What I'm doing in order to try and fix things : :

I'm actively looking for some nice job offers around related to game / art development so I can use my actual experience, but it needs to be a job that does not take all of my time, otherwise I can't continue to code my video games, reach my own game development goals.  I need to finish the video games I'm currently working at because otherwise I'll never get to fulfill my dream of being a game developer / coder with actual games released.  

 

What my friends (are) be doing : : 

...  As you might imagine my friends will help me with the campaign but they can only do so much, then I still need help from others fellow game developers / gamer friends around that understand how serious this situation is for me - and my friends who are working at these projects in turn. The whole development team.

 

What I need from You if possible  : : 

Well.. just some support as you see it might fit.  Or maybe you just happen to own a notebook or desktop powerful enough that you are not using or not planning on using ? so I can put it to good use developing cool games? (borrowed of course)

Maybe I can be of help with my art/work so you might have a nice production/collaboration deal for me to consider?  Check out the Perks I'm offering! :)   I'm willing to work this out!  I'm not just asking for money without being willing to work in exchange as needed. 

Hummm.. maybe you know someone that can help in some way so you can just pass the link on to such person?  Thanks a lot and in advanced to all of you who decide to help, and even if you don't just thank you for reading so far and considering it.  Remember, even if you support with just one dollar you can empower this campaign's success rate!  

 

What I would do with the funds : : 

I'm hoping that ideally I can get me a powerful enough notebook so I can use it both to code my video games and to teach others at the same time, because of its mobility advantage, otherwise I just hope to get enough funding as to get me some new desktop repair / upgrade parts, so I can repair the dead PC then.  Either way will be fine at the end and I really appreciate it!

Here are a few screenshots of my current games in development so you can check on them see if you found them 'cool enough' ;)  Hope you do !  This one is from First Light - Aegis Adventures : : 


This other one is from All or Nothing (AON) :: Drag Racing 






These are some of the game assets I have created for other game projects : : 




Then this is some of my 2D art (digital drawing / painting) these are not related to any video game, its just art - this I can't do so nicely as of now because of the slowness issue too  :(   - but I still do however (I'm clarifying in case you get yourself a related Perk - I'll accomplish Perks even if I have to use borrowed hardware in order to fulfill them) 
 


This is it !  I hope you can Support my efforts and that you like what you see and if you need any information concerning the campaign or my video game development, please don't hesitate to contact me and ask me what you would like to learn about.  Thanks a lot for reading all the way down to here! :D

story:
LE PROMOTEUR

Manager passionné, ambitieux, épris d’innovation et ayant une attitude orientée sur les résultats, Roly Khentache a toujours eu un rêve : devenir entrepreneur, créer des emplois et concourir à l’édification d’une Afrique entreprenante et ambitieuse. Il est diplômé de l’Institut Franco-Allemand des Techniques, d’Economie et des Sciences de Metz (France) et Saarbrücken (Allemagne). Après une brève expérience professionnelle à UPS (United Parcel Services) Europe à Bruxelles comme Ingénieur Industriel, il décide de retourner en Afrique réaliser ses rêves. A son retour en 2012, il est contacté par UPS Togo pour une pige d’un an et demie où il officie comme Directeur Commercial et des Opérations. Une fois ce contrat terminé il retourne au Cameroun où depuis 2014 il a créé Bimbia, entreprise conceptrice des P.C. Card (Professional Club Card).

P.C. Card

P.C. Card (Professional Club Card) est une carte privilège (carte de fidélité et de paiement) destinée aux professionnels et qui leur permettra de recevoir des réductions et avantages conséquents chez nos partenaires (Cf. www.the-proclub.com.), le but pour nous étant de  booster le pouvoir d’ achat, et donc la motivation des professionnels, leviers essentiels dans le développement de notre société, la découverte, la consolidation et / ou la création des richesses et de  contribuer à la fidélisation des clients, à l’ acquisition de nouveaux clients chez nos partenaires.

Ressource première et essentielle dans la création et la pérennisation des richesses, les professionnels et les travailleurs, énormément sollicités par la société (sur le plan professionnel, sociétal et privé), ne bénéficient presque jamais d’avantages et de facilités qu’offre la société à d’autres catégories de personnes. Au contraire… Cette situation faisant éclore du stress, du mal-être, des maladies, dévastatrices autant pour ces derniers que pour les entreprises dans lesquelles ils travaillent (baisse de productivité et d’efficacité), ne pouvait nous laisser indifférent. Il devenait de plus en plus urgent d’agir et d’apporter des solutions durables pour combattre ces maux en s’attaquant à leurs causes. C’est ainsi qu’est née, sous le modèle de la « Social Business », l’idée de la carte P.C. Card qui vous est fièrement proposée par Bimbia, et qui en ce moment est en pleine phase de développement.

DEVENEZ CONTRIBUTEUR

Contribuer à ce projet nous sera d’une grande utilité en ce moment où nous voulons accélérer son implémentation. En tant que contributeur vous participerez au succès d’un projet novateur et à fort potentiel de croissance qui commencera au Cameroun, mais  que nous souhaitons ouvrir à d’autres pays à travers le monde, mais surtout vous contribuerez à Offrir aux professionnels et travailleurs de toute race, sexe, religion et nationalité une solution qui leur permettra d’avoir accès, avec beaucoup de joie au divertissement, à la détente, au bien-être, au sourire, tout en boostant leur pouvoir d’achat.

87% du montant que nous souhaitons récolter sera destiné au financement de la commande de 2500 cartes (minimal requis) de paiement  cobrandé auprès d’une multinationale opérant dans le secteur de la monétique et le reste nous servira surtout à booster notre communication le temps du lancement des cartes.

ANALYSE DES RISQUES

Il s’agit ici des aléas mesurables, inhérents aux états de la nature au sein de laquelle l’entreprise mènera ses activités. L’objectif ici est de recenser ces différents aléas, les analyser, dans le but de les ‘‘maîtriser’’ en indiquant comment parer à leurs éventuelles survenances. Trois principaux types de risques peuvent impacter négativement la capacité de Bimbia Sarl à mener à bien ses objectifs. Ce sont pour le moment le risque commercial et le risque politique (ou risque pays).

LE RISQUE COMMERCIAL

C’est principalement, la probabilité de ne pouvoir réaliser par Bimbia Sarl, les objectifs commerciaux qu’elle a prévu de réaliser. Il s’agit notamment des objectifs relatifs aux chiffres d’affaires indiqués dans le compte d’exploitation prévisionnel

  Niveau de risque : Moyen.

Un marché formel dans notre cœur de métier n’étant pour le moment pas encore constitué, le nous comptons user de stratégies afin de  mettre sur pieds un modèle de commercialisation très favorable à l’attrait à la  fidélisation de la clientèle.

Pour se prémunir de toute mauvaise éventualité, nous veillerons à assurer un management de qualité, qui motive suffisamment son personnel et qui soit orienté vers l’atteinte du résultat. Cela passera également par un recrutement non complaisant, pour assurer le professionnalisme, qui est un important critère de satisfaction de la clientèle.

LE RISQUE PAYS OU RISQUE POLITIQUE.

C’est la probabilité de survenance d’un évènement sociopolitique susceptible d’entraver le développement de la P. C. Card sur son premier sol. Il peut s’agir d’un soulèvement social suivi d’actes de vandalisme susceptibles d’entrainer le pillage de Bimbia Sarl, d’une guerre civile, d’un coup d’état militaire qui entraineraient des limitations de change, de transferts et paiements internationaux…

  Niveau de risque : Faible.

Malgré la monté de la psychose due à la nébuleuse terroriste BOKO HARAM ces derniers mois, le Cameroun est un pays stable, généralement qualifié de « havre de paix ». Ils s’y sont déroulés au cours de ces  trois dernières années (en 2011 et en 2013), trois consultations électorales de hautes factures, dans la paix et dans la sérénité. Les institutions politiques sont en train de se moderniser, et le pays est engagé dans de grands chantiers de nature à modifier les structures économiques du pays (à l’instar de la construction du port en eau profonde de Kribi) ; ce qui est de bonne augure pour la jeunesse camerounaise en particulier et le peuple camerounais en général. En somme, la dotation en cours du pays en infrastructures de développement (énergie, routes, ports, aéroports…) couplée à la modernisation des institutions politiques, constitue plutôt un réel potentiel d’attrait d’investissements directs, non seulement étrangers (IDE), mais aussi locaux.

Vous avez été séduit par notre projet. Super. Que  vous soyez capable de contribuer financièrement ou pas, n’hésitez surtout pas de partager les informations autour de cette campagne auprès de vos connaissances. Plus on aura un grand nombre de personnes touchées par cette information, plus il nous sera facile d’atteindre notre but. Ensemble tout est possible.

P.C.
Card (Professional
Club Card) est une carte privilège (carte de fidélité et de paiement) destinée
aux professionnels et qui leur permettra de recevoir des réductions et
avantages conséquents chez nos partenaires (Cf. www.the-proclub.com.), le but
pour nous étant de  booster le pouvoir d’
achat, et donc la motivation des professionnels, leviers essentiels dans le
développement de notre société, la découverte, la consolidation et / ou la
création des richesses et de  contribuer
à la fidélisation des clients, à l’ acquisition de nouveaux clients chez nos
partenaires.
Ressource première et essentielle dans la
création et la pérennisation des richesses, les professionnels et les
travailleurs, énormément sollicités par la société (sur le plan professionnel,
sociétal et privé), ne bénéficient presque jamais d’avantages et de facilités
qu’offre la société à d’autres catégories de personnes. Au contraire… Cette
situation faisant éclore du stress, du mal-être, des maladies, dévastatrices
autant pour ces derniers que pour les entreprises dans lesquelles ils
travaillent (baisse de productivité et d’efficacité), ne pouvait nous laisser
indifférent. Il devenait de plus en plus urgent d’agir et d’apporter des
solutions durables pour combattre ces maux en s’attaquant à leurs causes. C’est
ainsi qu’est née, sous le modèle de la « Social Business », l’idée de la carte
P.C. Card qui vous est fièrement proposée par Bimbia, et qui en ce
moment est en pleine phase de développement. 
DEVENEZ CONTRIBUTEUR
Contribuer
à ce projet nous sera d’une grande utilité en ce moment où nous voulons
accélérer son implémentation. En tant que contributeur vous participerez au
succès d’un projet novateur et à fort potentiel de croissance qui commencera au
Cameroun, mais  que nous souhaitons
ouvrir à d’autres pays à travers le monde, mais surtout vous contribuerez à Offrir aux professionnels et
travailleurs de toute race, sexe, religion et nationalité une solution qui leur
permettra d’avoir accès, avec beaucoup de joie au divertissement, à la détente,
au bien-être, au sourire, tout en boostant leur pouvoir d’achat.
87%
du montant que nous souhaitons récolter sera destiné au financement de la
commande de 2500 cartes (minimal requis) de paiement  cobrandé auprès d’une multinationale opérant
dans le secteur de la monétique et le reste nous servira surtout à booster
notre communication le temps du lancement des cartes. 
ANALYSE
DES RISQUES
Il s’agit ici des aléas
mesurables, inhérents aux états de la nature au sein de laquelle l’entreprise
mènera ses activités. L’objectif ici est de recenser ces différents aléas, les
analyser, dans le but de les ‘‘maîtriser’’ en indiquant comment parer à leurs
éventuelles survenances. Trois principaux types de risques peuvent impacter
négativement la capacité de Bimbia Sarl à mener à bien ses objectifs. Ce sont pour
le moment le risque commercial et le risque politique (ou risque pays).
LE RISQUE
COMMERCIAL
C’est principalement, la
probabilité de ne pouvoir réaliser par Bimbia Sarl, les objectifs commerciaux
qu’elle a prévu de réaliser. Il s’agit notamment des objectifs relatifs aux
chiffres d’affaires indiqués dans le compte d’exploitation prévisionnel
  Niveau de risque : Moyen.
Un marché formel dans notre cœur de
métier n’étant pour le moment pas encore constitué, le nous comptons user de
stratégies afin de  mettre sur pieds un
modèle de commercialisation très favorable à l’attrait à la  fidélisation de la clientèle.
Pour se prémunir de toute mauvaise
éventualité, nous veillerons à assurer un management de qualité, qui motive
suffisamment son personnel et qui soit orienté vers l’atteinte du résultat.
Cela passera également par un recrutement non complaisant, pour assurer le
professionnalisme, qui est un important critère de satisfaction de la
clientèle.
LE RISQUE PAYS OU
RISQUE POLITIQUE.
C’est la probabilité de survenance
d’un évènement sociopolitique susceptible d’entraver le développement de la P. C.
Card sur son premier sol. Il peut s’agir d’un soulèvement social suivi d’actes
de vandalisme susceptibles d’entrainer le pillage de Bimbia Sarl, d’une guerre
civile, d’un coup d’état militaire qui entraineraient des limitations de
change, de transferts et paiements internationaux…
   Niveau de risque : Faible.
Malgré la monté de la psychose due
à la nébuleuse terroriste BOKO HARAM ces derniers mois, le Cameroun est un pays
stable, généralement qualifié de « havre de paix ». Ils s’y sont déroulés au
cours de ces  trois dernières années (en
2011 et en 2013), trois consultations électorales de hautes factures, dans la
paix et dans la sérénité. Les institutions politiques sont en train de se
moderniser, et le pays est engagé dans de grands chantiers de nature à modifier
les structures économiques du pays (à l’instar de la construction du port en
eau profonde de Kribi) ; ce qui est de bonne augure pour la jeunesse
camerounaise en particulier et le peuple camerounais en général. En somme, la
dotation en cours du pays en infrastructures de développement (énergie, routes,
ports, aéroports…) couplée à la modernisation des institutions politiques, constitue
plutôt un réel potentiel d’attrait d’investissements directs, non seulement
étrangers (IDE), mais aussi locaux.
Vous avez été séduit par notre projet. Super. Que  vous soyez capable de contribuer
financièrement ou pas, n’hésitez surtout pas de partager les informations
autour de cette campagne auprès de vos connaissances. Plus on aura un grand
nombre de personnes touchées par cette information, plus il nous sera facile d’atteindre
notre but. Ensemble tout est possible.

story: Cannabis: The Card Game is a fill in the blank question & answer game that’s action packed, fun, witty, educational and slightly twisted.  Co-created by 2 Potriotic Girls LLC, Dina DelRusso and Marti Tucci, they bring years of Cannabis experience to the table.  Dina and Marti are building their brand, Weed Games, based on Cannabis themed party games and merchandise. Their first game, Cannabis: The Card Game, will be coming out later this year, and is a necessity for any fun loving Cannabis consumer.  Cannabis: The Card Game will be followed by re-up packs as well as other Cannabis culture party games.  Weed games is poised to be the leader in Cannabis culture party games and the first of its kind in this emerging industry.  Please donate today to help us make history by becoming the first brand of Cannabis culture party games!

story:
Welcome to DeepFall by The Confidence System, an entirely new Role playing system geared towards emotion based gaming. 

View the current draft of the Core Rule book here. There is a lot to finish!

The purpose of this campaign is to complete, and release, the Confidence System in the form of a Core Rule Book. This book will be set in a setting called DeepFall. This is only the first book in a series of setting books I hope to release for this system. 


The confidence system is different from a lot of systems because instead of putting the focus on character's abilities it puts the focus on the character’s state of mind. Whether or not the character feels happy, fulfilled or alert defines their ability to succeed. Confidence is used in this system as a wagering device. when you succeed at doing something you retain your confidence, when you fail, you lose it.

The goal of this game is to create a more dynamic system for role-playing.

Below is a breakdown of the contents of the book
The book will be fully self contained and will not require any other games or expansions to play. The system is comprehensive enough as to encompass any genre or style of play but is simple enough to allow for a smooth and pleasurable RPG experience. DeepFall, a fully fleshed out setting, is included in the book but does not demand full attention from the system. Instead, the system can be entirely independent of the setting.

Character construction is simple and expansive and allows for the creation of anything from a small child to a senior citizen and from human, or animal, to a 'god'. 

The book contains a truly massive equipment section covering more weapons and items than you can shake a stick at. The list includes narcotics and consumables, equipment (from clothing to particle accelerators), traditional and modern weapons - including a highly comprehensive set of rules for realistic firearms, vehicles of every variety and rules for shelters and HQ's. 

A fully equipped magic system that includes rules for spell creation on the fly (a spell can be made in under 1 min) along with rules for 'dark magic' and its effects on humans and supernatural beings. The system includes rules for permanent and temporary magical items as well as power boosting through a number of means, some with serious consequences. 
DeepFall: The Cradle of the Forest is included as the first of a series of settings to be released for this system. (Below is one of the Fabric Maps given as a reward for some of the Perks to the right)


DeepFall is a small town with a population of roughly 15,000 people. The town sits on a large island at the centre of a large lake. The city has had a spotty history to say the least. It was founded in 1732 by a group of people who had supposedly just up and left their old town, the location is unknown and most find the idea silly. Why, after all, would anyone just up and leave a perfectly good town?


DeepFall is replete with supernatural events from the mythological to the bizarre. it lies on a locus of sorts, a tear in the fabric of reality. Leaking from that tear is a dark force called Entropy. Entropy is worshiped by a cabal of madmen called the Entropic Order:

The Entropic Order are a radical group of terrorists bent on collapsing reality, They believe the universe was originally an infinite mass of chaos. Then something really terrible happened and the universe became consistent like it is now. They really don’t like this and spend all of their time trying to break down a boundary they call Restriction. 

The story of DeepFall begins at the beginning of it all. Below is an excerpt from the Entropic Orders holy book, the Tome of Tumult:

The Infinity Instance

Excerpt from the Tome of Tumult, translated by Dr. Thompson of Quantico. 

In the beginning there was the infinity instance. All was chaotic and nothing was constant. Infinite matter and energy in a state of pure, unadulterated, entropy. Long before the fabric of space and time came to be there was entropy. All was, yet nothing was. All time in an instant. All was, and thus, nothing was. 

It was in this infinity instance that all and nothing ceased to be. Within a single instant an infinite chorus of voices cried out for an end to chaos. The infinite thoughts demanded coherency. They created the logic circuit. 

The logic circuit sent a shockwave of coherency through the tumult and the realm of entropy was shattered into the finite shards of reality. These shards formed the Five Essences of Consistency. 

The First Essence was Consciousness, for thought is a consistency. 

The Second Essence was Firmament, for substance must be vessel to Consciousness and matter is a consistency.

The Third Essence was Instance, for cause must have an effect and time is a consistency.

The Fourth Essence was Restriction, for ‘what is’ is a consistency. 

The Fifth Essence was Entropy, for what is not can never be. 

All reality came to be and consciousness found vessel and space found time. All was constant, all was coherent. 

End of translation. 

The Core Book will include:

  • A complete guide to playing a Human of any age or any Supernatural creature you can imagine.
  • A full magic system including the making of temporary and permanent magical items.
  • Includes a fully fleshed out setting, DeepFall: The Cradle of the Forest.
  • An easy to use system that puts the characters state of mind before their abilities.

Confidence is the central trait of the Confidence System as it can be wagered in any check in the game. It represents the characters mental and emotional well-being and their ability to apply themselves in any task. When someone has low confidence they have lost some of that self-efficacy and feel like they are not emotionally capable of making change in the world. When you have a high confidence you feel powerful and self-assured. Remember, though, that confidence is a double edged sword. Using confidence to bolster a roll can be risky. The more you wager, the more likely the roll is to succeed. This also comes with a very serious risk. If you fail a check in which confidence has been wagered, then that confidence is lost, and fatigue is gained. 

Confidence is used as a wager. Add as many points as you want, and have, to any roll at all as a one-to-one bonus. If you pass, you retain them, if you fail you lose them. Confidence is gained by expressing your Obsession and lost when experiencing your Fear. When confidence is wagered and an Outstanding success is achieved an extra point of Confidence is earned.

Fatigue is your body telling you to stop. You subtract fatigue from every roll. A fatigue point is gained when Confidence OR Health is lost. They are all removed, regardless of how few, or how many, after 6 hours of rest and a meal. If less than 6 hours of sleep is had the number of fatigue is halved instead of removed entirely. If a meal is not had the character retains all fatigue until the character eats. Every time you either lose points of Confidence or points of Health no matter how many points you lose or gain, respectively, you gain a point of fatigue to a maximum of 10. No one can become more fatigued than that regardless of the status of either Confidence or Health.

People, real people, experience life not only through achievement but also though emotion. There are few people who go through life without even one fascination. In this system they are called Obsessions and represent the aspect of your character that seeks out, blindly and with abandon, pleasure and contentment. No other task, no matter how seemingly fulfilling, can offer the level of catharsis as your character’s Obsession.

Vice versa all people are terrified of something, often something relatively specific. This is your character’s Fear and represents the thing that saps the life and vitality from your character.

In game terms: Confidence is gained by expressing your Obsession and lost when experiencing Fear. 

Obsession

Obsession is your characters raison’d'etre, their purpose for being. There are five central types of Obsessions: Knowing, Feeling, Consuming, Creating, Destroying. Each represents a fundamental human nature, desire or purpose.

Knowing

can be as simple as learning about others emotions or secrets, or investigating a crime scene. Conversation is an easy way to fulfill this Obsession, reading a book or studying various topics are also good ways.

Feeling

Feeling is a tactile experience but can also be emotional. This Obsession relates to the need to be touched, held, loved or simply wanted, to feel euphoric. This can be accomplished through a plethora of means. Viewing art, listening to music, dancing, acting, watching TV, etc.

Consuming

Consumption regards, the desire to, obviously, eat but also encompasses the raw absorption of matter or “energy”. While knowing and feeling does not deplete things, consuming must deplete something: food, money.

Creating

Creation is the act of forming something new out of the surrounding world. It can be emotional, intellectual, spiritual or physical. The act of creating must result in an object, it does not have to be important, created through the process of regaining confidence.

Destroying

As its name would imply, Destruction regards the act of disassembly. This Obsession drives the character to dissect the world back into its component parts. Destroying is not necessarily an evil or cruel act. A child pulling wings off flies is simply an act of science. Thus, often times, scientists fall under the category of destroying more than knowing. Destruction is innately violent but no truly violent acts, especially on the helpless, can gain confidence. It requires a level of psychopathic behavior to gain Confidence from Harming humans, for that see Cruelty under Natures. However, sports like boxing or mischievous behaviors like destruction of property are admissible Obsessions, hell, even bar fights and hunting.

These Obsessions are generalized and each player will have to choose a specific circumstance or situation where it takes effect. For example, Sarah’s character has an Obsession of Feeling. She likes to feel excited and energized so she decides her character needs to go dancing and partying with others in order to regain Confidence. So when her Confidence is low she can go to a night club for a while and regain her spent Confidence points.

This process, of enacting your character’s Obsession, provides one point of confidence per hour of performing your Obsession. 

Fear

Experiencing Fear is not pleasant. It can wreak havoc on the nervous system and weaken the will. Fear represents your character’s weakness embodied. There are five types of Fear including: Loneliness, Violence, Failure, Truth and The Unknown.

Loneliness

This is a character’s Fear of solitude. When your character is confronted by absence they are forced to confront all the things in themselves they want to avoid. This could be the absence of friends, of beloved possessions, of absence from a specific place. All these constitute Loneliness.

Violence  

Is a terrible thing. It forces us to confront our mortality and comprehend the true extent of pain and suffering. This Fear is perhaps the most obvious, though some people respond to Fear more intensely than others, those who are truly terrified of violence suffer simply from seeing it. Obviously, this can make a combat oriented game difficult but can also offer a strangely interesting experience as your character must “look away from the blood” and “run and duck for cover” whenever a fight breaks out. The more dependent the character is on the person or thing, that they desire the presence of, the more severe the effect. The more accustomed the character is to, temporarily, not being around the person or thing and the likelihood of seeing it again effects the “distance” modifier.

Failure

Failure is the absence of success. When the player with this Fear fails an objective, not simply a roll, then the player suffers Fear. This does not mean a player who fails an attack roll must make a Perception check. It relates to much larger scale plans and goals like asking someone out you have had your eye on for some time or to have a book deal rejected. Losing a game or a possession through self-inflicted means like a poker game. When your character wants to get something done it is a very serious ordeal and Failure can be the scariest thing imaginable. The severity modifier is self-explanatory: the more the character wants to succeed; the more sever the failure. The distance modifier is defined by the danger related to failure. So if your character can lose something, money, property, the love of a friend, or anything of any remote value then the Fear will be more intense. Losing keys for example is not as serious unless the car is lost with them. Or you are stuck in a bad part of town, late at night, and your keys just fell down a drain. This situation can obviously insight a lot of Fears but that is how Fear works.

Truth

Represents the world as it really is. The darkness that exists not only in the supernatural but also in humanity itself. To experience this truth in any manor is terrifying. Your character Fears this truth. Whether that truth is about themselves or something beyond them, finding out it exists is terrifying. This is perhaps the most difficult Fear to understand but can result in some very interesting character personas. The distance modifier represents the quantity of information gained by the moment of truth. The severity represents the magnitude and un-believability of said truth.

The Unknown

Is not definable by virtue of its very nature. When a character, who possesses this as their Fear, is confronted by concepts, beings, object or places that defy explanation or understanding they suffer Fear. The unknown can be as simple as “where do we go from here” or as complicated as the Fear of something that has never happened and likely never will. A character with this Fear can activate the Fear simply by thinking of something upsettingly hard to comprehend. Distance represents the literal proximity to the unknown, hearing about it versus seeing it and, of course, experiencing it. The magnitude is a measure of awareness compared to the unknown. Being locked in a dark room alone with no memory of getting there is much more serious a representation of the unknown than getting lost on your way to work.

Effects of Fear

Suffering your Fear causes your character to lose a number of confidence equal to the severity of the Fear. Unlike Obsessions the character does not choose a specific circumstance in which the fear occurs. Instead the Fear occurs in varying levels of severity depending on the circumstance. If Sarah’s character is most afraid of Violence and then watches as a werewolf tears a human to pieces, she must take a Fear check and possibly be terrified out of her Confidence points. Fear severity can be calculated by taking into account the clarity of the Fear, the importance of the subject of the Fear compared with the level of involvement of the character. The character must then make a Perception check consisting of: Perception Resistance with any current Confidence the character chooses to spend on the roll. The number of successes are subtracted from the effect of the Fear. 


The game is built on a system of traits and talents. Traits are fundamental qualities of a characters being where Talents are learned skills. Talents seriously effect the characters ability to use equipment. Checks are performed by adding various combinations of Traits and Talents along with bonuses from equipment (or penalties) and rolling handfuls of six sided dice. Every roll can be effected by two main qualities: Confidence, which can be selectively used to enhance rolls; and Fatigue, which is subtracted from all rolls. in order to regain confidence the character must express their obsession. To reduce fatigue the character need only eat and sleep. Confidence is regained through the expression of an obsession. these obsesions can, essentially, be anything.
Combat is simple, based on competitive rolls between the attacker and defender. Health and Fatigue are inextricably bound so one hit can change the game as both characters tire from the fight and succumb to their wounds. 


The prizes range from PDF documents and Books to a series of hand Dyed and Printed rewards including a hand dyed and screen printed Tote bag or T-shirt,


or, for something more specific to the system, a hand dyed and printed fabric map of the town of DeepFall or a Hand Made, Dyed and Printed dice bag with 15, 6 sided, dice as shown below.


The book crrently stands at 170 pages. My expectation is roughly 250 but it could be more if this is successful. I want to devote real time to this project bt to do it I need help. All funds raised in this campaign will be used to pay for editors, illustrators/ graphic designers and, of course, the all important play testers. The release date is tentative and based on funding. 


The greatest danger is not finding enough artists or illustrators to properly fill the book and give it that sense of realness that all role players desire in their rule books. If this is the case I will have to make the images myself like I did with the maps and images for the video. 


If you cant afford to make a pledge then please share this campaign with your friends or email it to the owner of a local gaming shop! Anything can help this campaign succeed!

is an easy way to fulfill this Obsession, reading a book or studying various
topics are also good ways. 
Feeling
Feeling is a
tactile experience but can also be emotional. This Obsession relates to the
need to be touched, held, loved or simply wanted, to feel euphoric. This can be
accomplished through a plethora of means. Viewing art, listening to music,
dancing, acting, watching TV, etc. 
Consuming
Consumption regards,
the desire to, obviously, eat but also encompasses the raw absorption of matter
or “energy”. While knowing and feeling does not deplete things, consuming must
deplete something: food, money. 
Creating
Creation is the act
of forming something new out of the surrounding world. It can be emotional,
intellectual, spiritual or physical. The act of creating must result in an
object, it does not have to be important, created through the process of
regaining confidence. 
Destroying
As its name would
imply, Destruction regards the act of disassembly. This Obsession drives the
character to dissect the world back into its component parts. Destroying is not
necessarily an evil or cruel act. A child pulling wings off flies is simply an
act of science. Thus, often times, scientists fall under the category of
destroying more than knowing. Destruction
is innately violent but no truly violent acts, especially on the helpless, can
gain confidence. It requires a level of psychopathic behavior to gain
Confidence from Harming humans, for that see Cruelty under Natures. However,
sports like boxing or mischievous behaviors like destruction of property are
admissible Obsessions, hell, even bar fights and hunting. 
These Obsessions
are generalized and each player will have to choose a specific circumstance or
situation where it takes effect. For example, Sarah’s character has an Obsession
of Feeling. She likes to feel excited and energized so she decides her
character needs to go dancing and partying with others in order to regain
Confidence. So when her Confidence is low she can go to a night club for a
while and regain her spent Confidence points. 
This process, of
enacting your character’s Obsession, provides one point of confidence per hour
of performing your Obsession. 
Fear
Experiencing Fear
is not pleasant. It can wreak havoc on the nervous system and weaken the will. Fear
represents your character’s weakness embodied. There are five types of Fear
including: Loneliness, Violence, Failure, Truth and The Unknown. 
Loneliness
This is a
character’s Fear of solitude. When your character is confronted by absence they
are forced to confront all the things in themselves they want to avoid. This
could be the absence of friends, of beloved possessions, of absence from a specific
place. All these constitute Loneliness. 

Violence  
Is a terrible
thing. It forces us to confront our mortality and comprehend the true extent of
pain and suffering. This Fear is perhaps the most obvious, though some people
respond to Fear more intensely than others, those who are truly terrified of
violence suffer simply from seeing it. Obviously, this can make a combat
oriented game difficult but can also offer a strangely interesting experience
as your character must “look away from the blood” and “run and duck for cover”
whenever a fight breaks out. The more dependent the character is on the person
or thing, that they desire the presence of, the more severe the effect. The
more accustomed the character is to, temporarily, not being around the person
or thing and the likelihood of seeing it again effects the “distance” modifier.
Failure
Failure is the
absence of success. When the player with this Fear fails an objective, not simply a roll, then the player
suffers Fear. This does not mean a player who fails an attack roll must make a Perception
check. It relates to much larger scale plans and goals like asking someone out
you have had your eye on for some time or to have a book deal rejected. Losing
a game or a possession through self-inflicted means like a poker game. When
your character wants to get something done it is a very serious ordeal and
Failure can be the scariest thing imaginable. The severity modifier is
self-explanatory: the more the character wants to succeed; the more sever the
failure. The distance modifier is defined by the danger related to failure. So
if your character can lose something, money, property, the love of a friend, or
anything of any remote value then the Fear will be more intense. Losing keys
for example is not as serious unless the car is lost with them. Or you are
stuck in a bad part of town, late at night, and your keys just fell down a
drain. This situation can obviously insight a lot of Fears but that is how Fear
works. 
Truth
Represents the
world as it really is. The darkness that exists not only in the supernatural
but also in humanity itself. To experience this truth in any manor is
terrifying. Your character Fears this truth. Whether that truth is about
themselves or something beyond them, finding out it exists is terrifying. This
is perhaps the most difficult Fear to understand but can result in some very
interesting character personas. The distance modifier represents the quantity
of information gained by the moment of truth. The severity represents the
magnitude and un-believability of said truth. 
The
Unknown
Is not definable by
virtue of its very nature. When a character, who possesses this as their Fear,
is confronted by concepts, beings, object or places that defy explanation or understanding
they suffer Fear. The unknown can be as simple as “where do we go from here” or
as complicated as the Fear of something that has never happened and likely
never will. A character with this Fear can activate the Fear simply by thinking
of something upsettingly hard to comprehend. Distance represents the literal
proximity to the unknown, hearing about it versus seeing it and, of course,
experiencing it. The magnitude is a measure of awareness compared to the
unknown. Being locked in a dark room alone with no memory of getting there is
much more serious a representation of the unknown than getting lost on your way
to work.
Effects of Fear
Suffering your Fear causes your character to lose a
number of confidence equal to the severity of the Fear. Unlike Obsessions the
character does not choose a specific circumstance in which the fear occurs.
Instead the Fear occurs in varying levels of severity depending on the
circumstance. If Sarah’s character is most afraid of Violence and then watches
as a werewolf tears a human to pieces, she must take a Fear check and possibly
be terrified out of her Confidence points. Fear severity can be calculated by
taking into account the clarity of the Fear, the importance of the subject of
the Fear compared with the level of
involvement of the character. The character must then make a Perception check
consisting of: Perception Resistance with any current Confidence the character
chooses to spend on the roll. The number of successes are subtracted from the
effect of the Fear. 

The game is built on a system of traits and talents. Traits are fundamental qualities of a characters being where Talents are learned skills. Talents seriously effect the characters ability to use equipment. Checks are performed by adding various combinations of Traits and Talents along with bonuses from equipment (or penalties) and rolling handfuls of six sided dice. Every roll can be effected by two main qualities: Confidence, which can be selectively used to enhance rolls; and Fatigue, which is subtracted from all rolls. in order to regain confidence the character must express their obsession. To reduce fatigue the character need only eat and sleep. Confidence is regained through the expression of an obsession. these obsesions can, essentially, be anything.

Combat is simple, based on competitive rolls between the attacker and defender. Health and Fatigue are inextricably bound so one hit can change the game as both characters tire from the fight and succumb to their wounds. 






The prizes range from PDF documents and Books to a series of hand Dyed and Printed rewards including a hand dyed and screen printed Tote bag or T-shirt,




or, for something more specific to the system, a hand dyed and printed fabric map of the town of DeepFall or a Hand Made, Dyed and Printed dice bag with 15, 6 sided, dice as shown below.





The book crrently stands at 170 pages. My expectation is roughly 250 but it could be more if this is successful. I want to devote real time to this project bt to do it I need help. All funds raised in this campaign will be used to pay for editors, illustrators/ graphic designers and, of course, the all important play testers. The release date is tentative and based on funding. 
   


The greatest danger is not finding enough artists or illustrators to properly fill the book and give it that sense of realness that all role players desire in their rule books. If this is the case I will have to make the images myself like I did with the maps and images for the video. 
   

If you cant afford to make a pledge then please share this campaign with your friends or email it to the owner of a local gaming shop! Anything can help this campaign succeed!

story:
First All-in-One VR Headset

All in One Headset is the future of VR! Our product is the FIRST All-in-One VR Headset on Indiegogo! Light and convenient! This means you don’t need to connect your VR headset to your phone or laptop anymore! Our product has its own operation system based on Android 5.1. You can also save your movies, videos and games into its storage card! Stop wearing a phone on your head! Being a phone holder is not cool!

Wireless and Portable

Our VR Headset is Wireless and Portable. You can connect our VR Headset with your phone, game controller, laptop or TV by Bluetooth. This makes VR movies and games more convenient to watch and play!

11o Degree Wide Field of View

Our product delivers 110 degree field of view(FOV), much wider than Samsung Gear. Wider screen brings you a total different experience. You can pick up more details in movies and games. If you can buy a 54 Inch TV, you don’t need to pick a 50 Inch.

Fastest Processor
RK3288 Quad-Core CPU and Mali-T764 GPU. Maybe you have no idea of these chips, here is one word to explain them: FAST! Whatever 3D, VR, multi-window videos or games you have, our VR Headsets deal with them easily. Throw away game and video lags, embrace a live experience! Instead of walking, RK3288 allows you to fly!

Compatible with Dominant Devices

Our VR Headset is compatible with all dominant bluetooth devices. You can use our headset for PS3, Wii, Ipad, Iphone, Android, laptop, Surface, game controller, MP4, or even a Gameboy, as long as they have Bluetooth connection!

Sextuple Eye Protection

Most people focus on the experience that VR brings them. However, not many companies pay attention to eye health. With so close a screen to your eyes, customers often feel dry eyes. With this concern, we ZXK protect your eyes in six different ways. With our sextuple eye protection, you will feel much more comfortable with your eyes.

Besides, our headset fit those who wear glasses, but you can see clearly on our headset without glasses. Yes, our headset is compatible with naked eyes even with myopia.

Fashion Elements

We have both fashion and industry design teams. We introduce fashion concept into our product. Why? Because VR technology is very cool, and so should be wearing VR! Traditional VR Headsets are ugly designed, which make you look stupid wearing them, like wearing a giant black box. However, wearing ZXK VR Headset is more of fashion. This product is ready to show off in front of your friends. You will stand out in any crowd!

Moreover, our designers make our systems and UI more friendly and simple to use. No need to deal with mess!

More Usages

Most customers think VR Headset is only for movies and games. Tell you what, our product fits much more than you can imagine! No Matter what you do, I believe you can find a better chance with our VR Headset! Contact us for more usages of ZXK VR Headset.

story:
We at Erocona are here with the scariest game “Merendam2”. It is well-made ‘Room Escape” game as well as previous game “Merendam1 ” Please take a look all of the things we’ve made, we hope you to support our project!!



  A mobile adventure horror game set in creepy surroundings where your objective is to escape a ghost infested village that is isolated and deserted. You will need to use your wits and keen observation skills to figure out the proper tools you need and decipher clues. . As you can see in the video ghost comes out randomly, if you deal with the proper action you can escape from ghost not dead.


Several images


The rectangle shaped village. In the outside of spot, there is an old Korean traditional house. There is a widespread rumor ghost haunts which result in all of the people living leaves after Eun-jin dies. Not only did the girl damage, also the pianist, girl ghost did. Yu-ha and So-dam didn’t escape and lived in a house which had been kept ancestrally.In conclusion, they got involved in a ghost accident and the house has been trackless and deserted since then.


Merendam2 starts in an earlier timeline than Merendam1. In a decaying town, deserted and ghostly, two sisters are the last ones left nearby. Find out the new challenges and how the stories twisted. In the gloomy and spooky environment, you'll wander through every locked door and have to solve using all shabby tools.


  We are inspired the following both of games. We reflected Integrated and strengthened elements of well-made games from each genre

* By adopting Limbo’s simple side scroller layout, Optimized UI that flexibly changes according to the environment.

* By adopting The Room’s puzzles and deduction elements made Hints and answers change each time you play

*  By adopting Five Night at Freddy’s scary, create an atmosphere of terror for game surroundings much darker and horrible

* And  Various actions to survive crisis situations


The concrete game-play

(Merendam 1 play shot)

*  At first page, there are options for languages, you are able to select

(Merendam 1 play shot)
* There come up the red and blue circle to your movement. Drag your character in a left or right direction. The smaller circle means that there are paths nearby.


(Merendam 1 play shot)

* To obtain some items means that they should be used properly to play the game.


(Merendam 1 play shot)

* Anyone cannot expect when, where ghosts appear thus be always ready to keep your mind awake and move your fingers actively. .

 * The best way to master this game perfectly is that you solve all passwords at unlocked doors. In the process, you will need to exert your memory exploring the game. Every number all around buildings can be a hint.



  She is 15 years old girl and wearing in simply modernized hanbok that is Korean traditional cloth. She had basically spiritual ability but couldn’t see the ghost for a while. As grown up as a very little girl, she has gotten an ability to see the ghost. Yu-ha who has different spiritual ability accepted yin energy and have nightmare surrounded by the ghost. She is Yu-ha's younger sister.


  she seems to be extremely having much anxiety due to her weak sister. She who doesn’t have that strong psychic ability is not able to see a ghost. She was overwhelmed by the ghost and dispirited spiritually by the ghost around Yu-ha. She had owned estates for generations. Being a successor of authentic culture, she made kinds of potteries.


  Died at 11 years old and an orphan no parents. She was adopted from an orphanage but it was intended trick for being supported. There was not existed caring or affection for the little girl. A teddy bear was the only one friend who was beside her at an abused atmosphere. Internal organs get slipped under a suspender skirt. She was not meant to be violent but her character has been wilder and aggressive immediately after influenced by Eun-jin. She has the strong attachment to the teddy bear and is mischievous.


  17 years old and the first victim who was killed of being possessed by evil spirit. After Eun-jin dies, people also left the village. She walks twisting her body and Iron plates are stuck in head. The Results of aiming at Eun-jin were that eyes were sunken and mouth got ripped exposing muscles. She hates living things and attempts to kill them.


  She was killed by falling lightings from  a stage. Her skull was dented and a brain is seen. Something like fragments seems to be stuck in. Originally, she was blond curly hair but changed into is filled with lots of knots and tangles and a body is covered in blood. She was so ambitious that she wanders heavens still. The main places are her music academy she operated and practiced. The Piano sound is resounded softly in a deserted piano academy. An unrealized dream makes her have loads of grudges and living things become an object of hatred for her. Because of Her act of brutality,  all people living in that village could not help but run out of their home and Eun-jin was possessed  to be killed by a ghost.


*  Support 10 languages on all devices worldwide

- Merendam2 supports 10 languages and our game is so compact that you can download either from Android and IOS just in 43MB.

* Added 3 more inventory

- The inventory has been increased from two slots to three as per requested. (And much more items have been added.

* More Complicated Puzzle but More exciting.

- New types of puzzles have been added and the overall gameplay has been upgraded to be more complex but solvable with a keen observation. Also, Support with no ghost mode for those who do not prefer the dreadful background ghost haunts

* Upgraded Graphic and Scaring props

- Graphics have been greatly improved and many shock points have been added to create an improved (scary) atmosphere in the game.




Physical item will be different to the uploaded image!

* All rewards will be sent  to you after finishing the project and estimated delivery date could be changeable.




    Your name on our main site with eternal gratitude

    1 Cradle (1 Item will be sent to you randomly)


    2 Cradles + Mini Art Book


    Select One of the Both (1 Item will be sent yo you randomly)

        option 1 - Supplementary battery + 2 Cradles + Mini Art Book

                                                                  or

        option 2 - OTG USB(Soundtrack) + 2 Cradles + Mini Art-Book


    Supplementary battery + OTG USB(Soundtrack) + Mini Art-Book


    Select One of the Both

        option 1 - 2 Supplementary batteries + 2 Cradles + Mini Art-Book
                                                                  or

        option 2 - 2 OTG USB(Soundtrack) + 2 Cradles + Mini Art-Book


  2 Supplementary batteries + 2 OTG USB(Soundtrack) + 2 Cradles + Mini Art-Book


  2 Supplementary batteries + 2 OTG USB(Soundtrack) + 2 Cradles + Mini Art-Book


  The Picture Placement for Only first twenty people in the Game for a year. 

  Send us a clear picture of your face, not any weird, disgusting. we will frame it up somewhere in the game!  and only accept size 256*512.

  (Your picture will be modified to match the game style.) 

  Your name in Credit and in the main official site with eternal gratitude by each member of our team.



I got a great review rating on the play store and got greenlit in just 6 days on steam, but as there was no promotion done for the game so it did not reach as many players as I expected. Since the game was released, it's been awhile not to release new work due to a poor condition. Nevertheless, we've been keeping working on the project.                

We know How much mobile game exists on an app and How easy players find horror game among them. So, we've eager to make the supreme work as best as we could in animation, Sound, 3D, the whole parts.  It means that all technical, emotional parts of the game are all formed lively, closely on the trace of the Korean accent and all characters who have different stories, personalities, abilities become the uniqueness of our game the most we believe.

We hope to get feedback before the game is finished And also, get enough funds to work on Merendam 3 and 4 without any side jobs distracting us.                             Check out Merendam 1 via the links on their Indiegogo page, and if you liked our game, please support whatever amount you feel suitable.

For the better future, we’ll produce more excellent new series of Merendam by adopting and reflexing all opinions in hopeful environments.

 Now it's time to be evaluated and supported by all of you. 

Please be a supporter for us.

The campaign is over but you can still pre-order the game.
> > Buy Hacker Experience 2 < <
Watch the interview with CC and translations
