story:
Who am i and what do i do!

Hello, my name is Dmitri.I live in a small country called - Estonia. I've been learning game development for 1.5 years now, using Unity3D software. Im trying to start a company of free games for Android, but i have a problem...The problem is - money. I dont have it. Right now i'm working on a competitive space shooter game called "TapShooter".

Gameplay:


1: Gameplay has 2 aimers that move automatically between 3 positions, depending on where the enemy spaceships come from.

2: Players must tap the right or left sides of screen to shoot, depending which aimer they want to trigger.
3: The longer you play, the faster flying ships will be and the quantity of them increases also.


It's almost done and when i release it, i want to continue creating free games for Google Play. I have lots of ideas and im really creative. I dream, that one day i will have my own team and together we will develop games.




What i need the money for?

         I need the money to actually improve my art ingame and  to properly release it. Need to buy publisher license + use some on advertisement,so the game will be noticed.

What do you get?  

You will be able to connect to facebook and compete with your friends. Game will have currency system (Coins or C), so everyone who will donate to this project will be receiving that currency in TapShooter. There will also be an early access to the game.If you donate 10$ or more, i will send you the link to download the early version. THE BIG THANKS to everyone,who even read the project :)

If goal is not reached, i will still use the money for my project and advance the quality of art! Whether the goal is reached or not, i will do my best to complete the game, so all the people could have more fun in the world of gaming!


Things i want to improve

I want to improve the art of following things:
1: Enemy spaceships
2: Friendly spaceships
3: Spaceships that provide HP
4: Boss spaceships (there will be 6 boss spaceships,that will provide different bonuses if you shoot them down. Examples: 15% HP, 200 score etc)
5: Shop art (icons)
6: All interface UI (This one will probably take most of the money, because i really want interface to be very sci fi, so player would feel like they are in a spaceship, shooting down aliens)

The Impact

        By playing this game, you practice your reaction and focus, by focusing on every enemy and shooting them at the right moment.

        I believe that more games should be free to play. I sure start small, but one day i hope to make it BIG TIME and do all kind of games. I was thinking about starting my own company, that would make free games for Android/IOS, but then again i need more money. The world of gaming is big, to make it somewhere one must work hard and i am sure working hard, every little free time i get.

Risks & Challenges

       At the moment the lack of money is the biggest risk, that my project will fail. I can code and do some work in photoshop, but making good art for my games is not my good side. I've been looking for artist to help me on deviantArt and other artistic websites, but there's not that many people willing to work for free.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're a good artist or a programmer yourself, or maybe you just interested in my project and are willing to help me,please contact me: danteson123@gmail.com       this is my personal email.

Also, please share the project with your friends on social medias :)

The most important...Keep it cool :)
Thanks, 

Dmitri.

story:
View the progress of Dispersion here: www.dispersiongame.com

       


                              

Be part and help make the first complex RPG augmented reality game. The game is almost done and promising to ship in June if it gets funded. The game will be made no matter what. I need your help because I really want to see this game in it's full potential and most importantly time to finish the game. I want to add much more waves, items, spells and make it as polished and epic as I possibly can. 

                         

Dispersion is an Augmented Reality RPG/Hack-n-Slash Survival Game for Android, iOS, Google glasses and Microsoft HoloLens.


It's a survival RPG where you have to slay wave after wave of high quality creatures by placing wards and traps to reach the end or as high level as you can. You must combine (or use alone in abundance) traps, wards, spells and perks to create a certain play style, be it long range kiting, permanent stun build or melee damage stacking. 

                     

                          

15% tower defense 85% Hack 'n Slash 

100% RPG Customization 


                           


It's a RPG in the sense of wide character customization but not only in STATS,  in different play-styles and character builds to specialize  your character in the best way you think. 

Knowing what every creature on the map is going to do, quickly planning future abilities and attacks and coming up with new play styles that works out the most effective is all what this game is about!
 Casting epic spells on your desk. What more do you want?

       

Thanks to augmented reality technology the game makes use of your smartphone's camera to scan and track the environment and then physicaly place virtual characters on your desk, lawn or wherever you choose! The characters are fixed on the surface so you can use your camera to look all around them as if they were actually there. 



There must find the most efficient, practical and productive build/way of playing to specialize in your own unique field.
                

The game won't be easy but you won't ever get stuck for hours, there will always be some other play style you can discover that will work more productively.  
I dream to make one of the most focused mob directing top-down hack-n-slash PVE + PVP only arena game,  To sum it up it's a wave survival, RPG, endless skillful arena brawl, the Diablo 3 pvp i've been dreaming about. I hope to achieve the epicness of battling in Diablo, the perfect timing from Dota and the epic spells of World of warcraft combined into one and hopefully more complex game, the thing i'm looking forward to is the browser based pvp matches. The game engine I use allows games to be run natively in web browsers so no plugin downloading is required.  I absolutely adore the mechanics in these games and are always looking for more unique ways of character specialization to put into the game, For me the more complex and the more different paths of character specialization the better the game is. (I have played allot of Warcraft 3 and most of the popular and unpopular custom maps.)
The mob directing, spec/build system is very unique in this game that's why we are also making it for other platforms that is not augmented reality. (It would be a waste if we didn't) We plan on making it for Microsoft Hololens and Google glasses.

-The game will also be ported to internet browsers (Non AR) so the epicness of the pvp in this game can be enjoyed straight on almost all browsers without needing to download a plugin!


                         

Just imagine  wave after wave of intricate creatures on your table by skillfully 

selecting the most effective combination of 

abilities and traps, !

                 

You can view the game close-up, from a distance or from an angle. You have the camera to the spirit world.

Only if you go all out in one character specialization using a combination of traps,wards, perks and spells will you be able reach the end.
A few examples are a pure range dps build, a regenerating melee build, a kiting build or choose a  perfect complementary balance it's up to you!
Pop these creatures out literally anywhere, on your floor, couch, bosses table, (don't worry he won't be able to see them) (unless he also has the game installed on his phone, and helps you battle hordes of creatures on insanity mode)
                                       
There is bound to be over-powered combinations but they will be extremely difficult to find.

  Use gold, buffs, spells or melee/range (alone or in combination) to create

the most effective top-down hack 'n slash slayer ever!

  Random perk level up system.

  It's an intricate hack 'n' slash game that takes place in reality.

  Choose how you want to play kite, cast, range dps or melee with a  combination of wards, traps, spells and perk abilities.


Each monster has its own way of fighting, thinking and has a unique personality.   Members of the same species or origins will work together while staying neutral to other species, but all still hating your guts of course.


                    

Every level you gain, you get to choose one from a set of 6 random perks that gets selected from a huge pool (similar to the survival epic Crimsonland) They consist of instant buffs, wacky risky perks and passives that last you through the game. Spells will pop up as an onscreen button.                                

                                               

After each level up you can also choose 2 of 4 benefits to add to your characters Health, Intellect, Strength or Gold. 

You can buy and upgrade your wards and traps with gold. which you get from killing monsters, perks and other subtle ways. You get traps that hook, launch, slow, burn, banish, teleport or amplify damage received  (and that's not even mentioning wards!)

Create a permanent stun,slowing range, damage per second, life steal or place money generators everywhere and kite them all around till you have enough for a few incendiary mines. 

             


An example of one build is that you won't use any of the damage capabilities of traps, but only amplify your characters damage, or use slow and stun traps and cast spells from a distance. 


                              


AAA Quality Models

Squint your eyes and make the two images one to see it in 3D


"I was playing on the floor and my friend walked pass and I shouted wait!! you're gonna step on them..."  I felt really silly after that -Anita Tromp

It get's that immersive, after a while it literally feels like they are really there! 

                                                       

The Tale of Dispersion

Dispersion is about a hero who’s trapped between the spirit world and our everyday world. To everyday folk like you and I, these demonic creatures are invisible. His phone somehow got corrupted while building an app, that made him able to see spirit creatures. He then somehow who knows how got trapped between the two but luckily the app still exists. It's up to you to use the cursed app and guide him to the final wave and kill Tyrkul for his fractal stone so he can use it to return to this word once more and forever shifts-deletes this horrible app.  

-Image Tracker

To activate the augmented reality feature, you simply print out the image tracker on an A4 piece of paper and point your phone or tablet at it.

Thanks to recently invented technology the tracking algorithm software such as Vuforia's SDK and deferred lighting, rendering is far better than years ago.
  •  Anywhere touch joystick buttons.
  •  User interface scales with screen size resolution.
  •  Extended tracking so the image target doesn't always have to be in view.
  •  Using vision-based computing.
  •  No in-app purchases ever.


                     


Just a few random perks you can choose after each level up:


Campaign Perk 5 (Assassin Daggers) 

You and only people choosing this perk will receive a pair of these bad boys. They slot in nicely next to your boots. They come with a UI button which you can cast a exclusive ability: fan of knifes.  

Campaign Perk 6 (Signed Poster)

You can also use this poster as a tracker for the game! The game world will appear much larger than using an A4 paper tracker.


Campaign Perk 8 (Special Minion 'The Baby')

You will receive a minion baby that follows you around. He will have no effect on the game except with the last boss.


             


Campaign Perk 10 (Krasue Companion + Unique Perk)

She will follow you around.  She has one buff ability and Haunting Scream.


It's game mechanics that makes a game good!

A good game isn't only a good story and graphics, but the unique mechanics that makes the gameplay. This was the most difficult challenge so all my energy and thought went into this. At the end it came out as I dreamed, with a creative and skilled character building system with different unique ways of playing.


The game is taking longer than expected and I'm running out of money, I need the funds for time to finish the game, more creature models, which mean way more waves and I need expensive plugins to make the game perform well on as most mobile devices possible. There is no music and little sound in the game yet and the user interface needs to be reworked from scratch.

  1. $ 2,200 for high quality models.
  2. $ 1,150 for plugins. I need plugins to optimize the models for mobile e.g. a plugin to merge all the materials into one so there is 1 draw call instead of 50 and Vuforia the SDK to make it Augmented Reality costs $500 alone.
  3. $ 650 User interface framework and 2D artwork for the UI.
  4. $ 1,500 for Unity Pro to have real time soft shadows, no slash screen and to basically have better graphics, so it will run smoother and so the final game file will be smaller.
  5. $2,400 Time
  6. $800 Music score and sound effects.


$10 000 Goal Reach 

I will make the game with an awesome detailed environment (so it won't be Augmented Reality) and port it also to Windows Phone 8, Blackberry, PC, Mac, PS Vita, PS4 and Xbox ONE/360 . We think the player vs monster mechanics is just so intricate and the amount of spells that already exist in the game not to also make the game playable in other formats.
+ Special mode where you can can train any creature on any wave level that will be by your side throughout the game. He will level up with you, battle and help you when you are in need.

$15 000 Goal Reach 

+ Online and local multiplayer (PvP and Co-Op) will be implemented as well as many more creatures, spells and waves. I have never done any multiplayer so I have to learn that from scratch.  I can only imagine how awesome it must be playing with your friend on your coffee table.

$20 000 Goal Reach 

Once I reach this I will take 2 weeks and make a step by step tutorial on how I made this game for absolute beginners and give it to ALL BACKERS.  I will give you links to where you can get the plugins, free software and free 3D animated models. You will basically be able to make a very small version of this game in a week or so i'm not joking it's that easy. (Will also give you all the character control and attack scripts so you can just import those) 

Reviews and feedback

@DispersionAR Best idea i ever see for a game 

— محمد الحمّاد (@m7mmdpro) March 28, 2015

For an Augmented Reality RPG/Hack 'n Slash Survival Game,check out @DispersionAR. Please help support the campaign for this possible gem.

— Timmy Robinson (@ObielDeNook) March 26, 2015

Thanks for the follow @DispersionAR ! Your project looks awesome!

— Gabe Kontrovitz (@GabeKontrovitz) March 27, 2015

Please help make this augmented reality game a reality!

  • Invite these little creatures into your home.
  • All backers above $60 will receive a copy of my next 2 epic games!

  • With your help, I can complete Dispersion and keep experimenting with interesting technologies (as independent game developers should be able to.) Help me make Dispersion and let your friends know about this epic AR survival.

About Me

I am an one man team with my girlfriend helping me with graphic ideas . I have been a 3D artist for 7 years and have been making incredibly small games since I was 12 with excel and really old website makers : /. I have loved game design since I was a young kid. Making visual rpg games with turn to page 38 to go here books and 2D static platformers. I then left game design and only did 3D graphics for a very long time. Some time ago I left my job and went back to my first passion game design and did websites on the side for money. I am that passionate about game design! There is nothing in life I would want to do more than designing games not even presidency. The game is in alpha stage and I need the funds for more models, figure out how the hell multiplayer works , the user interface, music, sound and time to complete the project.Getting funded will mean the world to me. I will continue designing games which in return will make the world a little more of a creative place. Hopefully I can make a change in someone's life (even if it's small and subtle), because I know playing games as a kid changed my point of view of the world in the most subtle ways.

                    

If You Can't Donate There Other Ways You Can Help For Sure!

  • Talk about it on a forum that you are active on.

  • Use the share buttons on the left. It will really help immensely!! 

If I can get funded I can create many more unique games with unique mechanics . Who knows, some AAA game company in the future might implement 1 unique feature that I though of. So you would be responsible for that new game mechanic and the world of gaming will be better and more complex! And if we can reach the final stretch goal we will teach all our backers (for those who are interested) how to make a very simple version of this game with no need of 3d modeling or programming.

story:
Hey team! We're doing an Indiegogo campaign to supplement our Kickstarter funding. The game's being made but we fell a little short of a stretch goal everyone seemed to want. So our promise is this: if we hit £3,000 on Indiegogo we'll make two games instead of one, and all our backers (both here and from Kickstarter) will get this new 8-bit version of the game, Chime Flat, for free.

Before we say anything else this is important: we've already built a working demo of Chime Sharp. Go and play it! And definitely, definitely come back when you're done, because if you back us right now you'll get a downloadable two (imminently three!) level demo featuring Chipzel and Andy Hung.

WebGL (newer browsers): http://chimegame.com/game?lib=webgl

Unity (older browsers): game.chimegame.com

Steam (PC only at the moment): chimegame.com/steamdemo

OK. Hi. I'm Ste. I'll keep this brief: In 2009 I directed a brilliant game called Chime. Now we've Kickstarted a sequel, which we're building with the help of our brilliant backers -- and if enough people join us here on Indiegogo we'll make a second chiptune / 8-bit version of the game, Chime Flat.

Chime is a music puzzle game, initially prototyped by "The Lab", a team I ran while I worked at Zoë Mode. People have compared it to Lumines, but I always describe it as part-sequencer, part-Tetris. You place pieces on a grid and those pieces are read as sounds by a beatline. As you tessellate the pieces to cover the playfield you both augment and progress through a piece of music. 

Gamespot called it "captivating and inventive"; IGN said it was "easy to get sucked into"; and I gave it 7/10 on my radio show, the highest score we've given anything! How's that for ethics?

Chime is both addictive and ambient, competitive and relaxing. But this is a music game -- words can't do it justice -- and the best way to understand is to play. So we've made that possible: you can spend some time with an early alpha build of Chime Sharp right here. Hopefully you've already done that. Hi.

[And hopefully you want more than one level, one mode, one piece of music and one set of blocks. Get this: there's already more. If you back Chime Sharp right now you'll receive a download of the three-level version of the game as it stands, the moment the Indiegogo campaign finishes. That means a playable PC version with two more levels and two more tracks, by the brilliant Chipzel (Super Hexagon) and the equally amazing Andy Hung (F*** Buttons), and you'll continue to receive updates as we move towards release. There are also tiers that allow you access to the work-in-progress dev version and access to the design group.]

OK. Good question. I've been playing the "hypothetical sequel to Chime" game in my head for five years. As soon as the chance to do this arrived I knew exactly what I wanted:  

  • Chime Sharp needs new music (How many? Minimum 12 new artists, 12 new grids)
  • Chime Sharp needs a new aesthetic (It does? Sure: blocks don't have to be boring, and neon is so 2009) 
  • Chime Sharp needs new rules and ways to play (What are they? Hm. I have some ideas, but we need some time to try them)

The last bullet point is a bit vague, I know. I can be more specific: I want to fix some of the things I still find broken and dissonant in Chime -- balance the Fragments, encourage Perfect Quads, improve the relationship between the music and the game -- and try some new rules too. That's the part of the future I can't see yet. I'd like a ruleset that removes the timer, I'd like a shorter form of the game, but we need some space to see what works, and that isn't as simple as it sounds. The most important thing is to not break what makes Chime Chime. 

So: Chime Sharp will be a prettier version of the game that everyone loves, distilled, with extra game modes and all new music. And again, you can already get a glimpse by playing the demo you've already played. Right? RIGHT? Right.

It's a standalone version of Chime with 2D visuals and a chiptune soundtrack. Like 8bit Chime, if 8bit meant "hey, this is all a bit pixelly and has a reduced palette" which it seems to, these days. 

Chime Flat was initially a  stretch goal that we didn't reach during our Kickstarter campaign but it's such a good idea and I really don't want to let go of it. It's an opportunity to try something different with Chime -- a shorter version of the game with an arcade spirit. We know everyone wants more levels, more songs, and we also know some people prefer straight-up 2D visuals to Chime Sharp's new 3D thing.

We've also had a lot of chiptune artists contact us with a view to getting their music in the game. That genre of music works really well with Chime and anyone who's ever heard One Life Left will know how fond I am of wonky bleeps and bass-y saw waves. It's important that Chime Sharp's soundtrack stays cross-genre and diverse, but producing a themed, light version of the game with that sort of music in mind feels like the good idea.

We didn't make the stretch goal. We still want to do it. So what happens now? 

Here's the deal; we finished about £3k short of that goal on Kickstarter. If we reach £3,000 here then every backer -- on Indiegogo or on Kickstarter -- will receive a DRM-free PC version of Chime Flat for free.


The main risk with any videogame crowdfunding campaign is this: will it actually get made? Making games is expensive and always more expensive than you expect. But Chime Sharp already has a publisher, and (to a limited extent) already exists. Those who back will receive something for their money. The scope of that thing depends somewhat on the total pledged, but Chime Sharp is provably "real" already.

The other risk is whether any of the modes we hope to try will work. Early access backers will get to judge that for themselves as they arrive (and perhaps leave) the Laboratory section of the build. In the very worst case scenario, where no improvements can be made, Chime Sharp will exist as a beautiful, polished version of Chime 1. I'd be happy with that, and I think most of our backers would be too.

Hey team! We're doing an Indiegogo campaign to supplement our Kickstarter funding. The game's being made but we fell a little short of a stretch goal everyone seemed to want. So our promise is this: if we hit £3,000 on Indiegogo we'll make two games instead of one, and all our backers (both here and from Kickstarter) will get this new 8-bit version of the game, Chime Flat, for free.

Before we say anything else this is important: we've already built a working demo of Chime Sharp. Go and play it! And definitely, definitely come back when you're done, because if you back us right now you'll get a downloadable two (imminently three!) level demo featuring Chipzel and Andy Hung.
WebGL (newer browsers): http://chimegame.com/game?lib=webgl
Unity (older browsers): game.chimegame.com
Steam (PC only at the moment): chimegame.com/steamdemo

OK. Hi. I'm Ste. I'll keep this brief: In 2009 I directed a brilliant game called Chime. Now we've Kickstarted a sequel, which we're building with the help of our brilliant backers -- and if enough people join us here on Indiegogo we'll make a second chiptune / 8-bit version of the game, Chime Flat.



Chime is a music puzzle game, initially prototyped by "The Lab", a team I ran while I worked at Zoë Mode. People have compared it to Lumines, but I always describe it as part-sequencer, part-Tetris. You place pieces on a grid and those pieces are read as sounds by a beatline. As you tessellate the pieces to cover the playfield you both augment and progress through a piece of music. 



Gamespot called it "captivating and inventive"; IGN said it was "easy to get sucked into"; and I gave it 7/10 on my radio show, the highest score we've given anything! How's that for ethics?
Chime is both addictive and ambient, competitive and relaxing. But this is a music game -- words can't do it justice -- and the best way to understand is to play. So we've made that possible: you can spend some time with an early alpha build of Chime Sharp right here. Hopefully you've already done that. Hi.
[And hopefully you want more than one level, one mode, one piece of music and one set of blocks. Get this: there's already more. If you back Chime Sharp right now you'll receive a download of the three-level version of the game as it stands, the moment the Indiegogo campaign finishes. That means a playable PC version with two more levels and two more tracks, by the brilliant Chipzel (Super Hexagon) and the equally amazing Andy Hung (F*** Buttons), and you'll continue to receive updates as we move towards release. There are also tiers that allow you access to the work-in-progress dev version and access to the design group.]

story:
Quick Introduction

I created Vainglory DB as a reference for Vainglory stats, to make it as easy as possible for players to understand the various aspects of the game. 
A lot of people asked for a dedicated mobile companion and I'd love to build one! So I need your help - funding this project allows me to take time off work, and will cover my living expenses while I build the app.  
If you want to see the prototype, just scroll down!

App Features

  • Explore complete stats for Vainglory Heroes, Items & Abilities.
  • Sort Features - Do things like "Find me the hero with the best attack".
  • Quicksearch - just start typing the name of something for when you need to find stats fast (during a game).
  • Works totally offline - making it fast and reliable!
  • Always up to date - the app auto-updates the database so you'll always have the latest stats.
  • 100% free for everyone (no ads).

Enough Jibber-Jabber, Let's See The Prototype!

Abilities Overview


Hero - Detailed Stats


Ability - Detailed Stats


But What About iOS?

If the campaign reaches $2,000 I'll build the iOS version too!  I started with Android because I find it quicker to prototype with.

Risks & Challenges

  • Intellectual Property - SuperEvilMegaCorp were kind enough to give their permission for me to use some of their intellectual property for this project (so there should be no issues getting past the Play Store submission).
  • Funding Goal Isn't Met - The app will still be built, but it will take longer to do so (since I'll have to do regular work at the same time). 

Help Fund The App by Sharing It With Your Vainglory Friends!

story:
RUNNER2U: BECAUSE THE WORLD SHOULDN’T RUN YOU DOWN

Short Summary

What’s up Indiegogoers?

First things first, we can’t thank you enough for checking out our RUNNER2U app! However, no doubt having availed of numerous pickup and delivery services you might be persuaded to question: What is so great about our app?

RUNNER2U app is nothing like anything you have ever seen before and offers a modern twist in the dreary delivery tale. In fact we actually thought of creating the app when we delved deep and realized how monotonous the delivery services were actually getting! Those have trickled down into a commercial transaction rather than being something more intimate, you know? We came up with a few ways to rectify the problem in the RUNNER2U app:

·  You can either become a Customer by offering jobs to those who really need it or a Runner (a transporter/ delivery man/ helper) who would be able to earn money or some cool rewards. Want to be both a Customer and a Runner? You got it!

·   Our app is based on the belief that your transaction with a Runner or a Customer can be beneficial to both of you. So if you want to get some things done like surprising your Valentine, paying your utility bills or buying your groceries or any other run of the mill jobs, you can engage in the services of a Runner.

·  The best part? You don’t have to part with your hard earned money at all! You can opt to remunerate your Runner with a cup of coffee or a lunch package. Crave free meals or a vintage watch? Run some errands and you might just be lucky!



What We Need & What You Get

We at RUNNER2U charge absolutely nothing when you download our app through Android and iOS platforms. Moreover, 100% of the rewards or the honorarium is directly provided to the Runner from the Customer. Unlike other apps in the market, we won’t sneakily lynch off any commission or percentage that you might be getting from any transaction that you conduct on our app.

You can only imagine how difficult it might be to raise the adequate funds to keep up the marketing campaign to counter the competition in the market and emerge as the best. We hate to ask you this but a contribution of USD$ 25,000 would really go a long way in helping us develop and market this app within the deadline of March 2016. We would love to share our resources with you in exchange for your contribution.

Do your bit and we’ll try to amaze you!

1.USD 1 – A thank you note will be email to you for your generosity.

2.USD 5  – We will share your generosity with our facebook fan.

3.USD 15 – An exclusive Runner2u keychain for you 

4. USD 25 - 1 unit of iTag wireless bluetooth key finder Keychain.

5. USD 75 - 1 unit of iTag wireless bluetooth key finder Keychain + 1 "Runner2u" t-shirt.

6. USD 100 - 3 units of iTag wireless bluetooth key finder Keychain + 1 piece "Runner2u" t-shirt + 1 Eco friendly laptop bag.

7. USD 350 - 5 units of iTag wireless bluetooth key finder Keychain + 3 "Runner2u" t-shirt + 1 Eco friendly laptop bag + 1 Eco friend Sports Water Bottle."

All contributors’ name (USD 1 – USD350) will be displayed on our Facebook Page.


The Impact

The RUNNER2U app has been specifically targeted to the students who want to earn some extra money without the need to compromise on their academic career. On the other hand, as a Customer, this might be your only chance to give back something of your success to the community while relieving yourself of the burden of chores.


Risks & Challenges

It is only natural that you would be skeptical of the RUNNER2U app as it is completely free. But we subject all our users to a thorough background check so you need not worry. When you find an offer by a Customer popping up, you as a Runner would be able to choose whether to accept, decline or negotiate to your heart’s content. Each Runner and Customer would have a rating based on his previous job and those with below than average ratings would be immediately banned. All the users would be required to provide their driving license image during the registration procedure. You can be sure that the person you are interacting with has been validated and is not just masquerading as a ghost account. Your safety and convenience is our ultimate goal.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren’t willing to make a monetary contribution, you can email us with any other help that you might have in mind. Even a good thought would count once you let us Run to You!

story:
Princess Of Desire is an otome visual novel under development by Eternal Ninja Gaming, available on PC, Mac and Linux. It fits into the fantasy romance genre and hopefully enjoyable for our target audience of 16 – 30 (and plus if it’s your thing!)

We have a small team working on this game, with an 8 person team each with individual roles, we aim to make this game as enjoyable as possible for everyone, (even those who just come for the bishies!) 



A romance visual novel game from Eternal Ninja Gaming. Princess Celeste, torn between two worlds of politics and fantasy must save the man of her dreams! 

Choose from 6 different types of guys, Ragnyo the Manipulative Spider; Felis the Cold Cat; Capri the Lazy Goat; Cross the Flirty Raven; Luki the Mischievous Mouse or Monarch the Shy Butterfly.

Set in the modern day with less advanced technology, on this journey Celeste must make her choice between 6 men pleading for her help and attention.

With 3 different outcomes from your choices, will you just be friends, will you be cursed or will you become lovers?!

Each route of dialogue will get you to three endings, Bad End, Normal End and Happy End!



Want to check out the game? An ALPHA version of the demo is available to download from our website right HERE. You can play the demo right now!

The demo contains the Prologue that introduces our 6 romance options.

We would also greatly appreciate your support by voting YES on Steam Greenlight. Without your votes we won’t be able to release the game on the steam store for ease of access and safe downloads. 



This otome styled game is designed to be user interactive, choices you make within the dialogue of the game will influence your romance and the outcome of your ending.

The MC's default name is Celeste Serenia but can be customised to be your own name, or a name of your choosing, The game has no MC sprite as we try to give the effect that you are the MC as much as possible, only a couple of CG's feature the actual MC's look, and we tried to make her as unique as possible that no one feels that she is categorised as a stereotypical looking girl (ie. blonde hair and blue eyes, brown hair and brown eyes, etc).

Each route gives you contact with new characters, some exclusive to only one persons route at a time (ie. Prince Charion is exclusive to Ragnyo's route, Prince Rio is exclusive to Capri's route, etc).

With 3 CG's per route (one CG is happy ending, there are no CG's for the other endings. Unless our IGG campaign allows us more funds for artwork.) from our wonderful team of artists, we have a small array of artworks to view, a custom theme composed specifically for Princess of Desire and many more features.

For now the game is in English only, but we hope if it generates enough interest, in later updates we can add additional languages (such as Spanish, French, German, etc.)



Here are the 6 romance options for the game! 



Princess Of Desire started out as a self-funded project. But as the game progressed the needs for each area grew, and so did the costs. Now we need help to carry on producing this game to its fullest potential to deliver a quality product for everyone to enjoy.

Below is a breakdown of funds. 

We have already managed to pay a lot ourselves to get the game to where it is now but we need your help to push it to full production.

As you can see the main area that requires funding is art, to make gorgeous and exciting CG’s and produce all the sprites with a full spectre of expressions.

If the campaign is successful, we can get moving with the rest of the game and hopefully be able to release more (check the stretch goals) for your enjoyment and have the full game released by October 2016.



Digital Content only –

. Exclusive Wallpapers.

. Exclusive Banners and Icons.

. Digital Artbook.

. Code for ONE main story.


Physical Content –

. Full Set of Postcards.

. Bookmarks.

. Keychain/Phone Charm.

. Poster (random character selected.)

. Mug (random character selected).

. Sheet of Stickers.

. Tote Bag (random character selected).

.  Dakimakura Animal Pillow.


And possibly more (see stretch goals.)



If you help us reach our goal PLUS some we have a few goals in mind to make the game better, and your experience of the game much more enjoyable! 

£6,000 – Additional Cg’s for Normal and Bad Endings.

£7,000 – A completely unique OST for PoD.

£8,000 – Additional Rewards added.

£9,000 – Additional Languages added.

story:
Hello, my name is Tyler Fedrick, and welcome to the standard of survival games, When Darkness Falls. WDF is a game for the community, by the community! That is why our mission at Nocturnal Interactive is to build off of the feedback and ideas that the gaming community wants to see incorporated into this game.

 Setting

When Darkness Falls is set in the date 2025, five years after a Solar Flare has dismantled the world's power grid causing mass anarchy to ensue. You play as one of the many government's pet projects for the advancement of Cyborg Technology, awakening into a world that is not as you once left it. You must venture out into a land filled with a vast array of challenges to survive. Will you become like the people that inhabit this world or will you become a beacon of hope for the weak to follow in your footsteps?

Waring NPCs

While the never ending battle against other players wages on, you must be wary of the three groups plaguing these lands. First are the marauders, a heartless, cut throat group of psychopaths that will attack anyone or anything in their path. Next are the Mithrans, who believe the sun to be a ever judging God upon the inhabitants of the Earth. Any use of fuel driven technology is a direct sin against their God.  Last are the CTs, a group of robots who have banded together in search for fuel to keep their bodies running.

Perks

$5 Supporter

Thank you for your support!  You will be put into the credits of the game +

receive updates on the progress of the game +  a When Darkness Falls desktop screen saver!


$15 Day One Survivalist

Receive all that is stated above +  a copy of the game + a exclusive early bird banner (exclusively to this donation only) + a indiegogo supporter banner to hang in your base


$25 Survivalist

Receive all that is stated above (with the exception of the early bird banner) + additional desktop screen savers +  a indiegogo supporter banner to hang in your base


$50 Art Survivalist

Receive the Survivalist tier + a digital art booklet + the supporter perk that adds a permanent ingame perk to carry an extra twenty pounds of weight  


$100 Hardened Survivalist

Receive the Art Survivalist tier + an official When Darkness Falls T-shirt


$125 Shady Survivalist

Receive the Hardened Survivalist tier + the offical When Darkness Falls hat + a digital version of a dark short story within the world of When Dark Falls


$150 Embedded Survivalist

Receive the Shady Survivalist + Become apart of the game, we will put your name on a news article, food brand, street name, etc. + Plus receive a personal thank you email


$250 Technical Survivalist

Receive the Embedded Survivalist + two extra copies of the game + special When Darkness Falls hoodie


$300 Preserving Survivalist

Receive the Hardened Survivalist tier  + a signed When Darkness Falls artwork with the co founders' signatures


$500 Cyborg Survivalist

Receive the Preserving Survivalist + the regenerative nature perk that when standing still you regenerate a small percentage of your health + three extra copies of the game + special When Darkness Falls hoodie


$750 Specialized Survivalist

Receive the Preserving Survivalist + our artist will create a custom digital piece for you


$1,000 Tinkering Survivalist

Receive the Specialized Survivalist + work with the team to design an npc that spawns within the world


$2,000 Inspiring Survivalist

Receive the Tinkering Survivalist + let the world play as you and become become a character preset!


$5,000 Superior Survivalist

Receive the Inspiring Survivalist + take what is yours and become a Marauder, CT, or Mithran leader!


$10,000 Infamous Survivalist

Receive the Superior Survivalist + Work with the team to create a unique dungeon full of traps and infamous enemies


If you feel that there is something that needs to be added to the perks offered or a different donation price than what is given let us know and we will see what we can do!


Features

Massive augmentation system - This is where you level your character through biotic implants. This type of leveling system is a different take on the basic leveling skills that most are familiar with within the RPG world.

The major implant classes are

1. Brain Augmentation - Intelligence

2.Perception Augmentation - Five senses  

3.Bone Augmentation - Strength

4.Muscle Augmentation - Agility

5.Cardiac Augmentation - Endurance

6. Filtration Augmentation - Living and Consumption

Crafting - we want to be a very simple system to jump right into while having the ability to build truly unique structures

Player Trading - an area where everyone in each server can meet on neutral ground to trade items

100 player servers - that way you can play with as many friends as you want in a given time

Perma-death- you have one life in this harsh world. When you die you lose everything. Levels are the only thing that you keep.

First and Third person - this involves everything from having the view of the area that 3rd person gives to the precision that first person can bring

Mass Selection of Weapons - everything from your conventional M4 to an ax from a medieval props store 

Deep Instanced Dungeon System - We plan to have dungeons that are inhabited by the 3 types of NPCs and this is where you will find the best items but also the hardest enemies. You can delve into these dungeons solo or with a group of friends and the enemies scale based on how many people you bring in. They will be instanced so you do not have to worry about getting killed by other players while you are inside.

Strongholds - There will be strongholds out in the open world inhabited by the 3 types of NPCs and you can take over a stronghold for your clan and bolster its defenses.

Clan/Party System - We want playing with friends to be encouraged and as easy as possible. You can party up with friends and take them with you into instanced dungeons,raid strongholds with them, or just patrol the wasteland together.

Challenges

Our number one challenge is creating a top quality game that will stand the test of time, while being on a tight budget. It is crucial that we raise this money to expand our contracting of different portions of the development process.

Funding Goal

What we need is base sum of 50,000 dollars to contract out more individuals that can build upon our weaknesses. That way we can bring the quality you deserve. The more money we raise the better the end product will be.

You are the key

Without you guys none of this would be possible. That is why each week we plan to give you, the backer, a detailed report of everything that we have accomplished. That way you will be able to give to us your thoughts and concerns about each new addition we add to the game!

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about When Darkness Falls! Every message you send or conversation you have about our game will give us another opportunity.

Future Goals

With this ever evolving world we are creating, we plan to eventually bring this title to both the Playstation 4 and the Xbox One! Along with the ability to bring fresh, new features to the game each month.

story:
Be apart of a breathtaking first person shooter experience on the powerful Unreal Engine 4!

Battle alongside friends in modern combat on both Earth and its rival planet: Drumgore.






Former pro gamer Michael L. Fiorentino Gutierrez (a.k.a. hamtaro) has designed a competitive FPS with brutal 5 on 5 competitive play alongside other small and large scale combat modes.



Additional funds are needed for the completion of early access development and early access release. This game is already listed on the Steam store and we are binded in an agreement with Steam.




This is an indie game that is truly unique and different from all other first person shooters. It is much different than the standard FPS not only from the Steampunk / post apocalyptic atmosphere perspective, but from a gameplay perspective as well. This game is prepared to serve the next generation of competitive FPS gamers.


TWO FACTIONS:

Team A: Natives
Team B: The Allegiance of Anna

Defend Earth and play as the Natives, or fight for Earth's rival planet - Drumgore - and their unrelenting dictator: Lord Anna. Experience combat on both planets!

As the Natives, you will infiltrate intense environments in search of finding information about Anna and her whereabouts. You must unlock cases to find this information. A round win is designated by opening one case (found at either given Site on a map; custom maps might only include one Site at times).

Playing as a member of the Allegiance of Anna, you will do everything in your power to defend Anna, her Warcruiser and her whereabouts. You must prevent the Natives from infiltrating your compounds and attacking your faction; in addition to preventing them from unlocking cases and obtaining information. If you are playing the Allegiance in competitive mode, you must hide your cases and information promptly at the beginning of each round and prevent them from being unlocked for the entire duration of the round.


CREATOR: Michael L. Fiorentino Gutierrez (hamtaro)

DEVELOPMENT TEAM MEMBERS:
Alexej Perevosnikov
Daniel Borgmann
Charles Duprey
Josh Stoker
Daryl Petty

OTHER STAFF:
Emily Andrews
Brett Wing
Matt Mason
Trent Haley


CONTACT:
michael.g.fiorentino@gmail.com
wrathofannagame@gmail.com

© Michael L. Fiorentino Gutierrez

story:
Features | Story | Rewards | About us | Roadmap | Risks and challenges

 Shortly About The Game

  • A fighting simulator game about robots
  • The game mechanics are based on physics
  • The ability to create your own strikes and movements
  • The ability to create a unique fighter
  • A hybrid control system, including a voice command system
  • VR ready
  • Cross-platform multiplayer
  • No Pay to Win
  • Buy once, play forever

 Tech Demo as Proof of Concept

   We developed tech demo as a proof of concept to show you what we mean saying "game mechanics based on physics". There you can fight against your friend or a bot, or just make bots to fight each other. Movements creation interface in this demo is only for developers and testers.

   This is an online physical based robots fight simulator, where you create movements and strikes for your robot. The robot consists of more than 20 different modules. Your role is to be the operator, the coach, the manager, and the mechanic of all your robot-fighters.

   Movement freedom! Each player can create any movement or strike and use it in a battle. That gives everyone the opportunity to create his own fighter with a unique fighting style. After all, "the frog strike" or "double strike to the head" at a special angle can give a great advantage when your opponent does not expect this.

 
 

   Create your own fighter! Each robot consists of 20 items, which carry different characteristics. Now more than 100,000 combinations of robot assembly are available, without taking colors into account . This allows the player to create both internally and externally, a completely unique fighter!

 

   Maximum control! The game has a traditional keyboard and gamepad control, and we developed a unique voice control system that will allow you to manage your fighter by voice, because remembering and saying the name of the hit that you came up with is easier than finding the needed buttons among dozens of options.

   Real physical system! We have developed a unique physical system that allows you to animate the robots, and create movements and strikes for them. It also determines the outcome of the battle as well. The skeleton of the robot consists of simulated rigid structures, joints, tendons and muscles. No ragdolls!

   The collision system runs in full accordance with physics. Each strike has a realistic model, which takes into account the mass and the velocity of each limb from head to toe. A properly delivered blow is the key to a victory! 

   The physics smoothly works at frequency 60 ticks per second. And it's possible already at the stage of tech-demo (wich is actually a proof of concept). And don't worry about the fact that the game might not work on your average computer - our approach is to simulate the battle on the server side, which also largely eliminates cheating.

   Strike variability! You can create your own strikes, and what is more you can vary them in a fight. Any strike can be modified by crouch stands and lunges that can change the momentum of a fight radically. As you understand, the lunge made in correct time, adds speed to your stroke. Therefore, it can save you or take down your rival.

 
   Jumps and kicks! What fight runs without kicks and jumps? All this will certainly be in our game. As well as grabbing the opponent by claws and tearing the limbs.
 

   VR ready! We have made some tech tests and it was absolutely amazing! So, yes, the game definitely will have a VR mode and VR league!

 

  About the League Structure

   There are two types of leagues in the game – official and non-official. You can choose either one you like. In the official leagues all the fights are by the rules, where a gamer gets money and glory for a fight he has won. He can become a champion step by step.

   The Non-official league is different. There are no rules and money is not important – only the construction of your robot is important. Power rules there – if you lose the fight, you lose everything. Every league consists of 20 subclasses, which depend on your game skills. In the game you will also find a system of clubs and fights between clubs, where gamers can train with each other and create official fights between clubs.

 

 Game Story

   2067. People live in a world where robots are widespread in all spheres of life from housekeeping to labor at the factory. People don’t even fight themselves, they use robots. 

   Cyber sport has replaced other sports and young fighters come to the ring to prove themselves. GlobalTech Corporation, the leader in modular robot production, announces an annual robot fight tournament. The prize fund is $100 million. Everyone wants to win the jackpot and the participants are even ready to cross the line. But time will show who is the best robot-fighter…

 

  • Game copy – you will get a digital copy of a game and the key in the Steam on the day the game will be released (December 2017).
  • Soundtracks – digital soundtracks in HD quality from the game.
  • Forum access – a special forum for the backers will be created, where you can communicate directly with game developers – offer your ideas, write your wishes and give feedback. Everything will be read and realized in the game later.
  • Alpha key - closed alpha test access (December 2016).
  • Beta key (Wave-1) – closed beta test access (Summer 2017).
  • Beta key (Wave-2) – closed beta test access (a month after Wave-1).
  • Beta key (Wave-3) – closed beta test access (a month after Wave-2).
  • Indiegogo starter pack – an excellent pack for a more comfortable start, including the robot details packs, the packs for repair and styling of your fighter and the packs for your training base extension.
  • Your name in the titles – you will be mentioned as a person who helped the project.
  • One detail named in your honor – one detail will be dedicated to you.
  • We will send to you a personal video with us, drinking yours health! =)

 

   Point Cloud studio was founded in 2007, and we have successfully executed a number of projects over the years. Our game developers are highly qualified and enthusiastic experts.

   We noticed that the fighting game industry was in a crisis, as the games have become boring and there seemed to be no development trends. Being true fans of fighting games, we have come up with our own project - Voice of Steel - which promises to become a real breakthrough in the genre.

 

 We need your support

   Everything you could see above are the materials from the game tech-demo, there is no CG.

   We have passed Steam Greenlight in seven days, where we got a good experience and the vision of the further game development.

   You, as backers, have a unique ability to influence the future game. Your money is your voices and assets, which will help us to make the game better! After the Indiegogo is successfully passed, you will tell the world that you want to see the new generation of fighting.

   We offer you more than a chance to support the game and the genre – as the first backers you will get much more then the finished game. You will become a part of the club that will get early news about the game, early game plays and the backstage renewals. You can also influence the game from the beginning of its development.

   Voice of Steel will cost $30 on the release, but we are offering it to you now for just $10.

   Please, spread the word about us – tell your friends about the game and take part in early tests. An amazing world of robot fighting is waiting for you.

    

 

 Roadmap

Idea
Tech demo development (done)
Greenlight (done)
Alpha version development
Alpha test (December 2016)
Beta version development
Beta tests (Summer 2017)
Release on PC (December 2017)
Release on PS/XBox (2018)

 

 Risks and challenges

   All of the materials you can see here are from the our tech demo. We are working on release version of the game right now! Soon we will start alpha tests of new game mechanics with jumps and kicks. And you are able to help us twice, today - with your money as your voice for our project, and later - with your gamer experience to make this game perfect!

   Point Cloud team will do everything so that the game will become AAA class.

   Our guarantee for you:

  • We will spend ALL the backing money for the Voice of Steel development and improvement. 
  • We will support communication with you. You will have access to our diaries and reports regarding the game. 
  • We will try to finish the game as soon as possible so you can play Voice of Steel right away.

story:
Slice - Gaia's Front Nine

In days of olde, when men we'n out to golf...things were different, the links were a dangerous place!

Slice - Gaia's Front Nine, is the first of a two part hex-based board-building game of table-top golf with a twist. For 1-4 players.

It is fast and furious play, and plenty of laughs.

It can be played solo...if yer honest!

You must also deal with an ever-present swarm of devious critters determined to just make you have an all-around bad day. But you still have to choose your clubs and aim your shots and make it to the hole.

We are looking for enough funding to be able to produce 50 games for distribution at Spiel 2016 in Essen Germany. Which we will sell. And, hopefully, to launch the second Indiegogo campaign for Slice - The Devil's Back Nine expansion pack, if our stretch goals are not met. 

This first game pits the player's against nature's most virulent spoil-sports, all with their greedy beady eyes fixed on your balls, both figuratively and literally...

Stages Of Game Play

You build the Hole with Terrain Hexes..

Using the goodies in your golf bag... 

  • G-Putter - Accurate and pointy 
  • Wedgie - Out of the sand, and into the mix 
  • Hot Iron - Distance and Damage
  • Got Wood - Wack a mole! 
  • Piled River - Five! Look out, here it comes. 

You take aim and smack your Battle Ball down the course.

And you fight The Critters...

Box Contains

  • Rule Book
  • 48 2" Hex Terrain Tiles
  • 24 1" Critter Chits
  • 20 Golf Club Chits
  • 4 "Mad Angus" - Player Figurines
  • 4 Battle Balls
  • 6 Critter Reference Cards
  • 7 Terrain Reference Cards
  • 4 Golf Club Reference Cards
  • 1 Score Pad
  • 4 Golf Pencils
  • 4x 6-Sided-Die

Mad Angus Hand-Painted Reward

Stretch Goals

  • Club Figurines - 5x Plastic Golf Club Figurines. All Levels.
  • Critter Figurines - 4x6 Critter Figurines.Got Wood, and Piled River Levels.
  • The Devil's Back Nine - The next nine holes as an expansion pack. New Terrain, New Critters. New Monsters! Hot Iron, Got Wood, and Piled River Levels.
  • The Nineteenth Hole - So you want a nice ale after a hard 18? An expansion pack for the Clubhouse. Got Wood, and Piled River Levels. 

Moondance Games - Dwarf War

Moondance has another game system in the works as well, Dwarf War, and we are seeking support to get a very talented design team a chance to really shine, producing a range of interesting new games. Some of these we are keeping secret, but these two game systems, Dwarf War and Slice, are the first examples of our work ready for public consumption.  

We will be launching a Dwarf War, Indiegogo campaign in Spiel as well. We all want to quit our day jobs (that we love BTW) and do it full-time. And this is our first critter-strewn stab at that most worthy of life goals. 

So help us, please, and trust us, we will not disappoint.

story:
My name is Sen Ze.  I qualified as a Barrister-at-Law from Lincoln’s Inn, UK in 1990 and duly started practising as a lawyer for some years.

I thought I had it made...

I thought I would become rich as a lawyer and I could then repay my dear Dad's retirement money that he gave me for my legal education.

However, I went through periods of despair and frustration during this time as I wasn't meeting my objective although I thought I was doing all that was required of me.

After all, I had plenty of determination and grit to excel in my profession.

And I was hardworking (really).

Unfortunately, I was missing quite a few pieces of the puzzle. 

I eventually found out what else were required, but only YEARS later, and only after switching careers a couple of times, including joining the E-Commerce and Information Technology fields and starting from scratch, and then becoming an entrepreneur and a best-selling author along the way.  

​Here are some of my best-selling books, just as an introduction:

During this time I discovered what were truly needed for someone to get rich much quicker.

They weren't a huge number of principles involved, but just a handful. 

But most people don't know what they are - which is why they are stuck where there are, like me in the past. 

And so I set out to educate the world on the very important concepts of wealth creation that were not taught at home, in school or at the workplace. 

This took many forms, including the books above and in live presentations. But those are mostly passive with my listening audience mostly doing basically that - listening. The vast majority will NOT take any action that will further their knowledge, which is a shame. 

And then 3 years ago it struck me...

There's something that we carry around with us everyday. We look at it hundreds of times a day and we tap on it all the time. 

We look at it to learn new facts, and we tap on it to add our input or take some action.

That something is our smartphone.

And so the Life Changing Money Challenge game - The Game That Can Make You Rich And Famous - was born.

The Life Changing Money Challenge game is probably the BEST method you have to learn how to create wealth and multiply it significantly...

It does this by making you both learn AND take action on what you've learned, at the same time.

Sometimes the learning is done AFTER an action is taken.

Other times the learning is done BEFORE an action is required from you (assuming you're paying attention, of course).

Either way, you learn and become better in ways you never could before.

At its very core, this game is a combination of the following:

1.  Strategy and tactics that take place in your head as you log into the Life Changing Money Challenge web app to make certain important decisions on wealth building where you take some actions based on those decisions, by tapping some buttons - and then seeing if you're right or wrong within a short period of time. This is Phase 1;

AND

2.  LIVE interaction at a venue among all the players present where you’ll be wheeling and dealing with each other face to face to make the most money on your way to becoming the Champion. This is Phase 2.

 

So what's your Net Worth? 

The Life Changing Money Challenge mimics real-life circumstances and market conditions that will help you create more “money” or increase your “Net Worth”, which is defined as the cash you have plus the market value of the assets you own. 

You will accumulate the cash and assets as you play the game. Some assets will accumulate automatically, others require some actions from you. Yet others will lose you money because they're not really assets at all, but you couldn't recognise it earlier.

 

 

Can you be the leader?

Then you will get see the leading players on a Leaderboard in real time, so that everybody knows where they stand. This gives all players some goals to achieve.

You can then take the necessary actions to replace one of the top performers on the Leaderboard, by checking what you're doing right, and what you're doing wrong.


In the Leaderboard above, you can see that "Stephanie Perry" is leading with over LCD15.1 million ("LCD" = "Life Changing Dollars"), followed closely by Joshua Armstrong with LCD14.74m and Lester Weber with LCD14.48m. Joshua and the rest will have to figure out what actions they need to take to replace Stephanie in top spot. As they do this, friendships are created quickly. More importantly, this friendship is developed on a common interest (wealth building), so you're learning from each other even as you're learning from the game itself!


The above shows the rest of the pack chasing Stephanie Perry for the top spot. Note that the LCDs are earned while the game is played, with the various tasks that you need to take that will also educate you on the wealth principles being revealed.

 

Don't worry - you're completely safe.

Far more important than bragging rights when you get to the top of the Leaderboard is that you will then know what it takes to create wealth, as you can SEE things happening from your actions (or inactions) - but without risking any of your own hard-earned money in the real world since you'll be playing with LCDs ("Life Changing Dollars").

With this knowledge of acquiring wealth and then successfully multiplying it all within the game, you can then immediately apply them to the real world when you're able to, to properly acquire wealth, and then multiply it for real.  

That’s the simple objective of the game - and practically EVERYBODY who participated in this game absolutely LOVED it. 

We’ve done over 7 major live events of this Challenge with more than a thousand people playing the game in its various forms over the years, in total. 


Players attending one of the live events of The Life Changing Money Challenge

In the process, we’ve created valuable opportunities for those who attended as they interacted with each other during the Challenge, and long after it’s over.

And here's why we're running this campaign...

You see, with live interaction at a venue, we can only reach those near the venue.

This limits the benefits of the game quite significantly as the rest of the world cannot participate due to geographical restrictions. 

Since this game benefits you immensely by:

  1. ​Educating you as you play it so that you get to learn in a fun environment that mimics real-life conditions and not through dry textbooks; and 
     
  2. Providing you with a VALUABLE NETWORK of LIKE-MINDED CONTACTS made up of other players who in turn can help make each other’s dreams come true long after the game is played;

we feel it’s important that more people in the world can get to play it wherever they may be, and at whatever time they wish.

To do this, we’ll need to program the live interaction games at a venue in Phase 2 to add to the already-programmed Phase 1.

As it now stands...

1. Phase 1 of this Challenge is played entirely on a smartphone
You can see some of the play going on in the video above, and in the photos on this page. It took us more than $200,000 to develop this phase so far. 

2. Phase 2 is played live - but we want to make it playable on a smartphone
Phase 2 players interact live with our facilitators on stage and with each other at a venue they attend for this purpose. This is the phase that we would like to develop to make the web app complete without a live event at a venue.

Get to know people with the same mindset in the world - instantly!

By making The Life Changing Money Challenge into a game that can be played entirely online, we will not only save everyone the cost of attending the event (some also paid for their air tickets to fly to the venue), but also make it possible for hundreds of thousands, even millions of people in the world to start playing it.

When this happens - the benefits to you as a player will skyrocket as you'll now be interacting with many times more people than you can interact with at a live venue - with many more people knowing who you are!

When this Phase 2 programming is completed, there will be more things you can do with it that will further your wealth creation education and journey. 

I promise you an experience like no other game can give you, as you’re learning essential life skills that will change your life. 

We need your help for us to bring this amazing and complete web app to you, for you to start your journey to wealth creation quickly where you’ll be learning very valuable lessons in a fraction of the time it took me to learn them.

This campaign is itself one of the lessons (if you can recognise it).

Yes, you’re already playing The Life Changing Money Challenge game right now, by becoming a contributor or backer to the further development of this game. 

By becoming a contributor, you’ll have FIRST use of the 2-phase Life-Changing Money Challenge game when it's ready - and you’ll get the MOST EXPOSURE to the thousands, perhaps millions, of other players who will be playing this game later on, as you will be seen on the Leaderboard first, as well on our Supporters listings on our website. See the Perks section of this page and decide which ones to go for.

Here's the breakdown of how we will use the funds from this Campaign

50%: Programming of live Phase 2 functions by our team of programmers

20%: Content creation by my carefully-assembled team of wealth experts

20%: Marketing of this game worldwide to get more players onboard that will benefit every player

10%: Admin, hosting and support costs

Excess funds from any area, if any, will be funnelled to the other areas that require them, so none of the funds will go to waste.

Perks

1. Free To Play Forever

The Life Changing Money Challenge will be free to play, with in-app purchases for game enhancements as one of its revenue models. However all Supporters (backers of this project) will get those enhancements for free. 

2. Listing in Supporters Board
There are 3 spots on the Supporters Board, which is listed above the players' Net Worth Leaderboard in the web app. There will be 10 play Levels showing this Net Worth Leaderboard, with players who achieved certain milestones moving from Level to Level being listed in order of performance. 

Supporters from the Passionate Level onward get massive publicity by being listed on the Supporters Board as the Net Worth Leaderboard page is the second-most accessed page by players (other than their own Current Net Worth page that lists out their purchases and other actions), as they'll be trying to see where they stand after every action they take.

We will be linking directly to Supporters' social media accounts from this Supporters Board, and the other players will see the Supporters Board first before seeing the Net Worth Leaderboard.

NOTE: This can get you thousands, perhaps even millions of views, as we intend to market this game aggressively worldwide to get as many people playing it as possible.

3. My "Mobile Insanity" E-Book
This book reveals how you and businesses can market to mobile phone users with their consent at very low costs, which then increases your profits significantly. The concepts revealed are great for existing business owners and those thinking of marketing to consumers as there is no other product consumers spend more time on than their mobile phones:

Back or contribute to this campaign now 

Please contribute to this campaign and/or help us spread the word as this game WILL change its players' lives in many ways.

The sooner we reach the goals the sooner we can program all the games in Phase 2 - and the sooner you can get to play this game to be rich and famous!

story:
Summary


Hi !! my name is Dennis , I am a game artist and programmer and I love the magic and mystery of old arcade games, give much value also gameplay , fun and life a game with my programming of random level generator and random events, each time you play will always be a new experience !!! I am currently working 15 hours a day in this game.

 FEATURES 

  • Procedural random level generator.
  • Pixel Art for the real.
  • Different ways.
  • 3/4 perspective with 8 movement directions animations.
  • Many characters to unlock.
  • 200+ power ups and weapons configuration.
  • Secret levels.
  • Secret Bosses.  
  • Lovecraftian style environments and evolution.
  • Bullet time , zoom and slow motions to increase the satisfaction of playing.
  • Many curious easter eggs....LOL !!!

What We Need & What You Get

I'm doing this game for love , I want to develop a game that people like to play and feel adrenaline on gameplay. But to finish this game so full of details is needed some financial help . The game is a top down but in perspective, all the animations must be made in 8 directions, and there are many aspects that whenever the player play the game not be repeated and is always a new experience. The first version will be in English.

  • 30% : Marketing.
  • 20% : Programming.
  • 20% : Animation, Art, Cutscenes.
  • 10% : Sound Design.
  • 10% : Buy a MAC for export to MAC and IOS.
  • 10% : Translate to : Portuguese(Brazilian), Russian, German and Spanish.


The Impact

The great magic of this game is a great satisfaction to play and always discover new weapons and never have the same configuration of power ups , always playing and always see new levels different completely random , and the more different themes , without a pre-defined order and always enjoy great theories about the most intriguing legends of the secret past.

Well, Programming a game with this level of complexity is not so simple, but that's the game I envisioned and this is the product I want to share with the world.


Risks & Challenges

After completely finish the PC version of this game, i will adapt it for mobiles , very hard work will be needed to finish everything and I have a massive game , which always cause great fun and not be easy to end the game , even those with difficulty able to reach the end will still want to play more and more to see other aspects of evolution.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can help me spreading this game to your friends, social networks , blogs , etc... and...Support me on Greenlight !!!!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725777181

After completely finish the PC version of this game, i will adapt it for mobiles , very hard work will be needed to finish everything and I have a massive game , which always cause great fun and not be easy to end the game , even those with difficulty able to reach the end will still want to play more and more to see other aspects of evolution.


Other Ways You Can Help 
You can help me spreading this game to your friends, social networks , blogs , etc... and...Support me on Greenlight !!!!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725777181

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Isaac Silcox. I have been playing pen-and-paper RPGs for about a decade now, and video game RPGs since I could remember. I have always been in love with the idea of being a larger than life character, someone I couldn't be in the real world without being jailed or consuming a copious amount of hallucinogenics. I've sampled loads of different gaming systems, and tossed the advantages and disadvantages of them around in my head and with my even more experienced friends and gaming group.

I set about creating this campaign when I got to a point in developing Intrepid where I realized that some of my reach had exceeded my grasp. I am no artist, and didn't fancy including stick figures for all the class artwork, nor am I an exceptional writer. I maek misteaks alot! Being a brokeass twenty something with a bank account that makes the DOW Jones look more stable than my ex, I decided I needed your help. I just need a few bucks to pay some poor schmuck to draw some pretty pictures, and some other idiot to edit this hot garbage that I write. Without it, the world will only ever experience the SINGLE. GREATEST. ARE. PEE. GEE. EVER. as an open office document. Doable, but not as nice as a color pdf with some pretty pictures and pleasant formatting.

Donating will ensure that the project goes from a good concept, to a product that deserves to appear on shelves next to gaming titans. You aren't kickstarting an idea, the project is already underway and if support is shown, I'll gladly post updates as fast as I can make them. Once the project is finished, any and all can download it to their heart's content. Going over the asking donation will not only be a surprise, it will extend the depth of the game as I can afford to pay more people for more things, but we'll cross that bridge when we come to it.

What We Need & What You Get

So here's the skinny:

I am asking for $500. That's enough to pay an artist I know to produce enough images for the classes, the cover, one or two set pieces, and the map. It will also subsidize my gullible roommate into editing the project while I feed him unhealthy amounts of Chinese food.

You want perks? Donating a whopping zero dollars/yen/gold/spacebucks/souls will get you a free RPG, the best perk anyone could ever get. However, here are some real perk things I came up with on the fly:

  1. $1 I will thank you and include your name at the end of the product.
  2. $5 I'll think of you fondly while I do house chores and curse your enemies.
  3. $10 I will write you a pleasant email or message lauding your generosity. 
  4. $50 I'll praise you visually through a custom-made video thing.
  5. $100 I will mail you a pair of my worn boxers with a sultry love note attached.
  6. $250 I'll offer a blood sacrifice to a deity or pantheon of your choice.
  7. Don't spend $500, that's just...that's silly. Plz. What more could I give after a blood sacrifice?

If the goal isn't reached, I will mourn humanity's miserly tendencies, and pay the difference out of pocket. This may or may not involve selling my body. Don't make me do that. If enough funds aren't accrued to legitimately improve the product (say under half the asking amount) I will do my best to return these funds to you, or spend it in a way determined by popular vote. I vote for burning it on camera in a Food Lion aisle.

*UPDATE* I have decided to convert the project into a do-or-die format. I feel like this is a gesture of trust to show that I am here to achieve a specific goal, not make off with whatever money I can scrape together. Unfortunatley, I can't change from Flexible to Fixed funding after the launch. If I don't reach $500, I will return every cent I receive and I will find another way to acquire the funds to get SOME art into the project. Now please excuse me while I go get sized for a balaclava.

The Impact

Why is my project valuable? Well, it isn't. This is a chance to simply improve a piece of entertainment that you can own for free! Everyone loves free things! Is it important to the world? Probably not. At $750,000, I'll figure out a way to include a Last Starfighter design to find the greatest fighter in the world. That could be important to the world, right?

I have never done something like this before. Off-beat humor aside, I do have a lot of experience at creating pieces of content such as unique wargear, talents, campaigns, worlds, etc. These bits of creativity have resoundingly solid track record with familiar and new players alike, and I enjoy creating such things, sometimes almost more than using them. I firmly believe that GMs should create items tailored to their player's character, using out of the book items only as a last resort or as a foe's weapon, unless such items do fit a character already.

Okay guys, gals, and attack helicopters, I'm going to make this real for you. The classes are already made. The world is already drawn out. The world history is already written. Half the talents have been created. 95% of the skills have been finalized. Magic has a solid foundation to build on. Melee and Ranged combat have an even better foundation. I have a yellow notepad that is all busted up from over-use. I will post plenty of content once this page is up and running to prove it's real-ness.

Risks & Challenges

Risk: It doesn't get funded. Outcome: The product is still made, and your contribution still makes it better. Small chance that the contribution is instead refunded.

Challenge: Continuously producing and updating the product to meet growing demands, answering questions and solving problems raised by exposure to a larger audience. Stringent play-testing has yet to commence as I want to get the game in a 100% playable state before doing so, and increasing the sample size from my group of 6-8 friends who play to 637,429 people will present a lot of good insight.

Another challenge is ensuring that funds donated would be used productively and wisely. How much does a person charge for a drawing? What kind of drawing is it, how big is it, what form is the drawing in, how quickly is it needed? Those are all good question which I will have to carefully consider before spending any of money whatsoever. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Yo, if you can't donate a $1, that's totally okay! Lot's of us, myself included, have pretty tight budgets, and "It's just a dollar" attitudes can go out of control pretty quickly sometimes. If you aren't able to donate, maybe just give the files I will post a once over and see if you are interested. If you are, just share it on them there social medias or whatever! Or just tell your friend, "Hey this jackwagon on the internet said to tell you his game was a-okay!".

I also accept prayers accompanied by burning incense.
