story:
What Is This!?

Pitch Black is a passion project of Sue Bean Studios following Grant's return from Afghanistan.

 

So What IS It?

Pitch Black is a survival horror game, crafted around the idea that light is no longer our friend - Can't say too much; spoilers!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $5,000, and here's why! 

Our Budget - $5k

 

  • $1,500 - New Computer 
    • We are currently using a Mac mini from mid-2014. Without funds, we can keep chugging along and building this game. However, we would pretty to have a high-end machine to make a high-end game. 
  • $800 - Beta Testing
    • Eight hundred dollars will go toward distributing to reviewers and early access gamers.
  • $2,000 - Initial Marketing Campaigns
    • We will begin with $50 per day for 40 days straight, initially using mid to high-end keyword pricing. 
  • But That Leaves $650? - Exactly! That leaves us $650 for incidentals, and most likely newer materials, assets, marketing, etc. 

 

The Impact

This project is not only a 'scary game,' this is a project of passion. Your donation, your investment, your feedback, helps us realize our dream. Your donation helps build the foundation of the production studio I am trying to lay the groundwork for - for my own son. 

 

Sue Bean Studios, as well as Pitch Black, are both the beginning of a long adventure in the game development world. A project I hope to pass on the success of to my son. 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Our biggest challenge as of yet is our current hardware. The Mac mini we use to develop constantly crashes and shows great difficulty working on such large textures, models, and map as our game has. 

 

Scheduling is difficult while actively serving in the Army, however we vow to make time for our company, our game, and you at home - eagerly awaiting updates and the final release of Pitch Black. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

You may not be able to help financially, and that's okay! Let us know your situation. Feel free to help us out by giving us a shoutout on social media, or sharing this project with your friends. The more the merrier!

story:
Based off our Internal Alpha Build. PC + Mac versions listed here:

All is Fair in Dust and Air - Alpha Demo Download Page

 

Broken Hammer Games is a small indie development team dedicated to Visual Novel development. Originally a group of friends and aerial adversaries within the Guns of Icarus community, we united around the community's visual novel project.

We are a collection of writers, artists, and musicians who hail from not only the USA but also Europe and Russia.

Our goal is to make visual novels, the first of which being,"All is Fair in Dust and Air." The project which brought us all together. Thus we established Broken Hammer Games in order to see it through.

This campaign is a dream project. For many of us this is what we've longed to do and been told we never would. Sometimes from teachers, sometimes friends, sometimes parents. Our name is a play on the Japanese proverb: "The nail that sticks out gets hammered down." Frankly, we're all tired of being hammered and so hence our name "Broken Hammer".  To break the hammers that have hammered us down.

-The Dust and Air World

All is Fair in Dust and Air encompasses each of the six nations of the Guns of Icarus world. Unlike traditional "high school" Visual Novels, our setting is much larger. In fact each story is a novel on it's own. How big is this world? Well lets look at the old Guns of Icarus map which we've based this tale on:

In our story, you will be going to each of those great nations and discovering a world that has existed more in the background of Guns of Icarus Online.

Our stories spin more than a simple romance tale, but a tale of the turbulent world of Guns of Icarus. These are the stories of the people who live in it, not just the heroes who rise from it. They are stories of a world still very much rebuilding itself from an ancient war which decimated it.

This tale we tell seeks to bring to life this world, as we study the lore bits Muse has created, then craft our story from that. Every quote, every image, even tidbits Muse has listed in achievements within Guns of Icarus, have gone towards our story to help tell the best tale possible of this world.

Is it canon? That is up to Muse to decide. Our story will exist as a legend of a time within the Guns of Icarus world when these characters would have existed. A legend you will be able to shape to your liking with each story will offer multiple endings.

How you end up, and who you end up with in the world of Dust and Air, is entirely up to you. From tales of adventure, to tales of forgiveness. Then tales of revenge and justice. You decide your journey. A journey which starts right now with this project.

-Our Characters

While our overall cast of characters is well over 100 when you consider all the story arcs, our main starting cast is the one you see in the images on this campaign page.

William Aven:   

William Aven is the son of Eric Aven, a small time, but moderately successful, airship shipping company located in the city of Mole. Coming of age, he's looking to take his first steps into the world and find the destiny that awaits him.

Gwynevere Wrenfell:

Gwynevere Wrenfell is the Baronetess of Ettingscove. The heir to Baron Wrenfell's fortune and lands.

​Ettingscove sits at a turning point in the affairs of the Baronies. Being the last surviving child of the Baron, Gwynevere's life is not the idealistic princess existence others dream of.

​The Fjordlands is a place rocked with cloak and dagger. An ally one day can be an enemy the next, and "enemy of mine enemies" is a way of life.

Abigail Lalana:

Daughter of a famous doctor and a horticulturalist, Abigail has had quite the unorthodox upbringing. Especially within a family that seems to be perpetually growing.

A genius prodigy inventor with an appetite for fixing things, Abigail is a rising star in Chaladon and has set the stage for her siblings.

​But peaceful times in the paradise of Chaladon will not last forever. Outside forces and politics will have their say in Abigail's future.

​There are even those within Chaladon who desire to ride the Lalana fame, or put an end to it completely.

Aoli Shi:

If Abigail is a prodigy of invention, Aoli is a prodigy of air combat.

Daughter of General Yuan Shi of the Yeshan Empire, Aoli was born with a pilot cap on her head and a rifle in her hand.

Quick to action and fast on the reflexes, Aoli shines above all who pass through the Yeshan Military Academy.

But not all is perfect being sworn to an expansionist super power. True friends are hard to come by, and those who would seek to topple the empire are many.

Sofia Aliyev:

Daughter of a Guild merchant who's business has seen better times, Sofia has been bred for the day she takes over the business.

Groomed in etiquette and the importance of body language in business, Sofia maintains a strong demeanor. She never lets her personal feelings dictate her actions.

Because of this, Sofia is already well on her way to succeeding the Aliyev family and restoring it's prominence.

But with prominence comes those who seek their own share of the grand fortunes to be had.  Whether it be from savages who attack trade routes, to rival businesses who plot and scheme behind pretty faces. Every transaction or deal brokered is a battle, and Sofia must become a master tactician of them.

Calle Haldora:

Where there are merchants and traders, there will be pirates.

Calle is no stranger to danger or to the criminal underworld. An inventive treasure hunter who always seems on the run from someone, Calle is certainly a most wanted individual on many lists. A true child of Anglea.

But is there more to her than meets the eye? The Haldora and Aven families have a shared history. One which is certain to bring Calle across William's path one way or another.

Your contribution helps us get all this off the ground and rolling. Our initial story (Which we call the Neutral Arc) that is currently in production, weighs in at about 30,000-40,000 words. This sets the tone and the branches for our main story arcs which weigh in much heavier. Some over 100,000 words each.

To put this in perspective, many visual novels in the west tend to sit under 10,000 words or less and are often very short or simplistic. Literally their entire story fits within that allotment. Larger projects might go past 20,000 or 30,000.

However, our total word count at present is around 700,000. That includes branches and routes for each story arc for the six nations in the Guns of Icarus world.

This total puts us well past big Visual Novels which have word counts over 300,000. We're within striking distance of even large AAA games with counts over 1 million. It is a word count you'd potentially see more in Japanese Visual Novels, not the west.

What we're attempting to do is challenge western visual novels. To not be defined by a cookie cutter mentality of creating visual novels, but to let our story go beyond what traditional visual novels tend to entail.

Thus our project has grown and gone from a labor of love to something that intends to challenge the status quo. To break hammers.

700,000 to us, is merely just another hammer to break.

Simply put, money will be distributed where it is needed the most to help speed up our development process and release the Neutral Arc sooner.

We'd like to raise $10,000 based on current and near future needs. Can we do it with less? Absolutely. But will we do it as fast with less? Likely not. We're committed to seeing this story released no matter what. It's up to you how fast it gets there.

That said, this is where money will go:

-Hiring New Talent

This is the biggie.

While our team has been working for awhile on our own, we need to be able to hire more to speed up the process. To be able to hire on extra artists would allow our lead artists freedom to specialize more on certain tasks.

We could also then look into hiring specialists for other departments that are in need of additional staff.

This would greatly advance the speed at which we can release not only this title, but the main story arcs.

-Funding For Current Team Members

Our current team members have been donating a lot of hours for free for years, all the while working jobs to keep the lights on, or finishing their educations. To be able to bless them for the work they've done, would encourage them greatly and free up more time to work on the project.

-Funding To Get This Game Released

While the primary focus of this campaign is to get the funding we need to speed up production, any excess that can help us with getting this game released on Steam, as well as other gaming networks, will help.

The sooner we release, the sooner we have it on sale and can begin directing money from sales to where it is needed.

-Beyond The Neutral Arc

Funds in excess that aren't needed to get our initial story released, will be allotted to our story arc development and getting those jump started.

Beyond that, we will allot funds towards the aforementioned stretch goal like getting this entire story done with vocals, or ports onto other platforms like Mac, iOS, and Android.

Digital Goods:

These goods will all be delivered digitally. Game copies will require access to Steam to install. Please go to store.steampowered.com and make an account on Steam to play the games. Digital keys will be distributed after the campaign is finished. Date to be announced.

-Copy of the Neutral Arc

This is the initial story which we are launching this campaign to fund. You get a full copy of this.

Game will be English only for the initial release.

-Copy of the Complete Story

This is both the initial story and every story we have planned for development. Because delivering the story arcs will take longer, we are heavily discounting this for this campaign as a way of thanking you for wanting to see this project completed with us.

Game will be English only for the initial release.

-Guns of Icarus Alliance

This is the game that started it all, along with it's most recent COOP expansion. So you're actually getting both the PVE and PVP game in one. It is the framework we have built our world within. If you already have a copy, give it to a friend!

Quantities will be limited each week.

-Alliance + Costume Pack

Not only do you get Alliance, but you get a full costume pack to use in game to make your character look dashing and heroic as you cackle manically at your foe's demise! HA HA! Use mines...

Quantities will be limited each week.

-Balloon decal

Our own addition for Guns of Icarus Alliance. Drawn by our artists, this is a set of balloon decals based on our world and characters that you can use on your airships in game. The decals will be exclusive to this campaign until a later date to be determined.

Physical Goods:

To better showcase our talents, our physical goods will all come with a special limited art print designed for this campaign by our Lead Artist, Georgy Valerianov.

All physical items are limited in order quantity. Ship dates will be announced pending product completion after the campaign finishes.

-4x6 Scratch Pad (25 sheets)

This is our lowest tier item. Perfect for jotting down some notes with our special print background. Each pack of pads will include 25 sheets.

-Puzzle Magnet

This is a 5 and 3/8 by 5 and 3/8 in puzzle magnet. It features our art piece in a jigsaw puzzle you can put together anywhere the magnet will stick. So instead of a simple lone magnet, you get nine!

-Mousepad

This is a 8 x 9 and 1/2 in mousepad featuring our art piece of this campaign. It comes with a heavy duty open-cell rubber base material backing and a soft anti microbial fabric surface.

-Wall Scroll

This is a beautiful 26 by 16 inch Wall Scroll featuring the art piece of this campaign.

Other Perks:

-Your Name In The Credits

To show our gratitude for your contribution, your name will be featured in the credits of All is Fair in Dust and Air.

-Your Name On a Nameless NPC

Because you've gone above and beyond, we're happy to name one of our previous nameless NPCs after you. Only real names or creative names. Nothing vulgar. Want to name a character after someone special to you? No problem! They will however, be pending approval.

-We Draw You Into The Game

The ultimate sign of appreciation for your contribution. You'll get to work directly with our development team to bring your likeness into the story. That includes where you appear and how you appear. Want to appear on a certain story arc? No problem!

-Your Name In All Our Games

As it says, any game we produce from Dust and Air on. No matter what it is, your name will be in the credits. This is the only time we will ever offer this perk.

All is Fair in Dust and Air may end up being one of the largest western visual novels ever attempted.

Backing something like that is something to be proud of. You're making history! We think about this every day here at Broken Hammer and it just continues to inspire us to see it completed.

To join us at this stage of our development means you'll be there at the end when the last story is released. To be a part of our journey and the journey of our characters in the Guns of Icarus world.

Broken Hammer doesn't seek to lie about the challenges a project of this size faces. Our core team is committed, but life happens. Starting from a community fan project, we are well aware of this, as the original team has changed over the years. But we don't make plans to fail, only plans to handle potential problems as they come up.

A project of around 700,000 in word count takes a lot of work. The challenge is sustaining development on that over time and keeping pace with releases.

Like a kite being lifted into the air, your contribution not only helps us get this title off the ground, but it also puts us in a position where we can start earning money from sales of the release. Where we can then soar.

When each story is released, it will be released as a stand alone game of it's own, or DLC (Pending updates to the game engine). Each of these stories will help fund those that follow. Helping us to continue to keep rising higher, where we can stay aloft should any turbulence come.

It is a graduated incline with each release, and our plan, that by the time the last stories release, we'll be churning out the stories fairly quickly. We can do this part because of shared assets across story lines.

Shared assets are the next major plan to deal with the scope of this project. It is something that has actually already begun. Aside from clothing and minor changes, the character models we are making now, will be able to serve our story designs later. Because many of the stories do have crossover moments, our assets get spread out better.

So even as we build the introduction story now, we are already making final assets for the other stories. Over time, those assets will increase to the point we only will be needing to create assets for new story specific characters or minor changes to existing characters, some of which, also crossover.

All in all, we looked at the great challenge of making a story this size and considered our options. Sure we could start smaller, and many companies like us do just that, but then it would mean letting this story we love so much, sit on the shelf for years. 

That just didn't feel right to us. So we looked at ways to turn this project's mountain into a manageable hill. We want to finish what we've started and do what we love.

Aside from contributions, what we really need most is your word of mouth or clicking the share buttons on this page. Tell a friend, tell a neighbor. Say your a Hammer Breaker. When they ask what that is, tell them about our project!

Besides that, if you're interested in helping us in a professional manner, we welcome hearing from you! Don't be shy!
story_txt:
Based off our Internal Alpha Build. PC + Mac versions listed here:
All is Fair in Dust and Air - Alpha Demo Download Page
 


Broken Hammer Games is a small indie development team dedicated to Visual Novel development. Originally a group of friends and aerial adversaries within the Guns of Icarus community, we united around the community's visual novel project.
We are a collection of writers, artists, and musicians who hail from not only the USA but also Europe and Russia.

Our goal is to make visual novels, the first of which being,"All is Fair in Dust and Air." The project which brought us all together. Thus we established Broken Hammer Games in order to see it through.
This campaign is a dream project. For many of us this is what we've longed to do and been told we never would. Sometimes from teachers, sometimes friends, sometimes parents. Our name is a play on the Japanese proverb: "The nail that sticks out gets hammered down." Frankly, we're all tired of being hammered and so hence our name "Broken Hammer".  To break the hammers that have hammered us down.


-The Dust and Air World
All is Fair in Dust and Air encompasses each of the six nations of the Guns of Icarus world. Unlike traditional "high school" Visual Novels, our setting is much larger. In fact each story is a novel on it's own. How big is this world? Well lets look at the old Guns of Icarus map which we've based this tale on:

In our story, you will be going to each of those great nations and discovering a world that has existed more in the background of Guns of Icarus Online.
Our stories spin more than a simple romance tale, but a tale of the turbulent world of Guns of Icarus. These are the stories of the people who live in it, not just the heroes who rise from it. They are stories of a world still very much rebuilding itself from an ancient war which decimated it.
This tale we tell seeks to bring to life this world, as we study the lore bits Muse has created, then craft our story from that. Every quote, every image, even tidbits Muse has listed in achievements within Guns of Icarus, have gone towards our story to help tell the best tale possible of this world.
Is it canon? That is up to Muse to decide. Our story will exist as a legend of a time within the Guns of Icarus world when these characters would have existed. A legend you will be able to shape to your liking with each story will offer multiple endings.
How you end up, and who you end up with in the world of Dust and Air, is entirely up to you. From tales of adventure, to tales of forgiveness. Then tales of revenge and justice. You decide your journey. A journey which starts right now with this project.
-Our Characters
While our overall cast of characters is well over 100 when you consider all the story arcs, our main starting cast is the one you see in the images on this campaign page.
William Aven:    

William Aven is the son of Eric Aven, a small time, but moderately successful, airship shipping company located in the city of Mole. Coming of age, he's looking to take his first steps into the world and find the destiny that awaits him.
Gwynevere Wrenfell:

Gwynevere Wrenfell is the Baronetess of Ettingscove. The heir to Baron Wrenfell's fortune and lands.
​Ettingscove sits at a turning point in the affairs of the Baronies. Being the last surviving child of the Baron, Gwynevere's life is not the idealistic princess existence others dream of.
​The Fjordlands is a place rocked with cloak and dagger. An ally one day can be an enemy the next, and "enemy of mine enemies" is a way of life.
Abigail Lalana:

Daughter of a famous doctor and a horticulturalist, Abigail has had quite the unorthodox upbringing. Especially within a family that seems to be perpetually growing.
A genius prodigy inventor with an appetite for fixing things, Abigail is a rising star in Chaladon and has set the stage for her siblings.
​But peaceful times in the paradise of Chaladon will not last forever. Outside forces and politics will have their say in Abigail's future.
​There are even those within Chaladon who desire to ride the Lalana fame, or put an end to it completely.
Aoli Shi:

If Abigail is a prodigy of invention, Aoli is a prodigy of air combat.
Daughter of General Yuan Shi of the Yeshan Empire, Aoli was born with a pilot cap on her head and a rifle in her hand.
Quick to action and fast on the reflexes, Aoli shines above all who pass through the Yeshan Military Academy.
But not all is perfect being sworn to an expansionist super power. True friends are hard to come by, and those who would seek to topple the empire are many.
Sofia Aliyev:

Daughter of a Guild merchant who's business has seen better times, Sofia has been bred for the day she takes over the business.
Groomed in etiquette and the importance of body language in business, Sofia maintains a strong demeanor. She never lets her personal feelings dictate her actions.
Because of this, Sofia is already well on her way to succeeding the Aliyev family and restoring it's prominence.
But with prominence comes those who seek their own share of the grand fortunes to be had.  Whether it be from savages who attack trade routes, to rival businesses who plot and scheme behind pretty faces. Every transaction or deal brokered is a battle, and Sofia must become a master tactician of them.
Calle Haldora:

Where there are merchants and traders, there will be pirates.
Calle is no stranger to danger or to the criminal underworld. An inventive treasure hunter who always seems on the run from someone, Calle is certainly a most wanted individual on many lists. A true child of Anglea.
But is there more to her than meets the eye? The Haldora and Aven families have a shared history. One which is certain to bring Calle across William's path one way or another.


Your contribution helps us get all this off the ground and rolling. Our initial story (Which we call the Neutral Arc) that is currently in production, weighs in at about 30,000-40,000 words. This sets the tone and the branches for our main story arcs which weigh in much heavier. Some over 100,000 words each.
To put this in perspective, many visual novels in the west tend to sit under 10,000 words or less and are often very short or simplistic. Literally their entire story fits within that allotment. Larger projects might go past 20,000 or 30,000.
However, our total word count at present is around 700,000. That includes branches and routes for each story arc for the six nations in the Guns of Icarus world.

This total puts us well past big Visual Novels which have word counts over 300,000. We're within striking distance of even large AAA games with counts over 1 million. It is a word count you'd potentially see more in Japanese Visual Novels, not the west.
What we're attempting to do is challenge western visual novels. To not be defined by a cookie cutter mentality of creating visual novels, but to let our story go beyond what traditional visual novels tend to entail.
Thus our project has grown and gone from a labor of love to something that intends to challenge the status quo. To break hammers.
700,000 to us, is merely just another hammer to break.



Simply put, money will be distributed where it is needed the most to help speed up our development process and release the Neutral Arc sooner.
We'd like to raise $10,000 based on current and near future needs. Can we do it with less? Absolutely. But will we do it as fast with less? Likely not. We're committed to seeing this story released no matter what. It's up to you how fast it gets there.
That said, this is where money will go:
-Hiring New Talent
This is the biggie.
While our team has been working for awhile on our own, we need to be able to hire more to speed up the process. To be able to hire on extra artists would allow our lead artists freedom to specialize more on certain tasks.
We could also then look into hiring specialists for other departments that are in need of additional staff.
This would greatly advance the speed at which we can release not only this title, but the main story arcs.
-Funding For Current Team Members
Our current team members have been donating a lot of hours for free for years, all the while working jobs to keep the lights on, or finishing their educations. To be able to bless them for the work they've done, would encourage them greatly and free up more time to work on the project.
-Funding To Get This Game Released
While the primary focus of this campaign is to get the funding we need to speed up production, any excess that can help us with getting this game released on Steam, as well as other gaming networks, will help.
The sooner we release, the sooner we have it on sale and can begin directing money from sales to where it is needed.
-Beyond The Neutral Arc
Funds in excess that aren't needed to get our initial story released, will be allotted to our story arc development and getting those jump started.
Beyond that, we will allot funds towards the aforementioned stretch goal like getting this entire story done with vocals, or ports onto other platforms like Mac, iOS, and Android.

Digital Goods:

These goods will all be delivered digitally. Game copies will require access to Steam to install. Please go to store.steampowered.com and make an account on Steam to play the games. Digital keys will be distributed after the campaign is finished. Date to be announced.
-Copy of the Neutral Arc
This is the initial story which we are launching this campaign to fund. You get a full copy of this.
Game will be English only for the initial release.
-Copy of the Complete Story
This is both the initial story and every story we have planned for development. Because delivering the story arcs will take longer, we are heavily discounting this for this campaign as a way of thanking you for wanting to see this project completed with us.
Game will be English only for the initial release.
-Guns of Icarus Alliance
This is the game that started it all, along with it's most recent COOP expansion. So you're actually getting both the PVE and PVP game in one. It is the framework we have built our world within. If you already have a copy, give it to a friend!
Quantities will be limited each week.
-Alliance + Costume Pack
Not only do you get Alliance, but you get a full costume pack to use in game to make your character look dashing and heroic as you cackle manically at your foe's demise! HA HA! Use mines...
Quantities will be limited each week.
-Balloon decal
Our own addition for Guns of Icarus Alliance. Drawn by our artists, this is a set of balloon decals based on our world and characters that you can use on your airships in game. The decals will be exclusive to this campaign until a later date to be determined.
Physical Goods:

To better showcase our talents, our physical goods will all come with a special limited art print designed for this campaign by our Lead Artist, Georgy Valerianov.
All physical items are limited in order quantity. Ship dates will be announced pending product completion after the campaign finishes.
-4x6 Scratch Pad (25 sheets)
This is our lowest tier item. Perfect for jotting down some notes with our special print background. Each pack of pads will include 25 sheets.

-Puzzle Magnet
This is a 5 and 3/8 by 5 and 3/8 in puzzle magnet. It features our art piece in a jigsaw puzzle you can put together anywhere the magnet will stick. So instead of a simple lone magnet, you get nine!

-Mousepad
This is a 8 x 9 and 1/2 in mousepad featuring our art piece of this campaign. It comes with a heavy duty open-cell rubber base material backing and a soft anti microbial fabric surface.

-Wall Scroll
This is a beautiful 26 by 16 inch Wall Scroll featuring the art piece of this campaign.

Other Perks:

-Your Name In The Credits
To show our gratitude for your contribution, your name will be featured in the credits of All is Fair in Dust and Air.
-Your Name On a Nameless NPC
Because you've gone above and beyond, we're happy to name one of our previous nameless NPCs after you. Only real names or creative names. Nothing vulgar. Want to name a character after someone special to you? No problem! They will however, be pending approval.
-We Draw You Into The Game
The ultimate sign of appreciation for your contribution. You'll get to work directly with our development team to bring your likeness into the story. That includes where you appear and how you appear. Want to appear on a certain story arc? No problem!
-Your Name In All Our Games
As it says, any game we produce from Dust and Air on. No matter what it is, your name will be in the credits. This is the only time we will ever offer this perk.



All is Fair in Dust and Air may end up being one of the largest western visual novels ever attempted.
Backing something like that is something to be proud of. You're making history! We think about this every day here at Broken Hammer and it just continues to inspire us to see it completed.
To join us at this stage of our development means you'll be there at the end when the last story is released. To be a part of our journey and the journey of our characters in the Guns of Icarus world.



Broken Hammer doesn't seek to lie about the challenges a project of this size faces. Our core team is committed, but life happens. Starting from a community fan project, we are well aware of this, as the original team has changed over the years. But we don't make plans to fail, only plans to handle potential problems as they come up.
A project of around 700,000 in word count takes a lot of work. The challenge is sustaining development on that over time and keeping pace with releases.
Like a kite being lifted into the air, your contribution not only helps us get this title off the ground, but it also puts us in a position where we can start earning money from sales of the release. Where we can then soar.
When each story is released, it will be released as a stand alone game of it's own, or DLC (Pending updates to the game engine). Each of these stories will help fund those that follow. Helping us to continue to keep rising higher, where we can stay aloft should any turbulence come.
It is a graduated incline with each release, and our plan, that by the time the last stories release, we'll be churning out the stories fairly quickly. We can do this part because of shared assets across story lines.
Shared assets are the next major plan to deal with the scope of this project. It is something that has actually already begun. Aside from clothing and minor changes, the character models we are making now, will be able to serve our story designs later. Because many of the stories do have crossover moments, our assets get spread out better.
So even as we build the introduction story now, we are already making final assets for the other stories. Over time, those assets will increase to the point we only will be needing to create assets for new story specific characters or minor changes to existing characters, some of which, also crossover.
All in all, we looked at the great challenge of making a story this size and considered our options. Sure we could start smaller, and many companies like us do just that, but then it would mean letting this story we love so much, sit on the shelf for years. 
That just didn't feel right to us. So we looked at ways to turn this project's mountain into a manageable hill. We want to finish what we've started and do what we love.



Aside from contributions, what we really need most is your word of mouth or clicking the share buttons on this page. Tell a friend, tell a neighbor. Say your a Hammer Breaker. When they ask what that is, tell them about our project!
Besides that, if you're interested in helping us in a professional manner, we welcome hearing from you! Don't be shy!

story:
Who We are:

  • My father Dragon S-Y Chang is well liked in his community of Mahjong collectors.  He prizes himself as the Mahjong Historian having written a book called Wonderful Taiwan Mahjong.  During his years traveling the world playing mahjong tournaments, he has also amassed a sizable collection of antique mahjong sets from early last century.

http://www.sloperama.com/mahjongg/dragon.html 

  • My family runs a boutique liquor business.  Our best selling items are liquor in mahjong shape ceramic Decantors.  

  • Liquor brand is called yitongfacai.  www.yitongfacai.com

  • This mahjong set concept was conceived during the 2016 summer vacation when I took my children's drawings and mixed them into the tile design.  I have also enlisted help from friends who are in the game design business.  
  • Creating this new set is for my family's love of the game and our mission is to take mahjong making into the new century with new design and technology.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The campaign goal amount is set at USD 12500.  This amount is for the preparation work on quality tools.  One third of the funding will go toward making the mold for the Urea resin.  Another one third of the funding will be used toward reserving the capacity of the 2.5D lamination machine.  Holiday Mahjong will be played by friends and families during the holiday season.  So they need to be express delivered in time.  We need SPEED.  All this basic funding goal is to ensure we have speed in manufacturing capability to finish all the sets commissioned in this campaign.  That there will be sufficient holiday mahjong sets sitting under the Christmas tree on Christmas Eve.  We need your help to achieve speedy manufacturing.  
  • Inside each regular Holiday Mahjong set, we start off to include unique holiday postcards that use the same design as the mahjong.  There will be 10 randomly selected postcards in the package.  
  • The 162 carefully made tiles plus 4 blank ones are included.  The tiles will be carefully cleaned off before each shipment to ensure your playing experience quality.  

  • With the tiles, we also have a set of 4 coffee coasters that help to identify the seating arrangement so the players can focus on the game.  

  • While for easy handling of the mahjong tiles on the table, we have included a set of 4 mahjong rulers that will help you sweep in your winning chips.  

  • Lastly, each set is uniquely identified by an one million santa dollar bank note that is issued by the Freezing Reserve.  This plate ensures the authenticity of your set from the North Kingdom.   

  • We have Personalized Holiday Mahjong Decantor for people who treasure their drinks as well as Mahjong.  Here is an example of Snowman Decantor.

The Impact

  • Your contribution to the campaign will ensure that the holiday mahjong sets have the right tools and molds to be manufactured correctly.  Holiday mahjong sets will spark off a new trend of mahjong design and manufacturing.  When families and friends gather around during Christmas, this holiday charm will be the conversation piece of the table, mahjong table that is.  This is the Mahjong set that will bring a bright smile to all passionate about this game no matter the age.  
  • As for my experience in making Mahjong, I designed another set called the Golf Mahjong 15 years ago when I was a fresh graduate out of college.  It was the combination of my love for golf and mahjong.  Many collector friends around the world shared my joy.  This time the joy will be shared again with you.  

TIME LINE

  • I have all the manufacturing partners on standby to start rolling and we welcome you to join our journey of Mahjong Evolution.  

BUZZING

  • I am thankful for all the positive feedback thus far.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are still reading, thank you for liking our campaign so much.  Please be sure to like on our Facebook page.  More information on future Holiday Mahjong sets will be shared there.  If your friend pledges to our campaign through your referral, please leave a message on our Facebook page @holidaymahjong.  We will prepare a surprise gift for you.     
  • Thank you for liking our campaign, we appreciate you taking the time to share with your mahjong loving friends. Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
What is Ascendant Reality

Ascendant Reality aims to be the next generation of Virtual Reality gaming and interaction engines. Using Virtual Reality mixed with several real-time inputs such as the Leap Motion controller the player will see and be a better version of themselves within the digital reality (open world). A MUCH better version. With increased strength, teleportation, force powers, possession abilities, flight ability and so much more! All while using your own hands in the game and your own motion. You will feel like a god. You will be a god. Please see the website for even more explanations on how it works!

 

Further Explanation

Ascendant (rising in power or influence) Reality (the state of things as they actually exist), is a game/simulation where you control every aspect of reality. Like a god. This simulation revolves and evolves around VR, (Optional AR), and presence technologies. Giving you an experience and power you will have never before felt in your life. Every ability you can dream of contained in a massive expanse of a digital world. Filled with “Beings”. These beings adapt and evolve the more time you spend in the simulation and the more you do to the world. The literal fabric of reality changes with every choice you make. 

Build for them and they will worship you, destroy them and they will worship you all the same… Until they start fighting back, building their own machines to take you down. They, however, do not know just how powerful you are, and as you progress the simulation, your powers too, will evolve. Making you bigger, better and a more powerful Ascendant. Some will always worship you, others, regardless of what type of Ascendant you are, will be against you. Beings will also fight amongst themselves, starting wars and battles that you can take part in or sit back and watch. The beings evolve their technology and ideas the more you play. 

It is a hyper-realistic world with hyper-realistic controls and hyper-awesome abilities. Control the elements, control the people, mod yourself, fly, possess, dismember, harm, design viruses, the options are endless. (For a full list of abilities, read below in the “Engines and Suites” section). The time ratio is one hour of game play equals 24 hours in the simulated reality. Evolution will of course be accelerated; however, the same life mechanics apply and the more you have the game on the longer you are in this reality the more it grows, evolves and changes.

 

What makes it special

Hyper realistic graphics and physics. With a full control over everything as the player. All graphics are powered and designed for next generation gaming and the physics is as precise as the real world, with the ability for the player to alter it however they wish, after all, a god should be allowed to do anything. Like for instance, turn gravity off, fly, make a person a point of gravitational pull and watch as everything around them get pulled to them like a magnet. 

As all graphics are hyper realistic the animations had to be next level. Rather than using frame by frame animation, motion capture will be utilized to create the most life-like animations for in game realism. Natural motion by real people giving the player a more realistic digital world. Not only in movement but also in facial animations using newer technologies to create face to face realism in game. 

The physics engine while allowing the player to alter any aspect of the world and bend it to their will also be hyper realistic for every other entity and assets in the game. From walls to cloth. Sporting a fully destructible environment and next gen cloth simulation allowing you to quite literally rip clothes off in segments. 

Ascendant Reality will have several parental controls allowing the game to start at its base rating of M all the way to R18+. The reason for this high rating is because of the hyper realism, anything you think you can do you probably can, this opens up doors to a new kind of graphic level. Realistic dismemberment, increased strength and cloth physics applied to skin, these examples are just a hint at what you will be able to do and have it happen right in front of you with your own hands.

 

What We Need & What You Get

To make this idea a reality there are a few things required to get it off the ground. While running the simulation will not need a super super powerful computer, designing and developing it will. We have that, what we are after is developmental and testing hardware for the team to make the game fully compatible with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and in time perhaps PlayStation VR. Alongside this we need a motion capture package, the cost has been brought right down not needing those super expensive Hollywood ones, however the "at-home motion capture" devices still come at a cost.  We will also be aiming to use several control inputs, or at least allow several this includes the LEAP Motion Controller, Myo Armband, Perception Neuron, Manus VR Glove and of course the controllers that come with the headsets. We are also looking to employ a part-time 3D animator.

If you look to your right you will see what you can receive for any of the tiers. Some even include VR Headsets, LEAP Motion Controllers and much much MUCH more! The hardware itself for each tier we aim to send out before even an Alpha is released so that you may have fun with it while we build the best Virtual Reality game out there! 

 

Releases

Asylum: To showcase the graphics, storyline engine, spatial sound and game interaction this will be a small horror game that will have you at the edge of your seat! Expected release early 2018.

RedWood: To showcase the graphics and immersibility of Ascendant reality a fully interactive explorable forest will be released. Show graphics, spatial sound and immersive interaction. Expected release early 2018.

Simulat: To showcase the game mechanics and god powers in a low ploy cartoonish world, lots of fun! Expected release late 2018.

Alpha/Beta: Alpha and Beta version of Ascendant Reality will be released over the course of development, no set dates but those that back the project get access to each to them depending on the selected tier.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge of this project will be time. However backers do get awesome rewards along this relatively lengthy timeline including copies of "Simulat" (Our base simulation environment to mess around with objects), Alpha, Beta and depending on the level you chose even the full game with VR and AR hardware (One tier even includes a computer!).

 

Key Game Elements

(Things that you can control)

 

  • Behaviour: Direct control of Violent – Calm, Kind - Mean, Analytical - Unsystematic, Extrovert – Introvert, Energy High – Energy Low, Gay - Straight.
  • Emotion: Direct control of Happy – Sad, Angry – Calm, Fear – Courage, Love – Hate.
  • Intelligence: Direct control of Intelligent – Stupid.
     
  • Physics: Gravity on/off, Force Push, Force Grab.
  • Weather: Rain, Sun, Cloud, Snow, Heat, Cold.
  • Terrain: Terrain Up, Terrain Down.
     
  • Dismemberment Grab: Supports full body dismemberment.
  • Dismemberment Spread: Hand spread pull arms, legs and head off body. 
  • Explode: Blow up beings.
  • Crush: Crush enemies with your fist
     
  • Sword: Wield a customisable sword to inflict damage upon beings.
  • Gun: Wield a customisable gun to inflict damage upon beings.
  • Bomb: Wield a customisable grenade to inflict area damage upon beings.
     
  • Heal: Heal a being from death, sickness or harm.
  • Sickness: Inflict custom sickness on beings.
  • Paralyse: Paralyse and un-paralyse a being.
     
  • Fire: Customizable fire control out of palms.
  • Water: Customizable water control out of palms.
  • Ice: Customizable ice control out of palms (Freeze being/shapes).
  • Lightning: Customizable lightning control out of palms.
     
  • Fly: Fly around like superman or Iron Man.
  • Strength: Super strength in punches, make your enemies rag doll fly.
  • Possession: Possess any being, see and be as them.
     
  • Stop: Stop/Pause time where it stands and alter reality.
  • Fast Forward: Speed up time.
  • Reset: Reset reality to the beginning of time.
  • Slomo: Slow motion shift.
     
  • Petri-Dish: A Petri-dish like simulation area where you can set up controlled environments and inflict changes to see an outcome.
  • Universe: A space simulation where you as a large being control planets and universal aspects like sun and black holes.
  • Objects: Level builder like controls. Fences. Houses. Gardens. ETC.
     
  • Drugs: Create your own drugs with effects to see how beings react and what changes in the world.
  • Virus: Create your own virus or bacteria, drop it in water throw it at someone, inject it into someone.
  • Species Splicing: Mix and match beings to create the ultimate being.
     
  • Teleport: Throw disc and clench fist to teleport to disc.
  • Ghost: Become a ghost where you can inflict change but beings can’t see, interact or harm you.
  • Vision: Thermal, X-Ray and Night vision options.

 

ENVIRONMENT

The environment will be split into several zones that span out over the world all accessible from the beginning.

 

Area and Climate (Wind: arbitrary)

  • Mountains – Snow
  • Desert Plains – Sun/day, Rain/nights(Sometimes)
  • City (2016) – Erratic
  • Old style London town – Rain – Cloud
  • City (Futuristic) – Bright/Sun, Rain and Snow
  • Forest – Cloud, Rain, Sun
  • Urban – Sun
  • Country – Sun, Rain, Cloud
  • Farm – Sun, Rain
  • Suburban – Sun, Rain, Cloud, Snow
  • Underwater World Render – Entire world underwater.

 

Realism Editions

  • Insects - Bugs, Spiders, Bees, etc.
  • Winged – Birds, Eagles.
  • Underwater – Fish, Sharks, Whales, Jellyfish, Mermaids.
  • Wind will be arbitrary meaning that it will pick up and slow down randomly.
  • Natural Disasters – Bush Fires, Tornado's, Storms, Earthquakes and Tidal Waves.
  • Daytime/Night Time Cycle.
  • Stars, Moon and Sun (controllable).
  • Street Lights.
  • Skydive with parachute.
  • Vehicles – Cars, Planes, Bikes, Motorbikes, Gliders, Boats, Trains, Jet pack, Submarine.

 

Beings

Every being is different. Behavior, emotion and abilities. They aren’t all humans either. The expanse has also got a number of civilizations.

 

Types of Beings and Their Abilities

Human – Normal and erratic, humans will worship you or they will be against you. Others remain neutral. They are erratic in a sense that they can get angry, will harm each other and you. Some will work together others will be individual.

Robots – Robots appear as machines and exist to help humans abiding by the three laws, as you are an Ascendant, humans can command robots to harm you if they wish.

Synthetics – Synthetics are robots that appear human. They are not bound by the three laws and can harm both you and humans at their own will.

Bigfoot – There is only one Bigfoot in the entire simulation. Hunt him down for an awesome ability. (Find him to unlock an ultimate power)

Cthulhu – Cthulhu is only one as well. Often found in the sea will rise periodically to lay waste to the land and devour his followers and those against alike in an effort to become more powerful. Defeat him to gain an ultimate power. 

Demons – Hells servants. Depending on what kind of Ascendant you are, they will either help, hinder or do nothing to you. They can however, possess humans. 

Angels – Heavens servants. Depending on what kind of Ascendant you are, they will either help, hinder or do nothing to you. The can heal humans.

Demigods – Demigods have god like powers. Not frequently seen but mostly can control one element, land or sea.

Super humans – Super humans are also not frequent but can control certain things, flying, speed, possession.

Vampires – Vampires only come out at night to torment humans. If you are a malevolent Ascendant they will not harm you unless provoked, if you are a benevolent Ascendant they will attack you unprovoked.

Werewolves – Werewolves remain neutral unless provoked and consistently hunt vampires.

Zombies – Zombies happen when it is full moon, night time and a person dies from a certain virus called “Zekerus”.

Aliens – Aliens come to earth and based on where they land and who greets them, depicts how they act upon the world and its people. (Help or hinder)

 

Storyline Engine

The Storyline Engine adds missions to the game. Doing them will unlock your certain hidden powers as well as gain you points that up your score to access powers that require a certain Ascension level.

Story lines are complex or simple. Some tie in, some do not.

There are no bounds to a story line. Some will lead you underground, underwater or on the surface.

Beings can be merged (E.G vampire falling in love with a Werewolf).

This opens a plethora of unlimited story lines. Story lines are currently being written by handpicked individuals and looked over by our head of story lines.

CSI modules are point and click hidden object stories that let you explore the world and find runes or hidden characters. These will always unlock abilities.

Complexity is only limited by the imagination of the writers.

If you would like to write your own story line idea and have a chance of having it in the simulation, please visit the website!

You will receive the PC and rift before the Simulat release. Asylum(Horror Game). Redwood(Explore a HD Forest)

What is Ascendant Reality

Ascendant Reality aims to be the next generation of Virtual Reality gaming and interaction engines. Using Virtual Reality mixed with several real-time inputs such as the Leap Motion controller the player will see and be a better version of themselves within the digital reality (open world). A MUCH better version. With increased strength, teleportation, force powers, possession abilities, flight ability and so much more! All while using your own hands in the game and your own motion. You will feel like a god. You will be a god. Please see the website for even more explanations on how it works!
 
Further Explanation
Ascendant (rising in power or influence) Reality (the state of things as they actually exist), is a game/simulation where you control every aspect of reality. Like a god. This simulation revolves and evolves around VR, (Optional AR), and presence technologies. Giving you an experience and power you will have never before felt in your life. Every ability you can dream of contained in a massive expanse of a digital world. Filled with “Beings”. These beings adapt and evolve the more time you spend in the simulation and the more you do to the world. The literal fabric of reality changes with every choice you make. Build for them and they will worship you, destroy them and they will worship you all the same… Until they start fighting back, building their own machines to take you down. They, however, do not know just how powerful you are, and as you progress the simulation, your powers too, will evolve. Making you bigger, better and a more powerful Ascendant. Some will always worship you, others, regardless of what type of Ascendant you are, will be against you. Beings will also fight amongst themselves, starting wars and battles that you can take part in or sit back and watch. The beings evolve their technology and ideas the more you play. It is a hyper-realistic world with hyper-realistic controls and hyper-awesome abilities. Control the elements, control the people, mod yourself, fly, possess, dismember, harm, design viruses, the options are endless. (For a full list of abilities, read below in the “Engines and Suites” section). The time ratio is one hour of game play equals 24 hours in the simulated reality. Evolution will of course be accelerated; however, the same life mechanics apply and the more you have the game on the longer you are in this reality the more it grows, evolves and changes.
 
What makes it special
Hyper realistic graphics and physics. With a full control over everything as the player. All graphics are powered and designed for next generation gaming and the physics is as precise as the real world, with the ability for the player to alter it however they wish, after all, a god should be allowed to do anything. Like for instance, turn gravity off, fly, make a person a point of gravitational pull and watch as everything around them get pulled to them like a magnet. As all graphics are hyper realistic the animations had to be next level. Rather than using frame by frame animation, motion capture will be utilized to create the most life-like animations for in game realism. Natural motion by real people giving the player a more realistic digital world. Not only in movement but also in facial animations using newer technologies to create face to face realism in game. The physics engine while allowing the player to alter any aspect of the world and bend it to their will also be hyper realistic for every other entity and assets in the game. From walls to cloth. Sporting a fully destructible environment and next gen cloth simulation allowing you to quite literally rip clothes off in segments. Ascendant Reality will have several parental controls allowing the game to start at its base rating of M all the way to R18+. The reason for this high rating is because of the hyper realism, anything you think you can do you probably can, this opens up doors to a new kind of graphic level. Realistic dismemberment, increased strength and cloth physics applied to skin, these examples are just a hint at what you will be able to do and have it happen right in front of you with your own hands.
 

What We Need & What You Get
To make this idea a reality there are a few things required to get it off the ground. While running the simulation will not need a super super powerful computer, designing and developing it will. We have that, what we are after is developmental and testing hardware for the team to make the game fully compatible with Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and in time perhaps PlayStation VR. Alongside this we need a motion capture package, the cost has been brought right down not needing those super expensive Hollywood ones, however the "at-home motion capture" devices still come at a cost.  We will also be aiming to use several control inputs, or at least allow several this includes the LEAP Motion Controller, Myo Armband, Perception Neuron, Manus VR Glove and of course the controllers that come with the headsets. We are also looking to employ a part-time 3D animator.
If you look to your right you will see what you can receive for any of the tiers. Some even include VR Headsets, LEAP Motion Controllers and much much MUCH more! The hardware itself for each tier we aim to send out before even an Alpha is released so that you may have fun with it while we build the best Virtual Reality game out there! 
 
Releases
Asylum: To showcase the graphics, storyline engine, spatial sound and game interaction this will be a small horror game that will have you at the edge of your seat! Expected release early 2018.RedWood: To showcase the graphics and immersibility of Ascendant reality a fully interactive explorable forest will be released. Show graphics, spatial sound and immersive interaction. Expected release early 2018.Simulat: To showcase the game mechanics and god powers in a low ploy cartoonish world, lots of fun! Expected release late 2018.Alpha/Beta: Alpha and Beta version of Ascendant Reality will be released over the course of development, no set dates but those that back the project get access to each to them depending on the selected tier. 

Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge of this project will be time. However backers do get awesome rewards along this relatively lengthy timeline including copies of "Simulat" (Our base simulation environment to mess around with objects), Alpha, Beta and depending on the level you chose even the full game with VR and AR hardware (One tier even includes a computer!).
 
Key Game Elements
(Things that you can control)
 

Behaviour: Direct control of Violent – Calm, Kind - Mean, Analytical - Unsystematic, Extrovert – Introvert, Energy High – Energy Low, Gay - Straight.
Emotion: Direct control of Happy – Sad, Angry – Calm, Fear – Courage, Love – Hate.
Intelligence: Direct control of Intelligent – Stupid. 
Physics: Gravity on/off, Force Push, Force Grab.
Weather: Rain, Sun, Cloud, Snow, Heat, Cold.
Terrain: Terrain Up, Terrain Down. 
Dismemberment Grab: Supports full body dismemberment.
Dismemberment Spread: Hand spread pull arms, legs and head off body. 
Explode: Blow up beings.
Crush: Crush enemies with your fist 
Sword: Wield a customisable sword to inflict damage upon beings.
Gun: Wield a customisable gun to inflict damage upon beings.
Bomb: Wield a customisable grenade to inflict area damage upon beings. 
Heal: Heal a being from death, sickness or harm.
Sickness: Inflict custom sickness on beings.
Paralyse: Paralyse and un-paralyse a being. 
Fire: Customizable fire control out of palms.
Water: Customizable water control out of palms.
Ice: Customizable ice control out of palms (Freeze being/shapes).
Lightning: Customizable lightning control out of palms. 
Fly: Fly around like superman or Iron Man.
Strength: Super strength in punches, make your enemies rag doll fly.
Possession: Possess any being, see and be as them. 
Stop: Stop/Pause time where it stands and alter reality.
Fast Forward: Speed up time.
Reset: Reset reality to the beginning of time.
Slomo: Slow motion shift.
